5260 
5268 void QCPAxis::moveRange(double diff)
5269 {
5270  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
5271  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5272  {
5273  mRange.lower += diff;
5274  mRange.upper += diff;
5275  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5276  {
5277  mRange.lower *= diff;
5278  mRange.upper *= diff;
5279  }
5280  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5281  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5282  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
5283 }
5284 
5291 void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
5292 {
5293  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
5294  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5295  {
5296  QCPRange newRange;
5297  newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
5298  newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
5299  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5300  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
5301  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5302  {
5303  if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) || (mRange.upper > 0 && center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
5304  {
5305  QCPRange newRange;
5306  newRange.lower = qPow(mRange.lower/center, factor)*center;
5307  newRange.upper = qPow(mRange.upper/center, factor)*center;
5308  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5309  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
5310  } else
5311  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic sign domain as range:" << center;
5312  }
5313  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5314  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5315  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
5316 }
5317 
5331 void QCPAxis::setScaleRatio(const QCPAxis *otherAxis, double ratio)
5332 {
5333  int otherPixelSize, ownPixelSize;
5334 
5335  if (otherAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5336  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->width();
5337  else
5338  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->height();
5339 
5340  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5341  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->width();
5342  else
5343  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->height();
5344 
5345  double newRangeSize = ratio*otherAxis->range().size()*ownPixelSize/(double)otherPixelSize;
5346  setRange(range().center(), newRangeSize, Qt::AlignCenter);
5347 }
5348 
5355 void QCPAxis::rescale(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
5356 {
5357  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> p = plottables();
5358  QCPRange newRange;
5359  bool haveRange = false;
5360  for (int i=0; i<p.size(); ++i)
5361  {
5362  if (!p.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisiblePlottables)
5363  continue;
5364  QCPRange plottableRange;
5365  bool currentFoundRange;
5366  QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain signDomain = QCPAbstractPlottable::sdBoth;
5367  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
5368  signDomain = (mRange.upper < 0 ? QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative : QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive);
5369  if (p.at(i)->keyAxis() == this)
5370  plottableRange = p.at(i)->getKeyRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
5371  else
5372  plottableRange = p.at(i)->getValueRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
5373  if (currentFoundRange)
5374  {
5375  if (!haveRange)
5376  newRange = plottableRange;
5377  else
5378  newRange.expand(plottableRange);
5379  haveRange = true;
5380  }
5381  }
5382  if (haveRange)
5383  {
5384  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
5385  {
5386  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
5387  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5388  {
5389  newRange.lower = center-mRange.size()/2.0;
5390  newRange.upper = center+mRange.size()/2.0;
5391  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5392  {
5393  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
5394  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
5395  }
5396  }
5397  setRange(newRange);
5398  }
5399 }
5400 
5404 double QCPAxis::pixelToCoord(double value) const
5405 {
5406  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5407  {
5408  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5409  {
5410  if (!mRangeReversed)
5411  return (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5412  else
5413  return -(value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5414  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5415  {
5416  if (!mRangeReversed)
5417  return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.lower;
5418  else
5419  return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->left()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.upper;
5420  }
5421  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5422  {
5423  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5424  {
5425  if (!mRangeReversed)
5426  return (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5427  else
5428  return -(mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5429  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5430  {
5431  if (!mRangeReversed)
5432  return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.lower;
5433  else
5434  return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->bottom())/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.upper;
5435  }
5436  }
5437 }
5438 
5442 double QCPAxis::coordToPixel(double value) const
5443 {
5444  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5445  {
5446  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5447  {
5448  if (!mRangeReversed)
5449  return (value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5450  else
5451  return (mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5452  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5453  {
5454  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5455  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->right()+200 : mAxisRect->left()-200;
5456  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5457  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->left()-200 : mAxisRect->right()+200;
5458  else
5459  {
5460  if (!mRangeReversed)
5461  return baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5462  else
5463  return baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5464  }
5465  }
5466  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5467  {
5468  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5469  {
5470  if (!mRangeReversed)
5471  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5472  else
5473  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5474  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5475  {
5476  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5477  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->top()-200 : mAxisRect->bottom()+200;
5478  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5479  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->bottom()+200 : mAxisRect->top()-200;
5480  else
5481  {
5482  if (!mRangeReversed)
5483  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5484  else
5485  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5486  }
5487  }
5488  }
5489 }
5490 
5500 QCPAxis::SelectablePart QCPAxis::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const
5501 {
5502  if (!mVisible)
5503  return spNone;
5504 
5505  if (mAxisPainter->axisSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5506  return spAxis;
5507  else if (mAxisPainter->tickLabelsSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5508  return spTickLabels;
5509  else if (mAxisPainter->labelSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5510  return spAxisLabel;
5511  else
5512  return spNone;
5513 }
5514 
5515 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5516 double QCPAxis::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
5517 {
5518  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
5519  SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
5520  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
5521  return -1;
5522 
5523  if (details)
5524  details->setValue(part);
5525  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
5526 }
5527 
5535 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxis::plottables() const
5536 {
5537  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
5538  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5539 
5540  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
5541  {
5542  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5543  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
5544  }
5545  return result;
5546 }
5547 
5553 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxis::graphs() const
5554 {
5555  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
5556  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5557 
5558  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
5559  {
5560  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5561  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
5562  }
5563  return result;
5564 }
5565 
5572 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCPAxis::items() const
5573 {
5574  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
5575  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5576 
5577  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
5578  {
5579  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
5580  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++posId)
5581  {
5582  if (positions.at(posId)->keyAxis() == this || positions.at(posId)->valueAxis() == this)
5583  {
5584  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
5585  break;
5586  }
5587  }
5588  }
5589  return result;
5590 }
5591 
5596 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(QCP::MarginSide side)
5597 {
5598  switch (side)
5599  {
5600  case QCP::msLeft: return atLeft;
5601  case QCP::msRight: return atRight;
5602  case QCP::msTop: return atTop;
5603  case QCP::msBottom: return atBottom;
5604  default: break;
5605  }
5606  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid margin side passed:" << (int)side;
5607  return atLeft;
5608 }
5609 
5613 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::opposite(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
5614 {
5615  switch (type)
5616  {
5617  case atLeft: return atRight; break;
5618  case atRight: return atLeft; break;
5619  case atBottom: return atTop; break;
5620  case atTop: return atBottom; break;
5621  default: qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis type"; return atLeft; break;
5622  }
5623 }
5624 
5632 void QCPAxis::setupTickVectors()
5633 {
5634  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5635  if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
5636 
5637  // fill tick vectors, either by auto generating or by notifying user to fill the vectors himself
5638  if (mAutoTicks)
5639  {
5640  generateAutoTicks();
5641  } else
5642  {
5643  emit ticksRequest();
5644  }
5645 
5646  visibleTickBounds(mLowestVisibleTick, mHighestVisibleTick);
5647  if (mTickVector.isEmpty())
5648  {
5649  mSubTickVector.clear();
5650  return;
5651  }
5652 
5653  // generate subticks between ticks:
5654  mSubTickVector.resize((mTickVector.size()-1)*mSubTickCount);
5655  if (mSubTickCount > 0)
5656  {
5657  double subTickStep = 0;
5658  double subTickPosition = 0;
5659  int subTickIndex = 0;
5660  bool done = false;
5661  int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick > 0 ? mLowestVisibleTick-1 : mLowestVisibleTick;
5662  int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick < mTickVector.size()-1 ? mHighestVisibleTick+1 : mHighestVisibleTick;
5663  for (int i=lowTick+1; i<=highTick; ++i)
5664  {
5665  subTickStep = (mTickVector.at(i)-mTickVector.at(i-1))/(double)(mSubTickCount+1);
5666  for (int k=1; k<=mSubTickCount; ++k)
5667  {
5668  subTickPosition = mTickVector.at(i-1) + k*subTickStep;
5669  if (subTickPosition < mRange.lower)
5670  continue;
5671  if (subTickPosition > mRange.upper)
5672  {
5673  done = true;
5674  break;
5675  }
5676  mSubTickVector[subTickIndex] = subTickPosition;
5677  subTickIndex++;
5678  }
5679  if (done) break;
5680  }
5681  mSubTickVector.resize(subTickIndex);
5682  }
5683 
5684  // generate tick labels according to tick positions:
5685  if (mAutoTickLabels)
5686  {
5687  int vecsize = mTickVector.size();
5688  mTickVectorLabels.resize(vecsize);
5689  if (mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
5690  {
5691  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5692  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(mTickVector.at(i), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision);
5693  } else if (mTickLabelType == ltDateTime)
5694  {
5695  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5696  {
5697 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0) // use fromMSecsSinceEpoch function if available, to gain sub-second accuracy on tick labels (e.g. for format "hh:mm:ss:zzz")
5698  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromTime_t(mTickVector.at(i)).toTimeSpec(mDateTimeSpec), mDateTimeFormat);
5699 #else
5700  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromMSecsSinceEpoch(mTickVector.at(i)*1000).toTimeSpec(mDateTimeSpec), mDateTimeFormat);
5701 #endif
5702  }
5703  }
5704  } else // mAutoTickLabels == false
5705  {
5706  if (mAutoTicks) // ticks generated automatically, but not ticklabels, so emit ticksRequest here for labels
5707  {
5708  emit ticksRequest();
5709  }
5710  // make sure provided tick label vector has correct (minimal) length:
5711  if (mTickVectorLabels.size() < mTickVector.size())
5712  mTickVectorLabels.resize(mTickVector.size());
5713  }
5714 }
5715 
5725 void QCPAxis::generateAutoTicks()
5726 {
5727  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5728  {
5729  if (mAutoTickStep)
5730  {
5731  // Generate tick positions according to linear scaling:
5732  mTickStep = mRange.size()/(double)(mAutoTickCount+1e-10); // mAutoTickCount ticks on average, the small addition is to prevent jitter on exact integers
5733  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(mTickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5734  double tickStepMantissa = mTickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5735  if (tickStepMantissa < 5)
5736  {
5737  // round digit after decimal point to 0.5
5738  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa*2)/2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5739  } else
5740  {
5741  // round to first digit in multiples of 2
5742  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa/2.0)*2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5743  }
5744  }
5745  if (mAutoSubTicks)
5746  mSubTickCount = calculateAutoSubTickCount(mTickStep);
5747  // Generate tick positions according to mTickStep:
5748  qint64 firstStep = floor(mRange.lower/mTickStep); // do not use qFloor here, or we'll lose 64 bit precision
5749  qint64 lastStep = ceil(mRange.upper/mTickStep); // do not use qCeil here, or we'll lose 64 bit precision
5750  int tickcount = lastStep-firstStep+1;
5751  if (tickcount < 0) tickcount = 0;
5752  mTickVector.resize(tickcount);
5753  for (int i=0; i<tickcount; ++i)
5754  mTickVector[i] = (firstStep+i)*mTickStep;
5755  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5756  {
5757  // Generate tick positions according to logbase scaling:
5758  if (mRange.lower > 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // positive range
5759  {
5760  double lowerMag = basePow(qFloor(baseLog(mRange.lower)));
5761  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5762  mTickVector.clear();
5763  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5764  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag > 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5765  {
5766  currentMag *= mScaleLogBase;
5767  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5768  }
5769  } else if (mRange.lower < 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // negative range
5770  {
5771  double lowerMag = -basePow(qCeil(baseLog(-mRange.lower)));
5772  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5773  mTickVector.clear();
5774  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5775  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag < 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5776  {
5777  currentMag /= mScaleLogBase;
5778  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5779  }
5780  } else // invalid range for logarithmic scale, because lower and upper have different sign
5781  {
5782  mTickVector.clear();
5783  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid range for logarithmic plot: " << mRange.lower << "-" << mRange.upper;
5784  }
5785  }
5786 }
5787 
5801 int QCPAxis::calculateAutoSubTickCount(double tickStep) const
5802 {
5803  int result = mSubTickCount; // default to current setting, if no proper value can be found
5804 
5805  // get mantissa of tickstep:
5806  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(tickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5807  double tickStepMantissa = tickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5808 
5809  // separate integer and fractional part of mantissa:
5810  double epsilon = 0.01;
5811  double intPartf;
5812  int intPart;
5813  double fracPart = modf(tickStepMantissa, &intPartf);
5814  intPart = intPartf;
5815 
5816  // handle cases with (almost) integer mantissa:
5817  if (fracPart < epsilon || 1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5818  {
5819  if (1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5820  ++intPart;
5821  switch (intPart)
5822  {
5823  case 1: result = 4; break; // 1.0 -> 0.2 substep
5824  case 2: result = 3; break; // 2.0 -> 0.5 substep
5825  case 3: result = 2; break; // 3.0 -> 1.0 substep
5826  case 4: result = 3; break; // 4.0 -> 1.0 substep
5827  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.0 -> 1.0 substep
5828  case 6: result = 2; break; // 6.0 -> 2.0 substep
5829  case 7: result = 6; break; // 7.0 -> 1.0 substep
5830  case 8: result = 3; break; // 8.0 -> 2.0 substep
5831  case 9: result = 2; break; // 9.0 -> 3.0 substep
5832  }
5833  } else
5834  {
5835  // handle cases with significantly fractional mantissa:
5836  if (qAbs(fracPart-0.5) < epsilon) // *.5 mantissa
5837  {
5838  switch (intPart)
5839  {
5840  case 1: result = 2; break; // 1.5 -> 0.5 substep
5841  case 2: result = 4; break; // 2.5 -> 0.5 substep
5842  case 3: result = 4; break; // 3.5 -> 0.7 substep
5843  case 4: result = 2; break; // 4.5 -> 1.5 substep
5844  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.5 -> 1.1 substep (won't occur with autoTickStep from here on)
5845  case 6: result = 4; break; // 6.5 -> 1.3 substep
5846  case 7: result = 2; break; // 7.5 -> 2.5 substep
5847  case 8: result = 4; break; // 8.5 -> 1.7 substep
5848  case 9: result = 4; break; // 9.5 -> 1.9 substep
5849  }
5850  }
5851  // if mantissa fraction isnt 0.0 or 0.5, don't bother finding good sub tick marks, leave default
5852  }
5853 
5854  return result;
5855 }
5856 
5857 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5858 void QCPAxis::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
5859 {
5860  Q_UNUSED(event)
5861  SelectablePart part = details.value<SelectablePart>();
5862  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(part))
5863  {
5864  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
5865  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^part : part);
5866  if (selectionStateChanged)
5867  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
5868  }
5869 }
5870 
5871 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5872 void QCPAxis::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
5873 {
5874  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
5875  setSelectedParts(mSelectedParts & ~mSelectableParts);
5876  if (selectionStateChanged)
5877  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
5878 }
5879 
5893 void QCPAxis::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
5894 {
5895  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
5896 }
5897 
5903 void QCPAxis::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
5904 {
5905  const int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick;
5906  const int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick;
5907  QVector<double> subTickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
5908  QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
5909  QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
5910  tickPositions.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
5911  tickLabels.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
5912  subTickPositions.reserve(mSubTickVector.size());
5913 
5914  if (mTicks)
5915  {
5916  for (int i=lowTick; i<=highTick; ++i)
5917  {
5918  tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
5919  if (mTickLabels)
5920  tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
5921  }
5922 
5923  if (mSubTickCount > 0)
5924  {
5925  const int subTickCount = mSubTickVector.size();
5926  for (int i=0; i<subTickCount; ++i) // no need to check bounds because subticks are always only created inside current mRange
5927  subTickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i)));
5928  }
5929  }
5930  // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it needs to draw the axis.
5931  // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct feed-through with QCPAxis setters
5932  mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
5933  mAxisPainter->basePen = getBasePen();
5934  mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
5935  mAxisPainter->labelColor = getLabelColor();
5936  mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
5937  mAxisPainter->substituteExponent = mAutoTickLabels && mNumberBeautifulPowers && mTickLabelType == ltNumber;
5938  mAxisPainter->tickPen = getTickPen();
5939  mAxisPainter->subTickPen = getSubTickPen();
5940  mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = getTickLabelFont();
5941  mAxisPainter->tickLabelColor = getTickLabelColor();
5942  mAxisPainter->axisRect = mAxisRect->rect();
5943  mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
5944  mAxisPainter->abbreviateDecimalPowers = mScaleType == stLogarithmic;
5945  mAxisPainter->reversedEndings = mRangeReversed;
5946  mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
5947  mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
5948  mAxisPainter->subTickPositions = subTickPositions;
5949  mAxisPainter->draw(painter);
5950 }
5951 
5968 void QCPAxis::visibleTickBounds(int &lowIndex, int &highIndex) const
5969 {
5970  bool lowFound = false;
5971  bool highFound = false;
5972  lowIndex = 0;
5973  highIndex = -1;
5974 
5975  for (int i=0; i < mTickVector.size(); ++i)
5976  {
5977  if (mTickVector.at(i) >= mRange.lower)
5978  {
5979  lowFound = true;
5980  lowIndex = i;
5981  break;
5982  }
5983  }
5984  for (int i=mTickVector.size()-1; i >= 0; --i)
5985  {
5986  if (mTickVector.at(i) <= mRange.upper)
5987  {
5988  highFound = true;
5989  highIndex = i;
5990  break;
5991  }
5992  }
5993 
5994  if (!lowFound && highFound)
5995  lowIndex = highIndex+1;
5996  else if (lowFound && !highFound)
5997  highIndex = lowIndex-1;
5998 }
5999 
6008 double QCPAxis::baseLog(double value) const
6009 {
6010  return qLn(value)*mScaleLogBaseLogInv;
6011 }
6012 
6020 double QCPAxis::basePow(double value) const
6021 {
6022  return qPow(mScaleLogBase, value);
6023 }
6024 
6030 QPen QCPAxis::getBasePen() const
6031 {
6032  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
6033 }
6034 
6040 QPen QCPAxis::getTickPen() const
6041 {
6042  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
6043 }
6044 
6050 QPen QCPAxis::getSubTickPen() const
6051 {
6052  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
6053 }
6054 
6060 QFont QCPAxis::getTickLabelFont() const
6061 {
6062  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
6063 }
6064 
6070 QFont QCPAxis::getLabelFont() const
6071 {
6072  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
6073 }
6074 
6080 QColor QCPAxis::getTickLabelColor() const
6081 {
6082  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
6083 }
6084 
6090 QColor QCPAxis::getLabelColor() const
6091 {
6092  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
6093 }
6094 
6109 int QCPAxis::calculateMargin()
6110 {
6111  if (!mVisible) // if not visible, directly return 0, don't cache 0 because we can't react to setVisible in QCPAxis
6112  return 0;
6113 
6114  if (mCachedMarginValid)
6115  return mCachedMargin;
6116 
6117  // run through similar steps as QCPAxis::draw, and caluclate margin needed to fit axis and its labels
6118  int margin = 0;
6119 
6120  int lowTick, highTick;
6121  visibleTickBounds(lowTick, highTick);
6122  QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
6123  QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
6124  tickPositions.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
6125  tickLabels.reserve(highTick-lowTick+1);
6126  if (mTicks)
6127  {
6128  for (int i=lowTick; i<=highTick; ++i)
6129  {
6130  tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
6131  if (mTickLabels)
6132  tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
6133  }
6134  }
6135  // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it needs to calculate the size.
6136  // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct feed-through with QCPAxis setters
6137  mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
6138  mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
6139  mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
6140  mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = mTickLabelFont;
6141  mAxisPainter->axisRect = mAxisRect->rect();
6142  mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
6143  mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
6144  mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
6145  margin += mAxisPainter->size();
6146  margin += mPadding;
6147 
6148  mCachedMargin = margin;
6149  mCachedMarginValid = true;
6150  return margin;
6151 }
6152 
6153 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6154 QCP::Interaction QCPAxis::selectionCategory() const
6155 {
6156  return QCP::iSelectAxes;
6157 }
6158 
6159 
6163 
6180 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::QCPAxisPainterPrivate(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
6181  type(QCPAxis::atLeft),
6182  basePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6183  lowerEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
6184  upperEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
6185  labelPadding(0),
6186  tickLabelPadding(0),
6187  tickLabelRotation(0),
6188  tickLabelSide(QCPAxis::lsOutside),
6189  substituteExponent(true),
6190  numberMultiplyCross(false),
6191  tickLengthIn(5),
6192  tickLengthOut(0),
6193  subTickLengthIn(2),
6194  subTickLengthOut(0),
6195  tickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6196  subTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6197  offset(0),
6198  abbreviateDecimalPowers(false),
6199  reversedEndings(false),
6200  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
6201  mLabelCache(16) // cache at most 16 (tick) labels
6202 {
6203 }
6204 
6205 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::~QCPAxisPainterPrivate()
6206 {
6207 }
6208 
6216 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
6217 {
6218  QByteArray newHash = generateLabelParameterHash();
6219  if (newHash != mLabelParameterHash)
6220  {
6221  mLabelCache.clear();
6222  mLabelParameterHash = newHash;
6223  }
6224 
6225  QPoint origin;
6226  switch (type)
6227  {
6228  case QCPAxis::atLeft: origin = axisRect.bottomLeft() +QPoint(-offset, 0); break;
6229  case QCPAxis::atRight: origin = axisRect.bottomRight()+QPoint(+offset, 0); break;
6230  case QCPAxis::atTop: origin = axisRect.topLeft() +QPoint(0, -offset); break;
6231  case QCPAxis::atBottom: origin = axisRect.bottomLeft() +QPoint(0, +offset); break;
6232  }
6233 
6234  double xCor = 0, yCor = 0; // paint system correction, for pixel exact matches (affects baselines and ticks of top/right axes)
6235  switch (type)
6236  {
6237  case QCPAxis::atTop: yCor = -1; break;
6238  case QCPAxis::atRight: xCor = 1; break;
6239  default: break;
6240  }
6241 
6242  int margin = 0;
6243  // draw baseline:
6244  QLineF baseLine;
6245  painter->setPen(basePen);
6246  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6247  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(axisRect.width()+xCor, yCor));
6248  else
6249  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(xCor, -axisRect.height()+yCor));
6250  if (reversedEndings)
6251  baseLine = QLineF(baseLine.p2(), baseLine.p1()); // won't make a difference for line itself, but for line endings later
6252  painter->drawLine(baseLine);
6253 
6254  // draw ticks:
6255  if (!tickPositions.isEmpty())
6256  {
6257  painter->setPen(tickPen);
6258  int tickDir = (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight) ? -1 : 1; // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
6259  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6260  {
6261  for (int i=0; i<tickPositions.size(); ++i)
6262  painter->drawLine(QLineF(tickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()-tickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, tickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()+tickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
6263  } else
6264  {
6265  for (int i=0; i<tickPositions.size(); ++i)
6266  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-tickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, tickPositions.at(i)+yCor, origin.x()+tickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, tickPositions.at(i)+yCor));
6267  }
6268  }
6269 
6270  // draw subticks:
6271  if (!subTickPositions.isEmpty())
6272  {
6273  painter->setPen(subTickPen);
6274  // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
6275  int tickDir = (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight) ? -1 : 1;
6276  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6277  {
6278  for (int i=0; i<subTickPositions.size(); ++i)
6279  painter->drawLine(QLineF(subTickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()-subTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, subTickPositions.at(i)+xCor, origin.y()+subTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
6280  } else
6281  {
6282  for (int i=0; i<subTickPositions.size(); ++i)
6283  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-subTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, subTickPositions.at(i)+yCor, origin.x()+subTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, subTickPositions.at(i)+yCor));
6284  }
6285  }
6286  margin += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
6287 
6288  // draw axis base endings:
6289  bool antialiasingBackup = painter->antialiasing();
6290  painter->setAntialiasing(true); // always want endings to be antialiased, even if base and ticks themselves aren't
6291  painter->setBrush(QBrush(basePen.color()));
6292  QVector2D baseLineVector(baseLine.dx(), baseLine.dy());
6293  if (lowerEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
6294  lowerEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p1())-baseLineVector.normalized()*lowerEnding.realLength()*(lowerEnding.inverted()?-1:1), -baseLineVector);
6295  if (upperEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
6296  upperEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p2())+baseLineVector.normalized()*upperEnding.realLength()*(upperEnding.inverted()?-1:1), baseLineVector);
6297  painter->setAntialiasing(antialiasingBackup);
6298 
6299  // tick labels:
6300  QRect oldClipRect;
6301  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside) // if using inside labels, clip them to the axis rect
6302  {
6303  oldClipRect = painter->clipRegion().boundingRect();
6304  painter->setClipRect(axisRect);
6305  }
6306  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0); // size of largest tick label, for offset calculation of axis label
6307  if (!tickLabels.isEmpty())
6308  {
6309  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6310  margin += tickLabelPadding;
6311  painter->setFont(tickLabelFont);
6312  painter->setPen(QPen(tickLabelColor));
6313  const int maxLabelIndex = qMin(tickPositions.size(), tickLabels.size());
6314  int distanceToAxis = margin;
6315  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)
6316  distanceToAxis = -(qMax(tickLengthIn, subTickLengthIn)+tickLabelPadding);
6317  for (int i=0; i<maxLabelIndex; ++i)
6318  placeTickLabel(painter, tickPositions.at(i), distanceToAxis, tickLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
6319  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6320  margin += (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal) ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width();
6321  }
6322  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)
6323  painter->setClipRect(oldClipRect);
6324 
6325  // axis label:
6326  QRect labelBounds;
6327  if (!label.isEmpty())
6328  {
6329  margin += labelPadding;
6330  painter->setFont(labelFont);
6331  painter->setPen(QPen(labelColor));
6332  labelBounds = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, label);
6333  if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft)
6334  {
6335  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6336  painter->translate((origin.x()-margin-labelBounds.height()), origin.y());
6337  painter->rotate(-90);
6338  painter->drawText(0, 0, axisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6339  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6340  }
6341  else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight)
6342  {
6343  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6344  painter->translate((origin.x()+margin+labelBounds.height()), origin.y()-axisRect.height());
6345  painter->rotate(90);
6346  painter->drawText(0, 0, axisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6347  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6348  }
6349  else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
6350  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()-margin-labelBounds.height(), axisRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6351  else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
6352  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()+margin, axisRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6353  }
6354 
6355  // set selection boxes:
6356  int selectionTolerance = 0;
6357  if (mParentPlot)
6358  selectionTolerance = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance();
6359  else
6360  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "mParentPlot is null";
6361  int selAxisOutSize = qMax(qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut), selectionTolerance);
6362  int selAxisInSize = selectionTolerance;
6363  int selTickLabelSize;
6364  int selTickLabelOffset;
6365  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6366  {
6367  selTickLabelSize = (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
6368  selTickLabelOffset = qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut)+tickLabelPadding;
6369  } else
6370  {
6371  selTickLabelSize = -(QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
6372  selTickLabelOffset = -(qMax(tickLengthIn, subTickLengthIn)+tickLabelPadding);
6373  }
6374  int selLabelSize = labelBounds.height();
6375  int selLabelOffset = qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut)+(!tickLabels.isEmpty() && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside ? tickLabelPadding+selTickLabelSize : 0)+labelPadding;
6376  if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft)
6377  {
6378  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisOutSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selAxisInSize, axisRect.bottom());
6379  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
6380  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()-selLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
6381  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight)
6382  {
6383  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisInSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selAxisOutSize, axisRect.bottom());
6384  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
6385  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
6386  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
6387  {
6388  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selAxisOutSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selAxisInSize);
6389  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset);
6390  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset);
6391  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
6392  {
6393  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selAxisInSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selAxisOutSize);
6394  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset);
6395  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset);
6396  }
6397  mAxisSelectionBox = mAxisSelectionBox.normalized();
6398  mTickLabelsSelectionBox = mTickLabelsSelectionBox.normalized();
6399  mLabelSelectionBox = mLabelSelectionBox.normalized();
6400  // draw hitboxes for debug purposes:
6401  //painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
6402  //painter->drawRects(QVector<QRect>() << mAxisSelectionBox << mTickLabelsSelectionBox << mLabelSelectionBox);
6403 }
6404 
6410 int QCPAxisPainterPrivate::size() const
6411 {
6412  int result = 0;
6413 
6414  // get length of tick marks pointing outwards:
6415  if (!tickPositions.isEmpty())
6416  result += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
6417 
6418  // calculate size of tick labels:
6419  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6420  {
6421  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0);
6422  if (!tickLabels.isEmpty())
6423  {
6424  for (int i=0; i<tickLabels.size(); ++i)
6425  getMaxTickLabelSize(tickLabelFont, tickLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
6426  result += QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width();
6427  result += tickLabelPadding;
6428  }
6429  }
6430 
6431  // calculate size of axis label (only height needed, because left/right labels are rotated by 90 degrees):
6432  if (!label.isEmpty())
6433  {
6434  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(labelFont);
6435  QRect bounds;
6436  bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter, label);
6437  result += bounds.height() + labelPadding;
6438  }
6439 
6440  return result;
6441 }
6442 
6449 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::clearCache()
6450 {
6451  mLabelCache.clear();
6452 }
6453 
6461 QByteArray QCPAxisPainterPrivate::generateLabelParameterHash() const
6462 {
6463  QByteArray result;
6464  result.append(QByteArray::number(tickLabelRotation));
6465  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)tickLabelSide));
6466  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)substituteExponent));
6467  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)numberMultiplyCross));
6468  result.append(tickLabelColor.name()+QByteArray::number(tickLabelColor.alpha(), 16));
6469  result.append(tickLabelFont.toString());
6470  return result;
6471 }
6472 
6492 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::placeTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double position, int distanceToAxis, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize)
6493 {
6494  // warning: if you change anything here, also adapt getMaxTickLabelSize() accordingly!
6495  if (text.isEmpty()) return;
6496  QSize finalSize;
6497  QPointF labelAnchor;
6498  switch (type)
6499  {
6500  case QCPAxis::atLeft: labelAnchor = QPointF(axisRect.left()-distanceToAxis-offset, position); break;
6501  case QCPAxis::atRight: labelAnchor = QPointF(axisRect.right()+distanceToAxis+offset, position); break;
6502  case QCPAxis::atTop: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, axisRect.top()-distanceToAxis-offset); break;
6503  case QCPAxis::atBottom: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, axisRect.bottom()+distanceToAxis+offset); break;
6504  }
6505  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching)) // label caching enabled
6506  {
6507  if (!mLabelCache.contains(text)) // no cached label exists, create it
6508  {
6509  CachedLabel *newCachedLabel = new CachedLabel;
6510  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
6511  newCachedLabel->offset = getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData)+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft();
6512  newCachedLabel->pixmap = QPixmap(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size());
6513  newCachedLabel->pixmap.fill(Qt::transparent);
6514  QCPPainter cachePainter(&newCachedLabel->pixmap);
6515  cachePainter.setPen(painter->pen());
6516  drawTickLabel(&cachePainter, -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().x(), -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().y(), labelData);
6517  mLabelCache.insert(text, newCachedLabel, 1);
6518  }
6519  // draw cached label:
6520  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
6521  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it (only for outside tick labels):
6522  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6523  {
6524  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6525  {
6526  if (labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x()+cachedLabel->pixmap.width() > viewportRect.right() ||
6527  labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x() < viewportRect.left())
6528  return;
6529  } else
6530  {
6531  if (labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y()+cachedLabel->pixmap.height() >viewportRect.bottom() ||
6532  labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y() < viewportRect.top())
6533  return;
6534  }
6535  }
6536  painter->drawPixmap(labelAnchor+cachedLabel->offset, cachedLabel->pixmap);
6537  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
6538  } else // label caching disabled, draw text directly on surface:
6539  {
6540  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
6541  QPointF finalPosition = labelAnchor + getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
6542  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it (only for outside tick labels):
6543  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6544  {
6545  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6546  {
6547  if (finalPosition.x()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.width()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left()) > viewportRect.right() ||
6548  finalPosition.x()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left() < viewportRect.left())
6549  return;
6550  } else
6551  {
6552  if (finalPosition.y()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.height()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top()) > viewportRect.bottom() ||
6553  finalPosition.y()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top() < viewportRect.top())
6554  return;
6555  }
6556  }
6557  drawTickLabel(painter, finalPosition.x(), finalPosition.y(), labelData);
6558  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
6559  }
6560 
6561  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
6562  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
6563  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
6564  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
6565  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
6566 }
6567 
6577 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::drawTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const TickLabelData &labelData) const
6578 {
6579  // backup painter settings that we're about to change:
6580  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6581  QFont oldFont = painter->font();
6582 
6583  // transform painter to position/rotation:
6584  painter->translate(x, y);
6585  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation))
6586  painter->rotate(tickLabelRotation);
6587 
6588  // draw text:
6589  if (!labelData.expPart.isEmpty()) // indicator that beautiful powers must be used
6590  {
6591  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
6592  painter->drawText(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.basePart);
6593  painter->setFont(labelData.expFont);
6594  painter->drawText(labelData.baseBounds.width()+1, 0, labelData.expBounds.width(), labelData.expBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.expPart);
6595  } else
6596  {
6597  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
6598  painter->drawText(0, 0, labelData.totalBounds.width(), labelData.totalBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, labelData.basePart);
6599  }
6600 
6601  // reset painter settings to what it was before:
6602  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6603  painter->setFont(oldFont);
6604 }
6605 
6614 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::TickLabelData QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelData(const QFont &font, const QString &text) const
6615 {
6616  TickLabelData result;
6617 
6618  // determine whether beautiful decimal powers should be used
6619  bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
6620  int ePos = -1;
6621  if (substituteExponent)
6622  {
6623  ePos = text.indexOf('e');
6624  if (ePos > -1)
6625  useBeautifulPowers = true;
6626  }
6627 
6628  // calculate text bounding rects and do string preparation for beautiful decimal powers:
6629  result.baseFont = font;
6630  if (result.baseFont.pointSizeF() > 0) // On some rare systems, this sometimes is initialized with -1 (Qt bug?), so we check here before possibly setting a negative value in the next line
6631  result.baseFont.setPointSizeF(result.baseFont.pointSizeF()+0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug for exact point sizes that make the results oscillate due to internal rounding
6632  if (useBeautifulPowers)
6633  {
6634  // split text into parts of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and part that will be drawn as exponent:
6635  result.basePart = text.left(ePos);
6636  // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add multiplication sign and decimal base:
6637  if (abbreviateDecimalPowers && result.basePart == "1")
6638  result.basePart = "10";
6639  else
6640  result.basePart += (numberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) + "10";
6641  result.expPart = text.mid(ePos+1);
6642  // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
6643  while (result.expPart.length() > 2 && result.expPart.at(1) == '0') // length > 2 so we leave one zero when numberFormatChar is 'e'
6644  result.expPart.remove(1, 1);
6645  if (!result.expPart.isEmpty() && result.expPart.at(0) == '+')
6646  result.expPart.remove(0, 1);
6647  // prepare smaller font for exponent:
6648  result.expFont = font;
6649  result.expFont.setPointSize(result.expFont.pointSize()*0.75);
6650  // calculate bounding rects of base part, exponent part and total one:
6651  result.baseBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.basePart);
6652  result.expBounds = QFontMetrics(result.expFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.expPart);
6653  result.totalBounds = result.baseBounds.adjusted(0, 0, result.expBounds.width()+2, 0); // +2 consists of the 1 pixel spacing between base and exponent (see drawTickLabel) and an extra pixel to include AA
6654  } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
6655  {
6656  result.basePart = text;
6657  result.totalBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, result.basePart);
6658  }
6659  result.totalBounds.moveTopLeft(QPoint(0, 0)); // want bounding box aligned top left at origin, independent of how it was created, to make further processing simpler
6660 
6661  // calculate possibly different bounding rect after rotation:
6662  result.rotatedTotalBounds = result.totalBounds;
6663  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation))
6664  {
6665  QTransform transform;
6666  transform.rotate(tickLabelRotation);
6667  result.rotatedTotalBounds = transform.mapRect(result.rotatedTotalBounds);
6668  }
6669 
6670  return result;
6671 }
6672 
6683 QPointF QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelDrawOffset(const TickLabelData &labelData) const
6684 {
6685  /*
6686  calculate label offset from base point at tick (non-trivial, for best visual appearance): short
6687  explanation for bottom axis: The anchor, i.e. the point in the label that is placed
6688  horizontally under the corresponding tick is always on the label side that is closer to the
6689  axis (e.g. the left side of the text when we're rotating clockwise). On that side, the height
6690  is halved and the resulting point is defined the anchor. This way, a 90 degree rotated text
6691  will be centered under the tick (i.e. displaced horizontally by half its height). At the same
6692  time, a 45 degree rotated text will "point toward" its tick, as is typical for rotated tick
6693  labels.
6694  */
6695  bool doRotation = !qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation);
6696  bool flip = qFuzzyCompare(qAbs(tickLabelRotation), 90.0); // perfect +/-90 degree flip. Indicates vertical label centering on vertical axes.
6697  double radians = tickLabelRotation/180.0*M_PI;
6698  int x=0, y=0;
6699  if ((type == QCPAxis::atLeft && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atRight && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at right side of tick label
6700  {
6701  if (doRotation)
6702  {
6703  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6704  {
6705  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6706  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6707  } else
6708  {
6709  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6710  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6711  }
6712  } else
6713  {
6714  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width();
6715  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6716  }
6717  } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atRight && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atLeft && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at left side of tick label
6718  {
6719  if (doRotation)
6720  {
6721  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6722  {
6723  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6724  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6725  } else
6726  {
6727  x = 0;
6728  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6729  }
6730  } else
6731  {
6732  x = 0;
6733  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6734  }
6735  } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atTop && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at bottom side of tick label
6736  {
6737  if (doRotation)
6738  {
6739  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6740  {
6741  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()+qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6742  y = -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6743  } else
6744  {
6745  x = -qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6746  y = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6747  }
6748  } else
6749  {
6750  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6751  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height();
6752  }
6753  } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atBottom && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atTop && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at top side of tick label
6754  {
6755  if (doRotation)
6756  {
6757  if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
6758  {
6759  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6760  y = 0;
6761  } else
6762  {
6763  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6764  y = +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6765  }
6766  } else
6767  {
6768  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6769  y = 0;
6770  }
6771  }
6772 
6773  return QPointF(x, y);
6774 }
6775 
6783 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getMaxTickLabelSize(const QFont &font, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize) const
6784 {
6785  // note: this function must return the same tick label sizes as the placeTickLabel function.
6786  QSize finalSize;
6787  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && mLabelCache.contains(text)) // label caching enabled and have cached label
6788  {
6789  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
6790  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
6791  } else // label caching disabled or no label with this text cached:
6792  {
6793  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(font, text);
6794  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
6795  }
6796 
6797  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
6798  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
6799  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
6800  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
6801  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
6802 }
6803 
6804 
6808 
6877 /* start of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6878 
6924 /* end of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6925 /* start of documentation of signals */
6926 
6940 /* end of documentation of signals */
6941 
6953 QCPAbstractPlottable::QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
6954  QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot(), "", keyAxis->axisRect()),
6955  mName(""),
6956  mAntialiasedFill(true),
6957  mAntialiasedScatters(true),
6958  mAntialiasedErrorBars(false),
6959  mPen(Qt::black),
6960  mSelectedPen(Qt::black),
6961  mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6962  mSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6963  mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
6964  mValueAxis(valueAxis),
6965  mSelectable(true),
6966  mSelected(false)
6967 {
6968  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
6969  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
6970  if (keyAxis->orientation() == valueAxis->orientation())
6971  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keyAxis and valueAxis must be orthogonal to each other.";
6972 }
6973 
6978 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setName(const QString &name)
6979 {
6980  mName = name;
6981 }
6982 
6989 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedFill(bool enabled)
6990 {
6991  mAntialiasedFill = enabled;
6992 }
6993 
7000 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedScatters(bool enabled)
7001 {
7002  mAntialiasedScatters = enabled;
7003 }
7004 
7011 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedErrorBars(bool enabled)
7012 {
7013  mAntialiasedErrorBars = enabled;
7014 }
7015 
7016 
7026 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setPen(const QPen &pen)
7027 {
7028  mPen = pen;
7029 }
7030 
7037 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
7038 {
7039  mSelectedPen = pen;
7040 }
7041 
7051 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
7052 {
7053  mBrush = brush;
7054 }
7055 
7062 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
7063 {
7064  mSelectedBrush = brush;
7065 }
7066 
7078 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setKeyAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
7079 {
7080  mKeyAxis = axis;
7081 }
7082 
7094 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setValueAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
7095 {
7096  mValueAxis = axis;
7097 }
7098 
7108 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectable(bool selectable)
7109 {
7110  if (mSelectable != selectable)
7111  {
7112  mSelectable = selectable;
7113  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
7114  }
7115 }
7116 
7131 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelected(bool selected)
7132 {
7133  if (mSelected != selected)
7134  {
7135  mSelected = selected;
7136  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
7137  }
7138 }
7139 
7153 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const
7154 {
7155  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
7156  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
7157 }
7158 
7164 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
7165 {
7166  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7167  if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
7168 
7169  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
7170  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
7171  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
7172 
7173  bool foundRange;
7174  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain);
7175  if (foundRange)
7176  {
7177  if (onlyEnlarge)
7178  newRange.expand(keyAxis->range());
7179  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
7180  {
7181  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
7182  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
7183  {
7184  newRange.lower = center-keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7185  newRange.upper = center+keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7186  } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
7187  {
7188  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper/keyAxis->range().lower);
7189  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper/keyAxis->range().lower);
7190  }
7191  }
7192  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
7193  }
7194 }
7195 
7204 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
7205 {
7206  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7207  if (!valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis"; return; }
7208 
7209  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
7210  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
7211  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
7212 
7213  bool foundRange;
7214  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain);
7215  if (foundRange)
7216  {
7217  if (onlyEnlarge)
7218  newRange.expand(valueAxis->range());
7219  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
7220  {
7221  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
7222  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
7223  {
7224  newRange.lower = center-valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7225  newRange.upper = center+valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
7226  } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
7227  {
7228  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
7229  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
7230  }
7231  }
7232  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
7233  }
7234 }
7235 
7248 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend()
7249 {
7250  if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
7251  return false;
7252 
7253  if (!mParentPlot->legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this))
7254  {
7255  mParentPlot->legend->addItem(new QCPPlottableLegendItem(mParentPlot->legend, this));
7256  return true;
7257  } else
7258  return false;
7259 }
7260 
7271 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend() const
7272 {
7273  if (!mParentPlot->legend)
7274  return false;
7275 
7276  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *lip = mParentPlot->legend->itemWithPlottable(this))
7277  return mParentPlot->legend->removeItem(lip);
7278  else
7279  return false;
7280 }
7281 
7282 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7283 QRect QCPAbstractPlottable::clipRect() const
7284 {
7285  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7286  return mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect() & mValueAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect();
7287  else
7288  return QRect();
7289 }
7290 
7291 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7292 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractPlottable::selectionCategory() const
7293 {
7294  return QCP::iSelectPlottables;
7295 }
7296 
7307 void QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const
7308 {
7309  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7310  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7311  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
7312 
7313  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7314  {
7315  x = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
7316  y = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
7317  } else
7318  {
7319  y = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
7320  x = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
7321  }
7322 }
7323 
7329 const QPointF QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const
7330 {
7331  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7332  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7333  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
7334 
7335  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7336  return QPointF(keyAxis->coordToPixel(key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(value));
7337  else
7338  return QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(key));
7339 }
7340 
7351 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key, double &value) const
7352 {
7353  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7354  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7355  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
7356 
7357  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7358  {
7359  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
7360  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
7361  } else
7362  {
7363  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
7364  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
7365  }
7366 }
7367 
7373 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key, double &value) const
7374 {
7375  pixelsToCoords(pixelPos.x(), pixelPos.y(), key, value);
7376 }
7377 
7383 QPen QCPAbstractPlottable::mainPen() const
7384 {
7385  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
7386 }
7387 
7393 QBrush QCPAbstractPlottable::mainBrush() const
7394 {
7395  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
7396 }
7397

7412 {
7413  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aePlottables);
7414 }
7415 
7427 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyFillAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7428 {
7429  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedFill, QCP::aeFills);
7430 }
