7444 {
7445  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedScatters, QCP::aeScatters);
7446 }
7447 
7459 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7460 {
7461  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedErrorBars, QCP::aeErrorBars);
7462 }
7463 
7474 double QCPAbstractPlottable::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
7475 {
7476  QVector2D a(start);
7477  QVector2D b(end);
7478  QVector2D p(point);
7479  QVector2D v(b-a);
7480 
7481  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
7482  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
7483  {
7484  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
7485  if (mu < 0)
7486  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7487  else if (mu > 1)
7488  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
7489  else
7490  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
7491  } else
7492  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7493 }
7494 
7495 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7496 void QCPAbstractPlottable::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
7497 {
7498  Q_UNUSED(event)
7499  Q_UNUSED(details)
7500  if (mSelectable)
7501  {
7502  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7503  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
7504  if (selectionStateChanged)
7505  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7506  }
7507 }
7508 
7509 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7510 void QCPAbstractPlottable::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
7511 {
7512  if (mSelectable)
7513  {
7514  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7515  setSelected(false);
7516  if (selectionStateChanged)
7517  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7518  }
7519 }
7520 
7521 
7525 
7547 /* start documentation of inline functions */
7548 
7559 /* end documentation of inline functions */
7560 
7566 QCPItemAnchor::QCPItemAnchor(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name, int anchorId) :
7567  mName(name),
7568  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
7569  mParentItem(parentItem),
7570  mAnchorId(anchorId)
7571 {
7572 }
7573 
7574 QCPItemAnchor::~QCPItemAnchor()
7575 {
7576  // unregister as parent at children:
7577  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenX.toList())
7578  {
7579  if (child->parentAnchorX() == this)
7580  child->setParentAnchorX(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenX
7581  }
7582  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenY.toList())
7583  {
7584  if (child->parentAnchorY() == this)
7585  child->setParentAnchorY(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenY
7586  }
7587 }
7588 
7595 QPointF QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint() const
7596 {
7597  if (mParentItem)
7598  {
7599  if (mAnchorId > -1)
7600  {
7601  return mParentItem->anchorPixelPoint(mAnchorId);
7602  } else
7603  {
7604  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no valid anchor id set:" << mAnchorId;
7605  return QPointF();
7606  }
7607  } else
7608  {
7609  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent item set";
7610  return QPointF();
7611  }
7612 }
7613 
7622 void QCPItemAnchor::addChildX(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7623 {
7624  if (!mChildrenX.contains(pos))
7625  mChildrenX.insert(pos);
7626  else
7627  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7628 }
7629 
7636 void QCPItemAnchor::removeChildX(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7637 {
7638  if (!mChildrenX.remove(pos))
7639  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7640 }
7641 
7650 void QCPItemAnchor::addChildY(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7651 {
7652  if (!mChildrenY.contains(pos))
7653  mChildrenY.insert(pos);
7654  else
7655  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7656 }
7657 
7664 void QCPItemAnchor::removeChildY(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7665 {
7666  if (!mChildrenY.remove(pos))
7667  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7668 }
7669 
7670 
7674 
7709 /* start documentation of inline functions */
7710 
7732 /* end documentation of inline functions */
7733 
7739 QCPItemPosition::QCPItemPosition(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name) :
7740  QCPItemAnchor(parentPlot, parentItem, name),
7741  mPositionTypeX(ptAbsolute),
7742  mPositionTypeY(ptAbsolute),
7743  mKey(0),
7744  mValue(0),
7745  mParentAnchorX(0),
7746  mParentAnchorY(0)
7747 {
7748 }
7749 
7750 QCPItemPosition::~QCPItemPosition()
7751 {
7752  // unregister as parent at children:
7753  // Note: this is done in ~QCPItemAnchor again, but it's important QCPItemPosition does it itself, because only then
7754  // the setParentAnchor(0) call the correct QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint function instead of QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint
7755  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenX.toList())
7756  {
7757  if (child->parentAnchorX() == this)
7758  child->setParentAnchorX(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenX
7759  }
7760  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenY.toList())
7761  {
7762  if (child->parentAnchorY() == this)
7763  child->setParentAnchorY(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenY
7764  }
7765  // unregister as child in parent:
7766  if (mParentAnchorX)
7767  mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
7768  if (mParentAnchorY)
7769  mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
7770 }
7771 
7772 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
7773 QCPAxisRect *QCPItemPosition::axisRect() const
7774 {
7775  return mAxisRect.data();
7776 }
7777 
7803 void QCPItemPosition::setType(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
7804 {
7805  setTypeX(type);
7806  setTypeY(type);
7807 }
7808 
7816 void QCPItemPosition::setTypeX(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
7817 {
7818  if (mPositionTypeX != type)
7819  {
7820  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
7821  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPoint() because it would output a qDebug warning.
7822  bool retainPixelPosition = true;
7823  if ((mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
7824  retainPixelPosition = false;
7825  if ((mPositionTypeX == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
7826  retainPixelPosition = false;
7827 
7828  QPointF pixel;
7829  if (retainPixelPosition)
7830  pixel = pixelPoint();
7831 
7832  mPositionTypeX = type;
7833 
7834  if (retainPixelPosition)
7835  setPixelPoint(pixel);
7836  }
7837 }
7838 
7846 void QCPItemPosition::setTypeY(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
7847 {
7848  if (mPositionTypeY != type)
7849  {
7850  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
7851  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPoint() because it would output a qDebug warning.
7852  bool retainPixelPosition = true;
7853  if ((mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
7854  retainPixelPosition = false;
7855  if ((mPositionTypeY == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
7856  retainPixelPosition = false;
7857 
7858  QPointF pixel;
7859  if (retainPixelPosition)
7860  pixel = pixelPoint();
7861 
7862  mPositionTypeY = type;
7863 
7864  if (retainPixelPosition)
7865  setPixelPoint(pixel);
7866  }
7867 }
7868 
7887 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchor(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
7888 {
7889  bool successX = setParentAnchorX(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
7890  bool successY = setParentAnchorY(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
7891  return successX && successY;
7892 }
7893 
7901 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorX(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
7902 {
7903  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
7904  if (parentAnchor == this)
7905  {
7906  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7907  return false;
7908  }
7909  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
7910  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
7911  while (currentParent)
7912  {
7913  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
7914  {
7915  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
7916  if (currentParentPos == this)
7917  {
7918  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7919  return false;
7920  }
7921  currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorX();
7922  } else
7923  {
7924  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
7925  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
7926  // because they're both on the same item:
7927  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
7928  {
7929  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7930  return false;
7931  }
7932  break;
7933  }
7934  }
7935 
7936  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
7937  if (!mParentAnchorX && mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords)
7938  setTypeX(ptAbsolute);
7939 
7940  // save pixel position:
7941  QPointF pixelP;
7942  if (keepPixelPosition)
7943  pixelP = pixelPoint();
7944  // unregister at current parent anchor:
7945  if (mParentAnchorX)
7946  mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
7947  // register at new parent anchor:
7948  if (parentAnchor)
7949  parentAnchor->addChildX(this);
7950  mParentAnchorX = parentAnchor;
7951  // restore pixel position under new parent:
7952  if (keepPixelPosition)
7953  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
7954  else
7955  setCoords(0, coords().y());
7956  return true;
7957 }
7958 
7966 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorY(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
7967 {
7968  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
7969  if (parentAnchor == this)
7970  {
7971  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7972  return false;
7973  }
7974  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
7975  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
7976  while (currentParent)
7977  {
7978  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
7979  {
7980  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
7981  if (currentParentPos == this)
7982  {
7983  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7984  return false;
7985  }
7986  currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorY();
7987  } else
7988  {
7989  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
7990  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
7991  // because they're both on the same item:
7992  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
7993  {
7994  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7995  return false;
7996  }
7997  break;
7998  }
7999  }
8000 
8001  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
8002  if (!mParentAnchorY && mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords)
8003  setTypeY(ptAbsolute);
8004 
8005  // save pixel position:
8006  QPointF pixelP;
8007  if (keepPixelPosition)
8008  pixelP = pixelPoint();
8009  // unregister at current parent anchor:
8010  if (mParentAnchorY)
8011  mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
8012  // register at new parent anchor:
8013  if (parentAnchor)
8014  parentAnchor->addChildY(this);
8015  mParentAnchorY = parentAnchor;
8016  // restore pixel position under new parent:
8017  if (keepPixelPosition)
8018  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
8019  else
8020  setCoords(coords().x(), 0);
8021  return true;
8022 }
8023 
8041 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(double key, double value)
8042 {
8043  mKey = key;
8044  mValue = value;
8045 }
8046 
8052 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(const QPointF &pos)
8053 {
8054  setCoords(pos.x(), pos.y());
8055 }
8056 
8063 QPointF QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint() const
8064 {
8065  QPointF result;
8066 
8067  // determine X:
8068  switch (mPositionTypeX)
8069  {
8070  case ptAbsolute:
8071  {
8072  result.rx() = mKey;
8073  if (mParentAnchorX)
8074  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8075  break;
8076  }
8077  case ptViewportRatio:
8078  {
8079  result.rx() = mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width();
8080  if (mParentAnchorX)
8081  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8082  else
8083  result.rx() += mParentPlot->viewport().left();
8084  break;
8085  }
8086  case ptAxisRectRatio:
8087  {
8088  if (mAxisRect)
8089  {
8090  result.rx() = mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width();
8091  if (mParentAnchorX)
8092  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8093  else
8094  result.rx() += mAxisRect.data()->left();
8095  } else
8096  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
8097  break;
8098  }
8099  case ptPlotCoords:
8100  {
8101  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8102  result.rx() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
8103  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8104  result.rx() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
8105  else
8106  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8107  break;
8108  }
8109  }
8110 
8111  // determine Y:
8112  switch (mPositionTypeY)
8113  {
8114  case ptAbsolute:
8115  {
8116  result.ry() = mValue;
8117  if (mParentAnchorY)
8118  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8119  break;
8120  }
8121  case ptViewportRatio:
8122  {
8123  result.ry() = mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height();
8124  if (mParentAnchorY)
8125  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8126  else
8127  result.ry() += mParentPlot->viewport().top();
8128  break;
8129  }
8130  case ptAxisRectRatio:
8131  {
8132  if (mAxisRect)
8133  {
8134  result.ry() = mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height();
8135  if (mParentAnchorY)
8136  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8137  else
8138  result.ry() += mAxisRect.data()->top();
8139  } else
8140  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
8141  break;
8142  }
8143  case ptPlotCoords:
8144  {
8145  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8146  result.ry() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
8147  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8148  result.ry() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
8149  else
8150  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8151  break;
8152  }
8153  }
8154 
8155  return result;
8156 }
8157 
8163 void QCPItemPosition::setAxes(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
8164 {
8165  mKeyAxis = keyAxis;
8166  mValueAxis = valueAxis;
8167 }
8168 
8174 void QCPItemPosition::setAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *axisRect)
8175 {
8176  mAxisRect = axisRect;
8177 }
8178 
8189 void QCPItemPosition::setPixelPoint(const QPointF &pixelPoint)
8190 {
8191  double x = pixelPoint.x();
8192  double y = pixelPoint.y();
8193 
8194  switch (mPositionTypeX)
8195  {
8196  case ptAbsolute:
8197  {
8198  if (mParentAnchorX)
8199  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8200  break;
8201  }
8202  case ptViewportRatio:
8203  {
8204  if (mParentAnchorX)
8205  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8206  else
8207  x -= mParentPlot->viewport().left();
8208  x /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
8209  break;
8210  }
8211  case ptAxisRectRatio:
8212  {
8213  if (mAxisRect)
8214  {
8215  if (mParentAnchorX)
8216  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8217  else
8218  x -= mAxisRect.data()->left();
8219  x /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
8220  } else
8221  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
8222  break;
8223  }
8224  case ptPlotCoords:
8225  {
8226  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8227  x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
8228  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8229  y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
8230  else
8231  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8232  break;
8233  }
8234  }
8235 
8236  switch (mPositionTypeY)
8237  {
8238  case ptAbsolute:
8239  {
8240  if (mParentAnchorY)
8241  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8242  break;
8243  }
8244  case ptViewportRatio:
8245  {
8246  if (mParentAnchorY)
8247  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8248  else
8249  y -= mParentPlot->viewport().top();
8250  y /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
8251  break;
8252  }
8253  case ptAxisRectRatio:
8254  {
8255  if (mAxisRect)
8256  {
8257  if (mParentAnchorY)
8258  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8259  else
8260  y -= mAxisRect.data()->top();
8261  y /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
8262  } else
8263  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
8264  break;
8265  }
8266  case ptPlotCoords:
8267  {
8268  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8269  x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
8270  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8271  y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
8272  else
8273  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8274  break;
8275  }
8276  }
8277 
8278  setCoords(x, y);
8279 }
8280 
8281 
8285 
8425 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
8426 
8442 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
8443 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
8444 
8455 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
8456 /* start documentation of signals */
8457 
8463 /* end documentation of signals */
8464 
8468 QCPAbstractItem::QCPAbstractItem(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
8469  QCPLayerable(parentPlot),
8470  mClipToAxisRect(false),
8471  mSelectable(true),
8472  mSelected(false)
8473 {
8474  QList<QCPAxisRect*> rects = parentPlot->axisRects();
8475  if (rects.size() > 0)
8476  {
8477  setClipToAxisRect(true);
8478  setClipAxisRect(rects.first());
8479  }
8480 }
8481 
8482 QCPAbstractItem::~QCPAbstractItem()
8483 {
8484  // don't delete mPositions because every position is also an anchor and thus in mAnchors
8485  qDeleteAll(mAnchors);
8486 }
8487 
8488 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
8489 QCPAxisRect *QCPAbstractItem::clipAxisRect() const
8490 {
8491  return mClipAxisRect.data();
8492 }
8493 
8500 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipToAxisRect(bool clip)
8501 {
8502  mClipToAxisRect = clip;
8503  if (mClipToAxisRect)
8504  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
8505 }
8506 
8513 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *rect)
8514 {
8515  mClipAxisRect = rect;
8516  if (mClipToAxisRect)
8517  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
8518 }
8519 
8529 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
8530 {
8531  if (mSelectable != selectable)
8532  {
8533  mSelectable = selectable;
8534  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
8535  }
8536 }
8537 
8552 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelected(bool selected)
8553 {
8554  if (mSelected != selected)
8555  {
8556  mSelected = selected;
8557  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
8558  }
8559 }
8560 
8571 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::position(const QString &name) const
8572 {
8573  for (int i=0; i<mPositions.size(); ++i)
8574  {
8575  if (mPositions.at(i)->name() == name)
8576  return mPositions.at(i);
8577  }
8578  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "position with name not found:" << name;
8579  return 0;
8580 }
8581 
8592 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::anchor(const QString &name) const
8593 {
8594  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
8595  {
8596  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
8597  return mAnchors.at(i);
8598  }
8599  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor with name not found:" << name;
8600  return 0;
8601 }
8602 
8611 bool QCPAbstractItem::hasAnchor(const QString &name) const
8612 {
8613  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
8614  {
8615  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
8616  return true;
8617  }
8618  return false;
8619 }
8620 
8630 QRect QCPAbstractItem::clipRect() const
8631 {
8632  if (mClipToAxisRect && mClipAxisRect)
8633  return mClipAxisRect.data()->rect();
8634  else
8635  return mParentPlot->viewport();
8636 }
8637 
8651 void QCPAbstractItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
8652 {
8653  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeItems);
8654 }
8655 
8668 double QCPAbstractItem::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
8669 {
8670  QVector2D a(start);
8671  QVector2D b(end);
8672  QVector2D p(point);
8673  QVector2D v(b-a);
8674 
8675  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
8676  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
8677  {
8678  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
8679  if (mu < 0)
8680  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
8681  else if (mu > 1)
8682  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
8683  else
8684  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
8685  } else
8686  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
8687 }
8688 
8706 double QCPAbstractItem::rectSelectTest(const QRectF &rect, const QPointF &pos, bool filledRect) const
8707 {
8708  double result = -1;
8709 
8710  // distance to border:
8711  QList<QLineF> lines;
8712  lines << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.topRight()) << QLineF(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.bottomRight())
8713  << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.bottomLeft()) << QLineF(rect.topRight(), rect.bottomRight());
8714  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
8715  for (int i=0; i<lines.size(); ++i)
8716  {
8717  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(lines.at(i).p1(), lines.at(i).p2(), pos);
8718  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
8719  minDistSqr = distSqr;
8720  }
8721  result = qSqrt(minDistSqr);
8722 
8723  // filled rect, allow click inside to count as hit:
8724  if (filledRect && result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99)
8725  {
8726  if (rect.contains(pos))
8727  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
8728  }
8729  return result;
8730 }
8731 
8742 QPointF QCPAbstractItem::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
8743 {
8744  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called on item which shouldn't have any anchors (this method not reimplemented). anchorId" << anchorId;
8745  return QPointF();
8746 }
8747 
8762 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::createPosition(const QString &name)
8763 {
8764  if (hasAnchor(name))
8765  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8766  QCPItemPosition *newPosition = new QCPItemPosition(mParentPlot, this, name);
8767  mPositions.append(newPosition);
8768  mAnchors.append(newPosition); // every position is also an anchor
8769  newPosition->setAxes(mParentPlot->xAxis, mParentPlot->yAxis);
8770  newPosition->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
8771  if (mParentPlot->axisRect())
8772  newPosition->setAxisRect(mParentPlot->axisRect());
8773  newPosition->setCoords(0, 0);
8774  return newPosition;
8775 }
8776 
8796 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::createAnchor(const QString &name, int anchorId)
8797 {
8798  if (hasAnchor(name))
8799  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8800  QCPItemAnchor *newAnchor = new QCPItemAnchor(mParentPlot, this, name, anchorId);
8801  mAnchors.append(newAnchor);
8802  return newAnchor;
8803 }
8804 
8805 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8806 void QCPAbstractItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
8807 {
8808  Q_UNUSED(event)
8809  Q_UNUSED(details)
8810  if (mSelectable)
8811  {
8812  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8813  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
8814  if (selectionStateChanged)
8815  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8816  }
8817 }
8818 
8819 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8820 void QCPAbstractItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
8821 {
8822  if (mSelectable)
8823  {
8824  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8825  setSelected(false);
8826  if (selectionStateChanged)
8827  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8828  }
8829 }
8830 
8831 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8832 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractItem::selectionCategory() const
8833 {
8834  return QCP::iSelectItems;
8835 }

9044 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
9045 
9067 /* end of documentation of inline functions */

9069 
9257 /* end of documentation of signals */
9258 /* start of documentation of public members */
9259 
9331 /* end of documentation of public members */
9332 
9336 QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent) :
9337  QWidget(parent),
9338  xAxis(0),
9339  yAxis(0),
9340  xAxis2(0),
9341  yAxis2(0),
9342  legend(0),
9343  mPlotLayout(0),
9344  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true),
9345  mAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
9346  mNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
9347  mInteractions(0),
9348  mSelectionTolerance(8),
9349  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false),
9350  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::white, Qt::SolidPattern),
9351  mBackgroundScaled(true),
9352  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
9353  mCurrentLayer(0),
9354  mPlottingHints(QCP::phCacheLabels|QCP::phForceRepaint),
9355  mMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier),
9356  mPaintBuffer(size()),
9357  mMouseEventElement(0),
9358  mReplotting(false)
9359 {
9360  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
9361  setAttribute(Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent);
9362  setMouseTracking(true);
9363  QLocale currentLocale = locale();
9364  currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
9365  setLocale(currentLocale);
9366 
9367  // create initial layers:
9368  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "background"));
9369  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "grid"));
9370  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "main"));
9371  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "axes"));
9372  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "legend"));
9373  updateLayerIndices();
9374  setCurrentLayer("main");
9375 
9376  // create initial layout, axis rect and legend:
9377  mPlotLayout = new QCPLayoutGrid;
9378  mPlotLayout->initializeParentPlot(this);
9379  mPlotLayout->setParent(this); // important because if parent is QWidget, QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged will call QWidget::updateGeometry
9380  mPlotLayout->setLayer("main");
9381  QCPAxisRect *defaultAxisRect = new QCPAxisRect(this, true);
9382  mPlotLayout->addElement(0, 0, defaultAxisRect);
9383  xAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
9384  yAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
9385  xAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
9386  yAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
9387  legend = new QCPLegend;
9388  legend->setVisible(false);
9389  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->addElement(legend, Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
9390  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->setMargins(QMargins(12, 12, 12, 12));
9391 
9392  defaultAxisRect->setLayer("background");
9393  xAxis->setLayer("axes");
9394  yAxis->setLayer("axes");
9395  xAxis2->setLayer("axes");
9396  yAxis2->setLayer("axes");
9397  xAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9398  yAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9399  xAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9400  yAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
9401  legend->setLayer("legend");
9402 
9403  setViewport(rect()); // needs to be called after mPlotLayout has been created
9404 
9405  replot();
9406 }
9407 
9408 QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot()
9409 {
9410  try
9411  {
9412 
9413  clearPlottables();
9414  clearItems();
9415 
9416  if (mPlotLayout)
9417  {
9418  delete mPlotLayout;
9419  mPlotLayout = 0;
9420  }
9421 
9422  mCurrentLayer = 0;
9423  qDeleteAll(mLayers); // don't use removeLayer, because it would prevent the last layer to be removed
9424  mLayers.clear();
9425  }
9426  catch(std::exception& e)
9427  {
9428  }
9429 }
9430 
9448 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements)
9449 {
9450  mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
9451 
9452  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9453  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9454  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
9455 }
9456 
9464 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled)
9465 {
9466  if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
9467  mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
9468  else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
9469  mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
9470 
9471  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9472  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9473  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
9474 }
9475 
9494 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements)
9495 {
9496  mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
9497 
9498  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9499  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9500  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
9501 }
9502 
9510 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled)
9511 {
9512  if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
9513  mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
9514  else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
9515  mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
9516 
9517  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
9518  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
9519  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
9520 }
9521 
9528 void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on)
9529 {
9530  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
9531 }
9532 
9587 void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const QCP::Interactions &interactions)
9588 {
9589  mInteractions = interactions;
9590 }
9591 
9599 void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCP::Interaction &interaction, bool enabled)
9600 {
9601  if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
9602  mInteractions &= ~interaction;
9603  else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
9604  mInteractions |= interaction;
9605 }

9622  mSelectionTolerance = pixels;
9623 }

9635 {
9636  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
9637 }

9644 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints)
9645 {
9646  mPlottingHints = hints;
9647 }
9648 
9654 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled)
9655 {
9656  QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
9657  if (!enabled)
9658  newHints &= ~hint;
9659  else
9660  newHints |= hint;
9661 
9662  if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
9663  setPlottingHints(newHints);
9664 }
9665 
9676 void QCustomPlot::setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::KeyboardModifier modifier)
9677 {
9678  mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
9679 }
9680 
9688 void QCustomPlot::setViewport(const QRect &rect)
9689 {
9690  mViewport = rect;
9691  if (mPlotLayout)
9692  mPlotLayout->setOuterRect(mViewport);
9693 }
