9773 }
9774 
9783 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable(int index)
9784 {
9785  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
9786  {
9787  return mPlottables.at(index);
9788  } else
9789  {
9790  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9791  return 0;
9792  }
9793 }
9794 
9802 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable()
9803 {
9804  if (!mPlottables.isEmpty())
9805  {
9806  return mPlottables.last();
9807  } else
9808  return 0;
9809 }
9810 
9821 bool QCustomPlot::addPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
9822 {
9823  if (mPlottables.contains(plottable))
9824  {
9825  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9826  return false;
9827  }
9828  if (plottable->parentPlot() != this)
9829  {
9830  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9831  return false;
9832  }
9833 
9834  mPlottables.append(plottable);
9835  // possibly add plottable to legend:
9836  if (mAutoAddPlottableToLegend)
9837  plottable->addToLegend();
9838  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
9839  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
9840  mGraphs.append(graph);
9841  if (!plottable->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable constructor)
9842  plottable->setLayer(currentLayer());
9843  return true;
9844 }
9845 
9853 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
9854 {
9855  if (!mPlottables.contains(plottable))
9856  {
9857  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
9858  return false;
9859  }
9860 
9861  // remove plottable from legend:
9862  plottable->removeFromLegend();
9863  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
9864  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
9865  mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
9866  // remove plottable:
9867  delete plottable;
9868  mPlottables.removeOne(plottable);
9869  return true;
9870 }
9871 
9876 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(int index)
9877 {
9878  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
9879  return removePlottable(mPlottables[index]);
9880  else
9881  {
9882  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9883  return false;
9884  }
9885 }
9886 
9894 int QCustomPlot::clearPlottables()
9895 {
9896  int c = mPlottables.size();
9897  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
9898  removePlottable(mPlottables[i]);
9899  return c;
9900 }
9901 
9907 int QCustomPlot::plottableCount() const
9908 {
9909  return mPlottables.size();
9910 }
9911 
9919 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCustomPlot::selectedPlottables() const
9920 {
9921  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
9922  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables)
9923  {
9924  if (plottable->selected())
9925  result.append(plottable);
9926  }
9927  return result;
9928 }
9929 
9942 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
9943 {
9944  QCPAbstractPlottable *resultPlottable = 0;
9945  double resultDistance = mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize with that value
9946 
9947  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables)
9948  {
9949  if (onlySelectable && !plottable->selectable()) // we could have also passed onlySelectable to the selectTest function, but checking here is faster, because we have access to QCPabstractPlottable::selectable
9950  continue;
9951  if ((plottable->keyAxis()->axisRect()->rect() & plottable->valueAxis()->axisRect()->rect()).contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside the rect that is spanned by the plottable's key/value axes
9952  {
9953  double currentDistance = plottable->selectTest(pos, false);
9954  if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance)
9955  {
9956  resultPlottable = plottable;
9957  resultDistance = currentDistance;
9958  }
9959  }
9960  }
9961 
9962  return resultPlottable;
9963 }
9964 
9970 bool QCustomPlot::hasPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
9971 {
9972  return mPlottables.contains(plottable);
9973 }
9974 
9983 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph(int index) const
9984 {
9985  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
9986  {
9987  return mGraphs.at(index);
9988  } else
9989  {
9990  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
9991  return 0;
9992  }
9993 }
9994 
10002 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph() const
10003 {
10004  if (!mGraphs.isEmpty())
10005  {
10006  return mGraphs.last();
10007  } else
10008  return 0;
10009 }
10010 
10023 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::addGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
10024 {
10025  if (!keyAxis) keyAxis = xAxis;
10026  if (!valueAxis) valueAxis = yAxis;
10027  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis)
10028  {
10029  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't use default QCustomPlot xAxis or yAxis, because at least one is invalid (has been deleted)";
10030  return 0;
10031  }
10032  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != this || valueAxis->parentPlot() != this)
10033  {
10034  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed keyAxis or valueAxis doesn't have this QCustomPlot as parent";
10035  return 0;
10036  }
10037 
10038  QCPGraph *newGraph = new QCPGraph(keyAxis, valueAxis);
10039  if (addPlottable(newGraph))
10040  {
10041  newGraph->setName("Graph "+QString::number(mGraphs.size()));
10042  return newGraph;
10043  } else
10044  {
10045  delete newGraph;
10046  return 0;
10047  }
10048 }
10049 
10059 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
10060 {
10061  return removePlottable(graph);
10062 }
10063 
10068 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(int index)
10069 {
10070  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
10071  return removeGraph(mGraphs[index]);
10072  else
10073  return false;
10074 }
10075 
10083 int QCustomPlot::clearGraphs()
10084 {
10085  int c = mGraphs.size();
10086  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
10087  removeGraph(mGraphs[i]);
10088  return c;
10089 }
10090 
10096 int QCustomPlot::graphCount() const
10097 {
10098  return mGraphs.size();
10099 }
10100 
10109 QList<QCPGraph*> QCustomPlot::selectedGraphs() const
10110 {
10111  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
10112  foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mGraphs)
10113  {
10114  if (graph->selected())
10115  result.append(graph);
10116  }
10117  return result;
10118 }
10119 
10128 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item(int index) const
10129 {
10130  if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
10131  {
10132  return mItems.at(index);
10133  } else
10134  {
10135  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10136  return 0;
10137  }
10138 }
10139 
10147 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item() const
10148 {
10149  if (!mItems.isEmpty())
10150  {
10151  return mItems.last();
10152  } else
10153  return 0;
10154 }
10155 
10164 bool QCustomPlot::addItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
10165 {
10166  if (!mItems.contains(item) && item->parentPlot() == this)
10167  {
10168  mItems.append(item);
10169  return true;
10170  } else
10171  {
10172  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item either already in list or not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
10173  return false;
10174  }
10175 }
10176 
10184 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
10185 {
10186  if (mItems.contains(item))
10187  {
10188  delete item;
10189  mItems.removeOne(item);
10190  return true;
10191  } else
10192  {
10193  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
10194  return false;
10195  }
10196 }
10197 
10202 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(int index)
10203 {
10204  if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
10205  return removeItem(mItems[index]);
10206  else
10207  {
10208  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10209  return false;
10210  }
10211 }
10212 
10220 int QCustomPlot::clearItems()
10221 {
10222  int c = mItems.size();
10223  for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
10224  removeItem(mItems[i]);
10225  return c;
10226 }
10227 
10233 int QCustomPlot::itemCount() const
10234 {
10235  return mItems.size();
10236 }
10237 
10243 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCustomPlot::selectedItems() const
10244 {
10245  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
10246  foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mItems)
10247  {
10248  if (item->selected())
10249  result.append(item);
10250  }
10251  return result;
10252 }
10253 
10267 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::itemAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
10268 {
10269  QCPAbstractItem *resultItem = 0;
10270  double resultDistance = mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize with that value
10271 
10272  foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mItems)
10273  {
10274  if (onlySelectable && !item->selectable()) // we could have also passed onlySelectable to the selectTest function, but checking here is faster, because we have access to QCPAbstractItem::selectable
10275  continue;
10276  if (!item->clipToAxisRect() || item->clipRect().contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside axis cliprect of the item if actually clipped to it
10277  {
10278  double currentDistance = item->selectTest(pos, false);
10279  if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance)
10280  {
10281  resultItem = item;
10282  resultDistance = currentDistance;
10283  }
10284  }
10285  }
10286 
10287  return resultItem;
10288 }
10289 
10295 bool QCustomPlot::hasItem(QCPAbstractItem *item) const
10296 {
10297  return mItems.contains(item);
10298 }
10299 
10308 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(const QString &name) const
10309 {
10310  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
10311  {
10312  if (layer->name() == name)
10313  return layer;
10314  }
10315  return 0;
10316 }
10317 
10324 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(int index) const
10325 {
10326  if (index >= 0 && index < mLayers.size())
10327  {
10328  return mLayers.at(index);
10329  } else
10330  {
10331  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10332  return 0;
10333  }
10334 }
10335 
10339 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::currentLayer() const
10340 {
10341  return mCurrentLayer;
10342 }
10343 
10354 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(const QString &name)
10355 {
10356  if (QCPLayer *newCurrentLayer = layer(name))
10357  {
10358  return setCurrentLayer(newCurrentLayer);
10359  } else
10360  {
10361  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer with name doesn't exist:" << name;
10362  return false;
10363  }
10364 }
10365 
10374 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
10375 {
10376  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
10377  {
10378  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
10379  return false;
10380  }
10381 
10382  mCurrentLayer = layer;
10383  return true;
10384 }
10385 
10391 int QCustomPlot::layerCount() const
10392 {
10393  return mLayers.size();
10394 }
10395 
10409 bool QCustomPlot::addLayer(const QString &name, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
10410 {
10411  if (!otherLayer)
10412  otherLayer = mLayers.last();
10413  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
10414  {
10415  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
10416  return false;
10417  }
10418  if (layer(name))
10419  {
10420  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "A layer exists already with the name" << name;
10421  return false;
10422  }
10423 
10424  QCPLayer *newLayer = new QCPLayer(this, name);
10425  mLayers.insert(otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0), newLayer);
10426  updateLayerIndices();
10427  return true;
10428 }
10429 
10444 bool QCustomPlot::removeLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
10445 {
10446  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
10447  {
10448  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
10449  return false;
10450  }
10451  if (mLayers.size() < 2)
10452  {
10453  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't remove last layer";
10454  return false;
10455  }
10456 
10457  // append all children of this layer to layer below (if this is lowest layer, prepend to layer above)
10458  int removedIndex = layer->index();
10459  bool isFirstLayer = removedIndex==0;
10460  QCPLayer *targetLayer = isFirstLayer ? mLayers.at(removedIndex+1) : mLayers.at(removedIndex-1);
10461  QList<QCPLayerable*> children = layer->children();
10462  if (isFirstLayer) // prepend in reverse order (so order relative to each other stays the same)
10463  {
10464  for (int i=children.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
10465  children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, true);
10466  } else // append normally
10467  {
10468  for (int i=0; i<children.size(); ++i)
10469  children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, false);
10470  }
10471  // if removed layer is current layer, change current layer to layer below/above:
10472  if (layer == mCurrentLayer)
10473  setCurrentLayer(targetLayer);
10474  // remove layer:
10475  delete layer;
10476  mLayers.removeOne(layer);
10477  updateLayerIndices();
10478  return true;
10479 }
10480 
10490 bool QCustomPlot::moveLayer(QCPLayer *layer, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
10491 {
10492  if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
10493  {
10494  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
10495  return false;
10496  }
10497  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
10498  {
10499  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
10500  return false;
10501  }
10502 
10503  mLayers.move(layer->index(), otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0));
10504  updateLayerIndices();
10505  return true;
10506 }
10507 
10517 int QCustomPlot::axisRectCount() const
10518 {
10519  return axisRects().size();
10520 }
10521 
10531 QCPAxisRect *QCustomPlot::axisRect(int index) const
10532 {
10533  const QList<QCPAxisRect*> rectList = axisRects();
10534  if (index >= 0 && index < rectList.size())
10535  {
10536  return rectList.at(index);
10537  } else
10538  {
10539  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis rect index" << index;
10540  return 0;
10541  }
10542 }
10543 
10549 QList<QCPAxisRect*> QCustomPlot::axisRects() const
10550 {
10551  QList<QCPAxisRect*> result;
10552  QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
10553  if (mPlotLayout)
10554  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
10555 
10556  while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
10557  {
10558  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *element, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
10559  {
10560  if (element)
10561  {
10562  elementStack.push(element);
10563  if (QCPAxisRect *ar = qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(element))
10564  result.append(ar);
10565  }
10566  }
10567  }
10568 
10569  return result;
10570 }
10571 
10581 QCPLayoutElement *QCustomPlot::layoutElementAt(const QPointF &pos) const
10582 {
10583  QCPLayoutElement *currentElement = mPlotLayout;
10584  bool searchSubElements = true;
10585  while (searchSubElements && currentElement)
10586  {
10587  searchSubElements = false;
10588  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, currentElement->elements(false))
10589  {
10590  if (subElement && subElement->realVisibility() && subElement->selectTest(pos, false) >= 0)
10591  {
10592  currentElement = subElement;
10593  searchSubElements = true;
10594  break;
10595  }
10596  }
10597  }
10598  return currentElement;
10599 }
10600 
10608 QList<QCPAxis*> QCustomPlot::selectedAxes() const
10609 {
10610  QList<QCPAxis*> result, allAxes;
10611  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
10612  allAxes << rect->axes();
10613 
10614  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
10615  {
10616  if (axis->selectedParts() != QCPAxis::spNone)
10617  result.append(axis);
10618  }
10619 
10620  return result;
10621 }
10622 
10630 QList<QCPLegend*> QCustomPlot::selectedLegends() const
10631 {
10632  QList<QCPLegend*> result;
10633 
10634  QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
10635  if (mPlotLayout)
10636  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
10637 
10638  while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
10639  {
10640  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
10641  {
10642  if (subElement)
10643  {
10644  elementStack.push(subElement);
10645  if (QCPLegend *leg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(subElement))
10646  {
10647  if (leg->selectedParts() != QCPLegend::spNone)
10648  result.append(leg);
10649  }
10650  }
10651  }
10652  }
10653 
10654  return result;
10655 }
10656 
10666 void QCustomPlot::deselectAll()
10667 {
10668  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
10669  {
10670  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
10671  layerable->deselectEvent(0);
10672  }
10673 }
10674 
10688 void QCustomPlot::replot(QCustomPlot::RefreshPriority refreshPriority)
10689 {
10690  if (mReplotting) // incase signals loop back to replot slot
10691  return;
10692  mReplotting = true;
10693  emit beforeReplot();
10694 
10695  mPaintBuffer.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern ? mBackgroundBrush.color() : Qt::transparent);
10696  QCPPainter painter;
10697  painter.begin(&mPaintBuffer);
10698  if (painter.isActive())
10699  {
10700  painter.setRenderHint(QPainter::HighQualityAntialiasing); // to make Antialiasing look good if using the OpenGL graphicssystem
10701  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern && mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
10702  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
10703  draw(&painter);
10704  painter.end();
10705  if ((refreshPriority == rpHint && mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phForceRepaint)) || refreshPriority==rpImmediate)
10706  repaint();
10707  else
10708  update();
10709  } else // might happen if QCustomPlot has width or height zero
10710  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on buffer. This usually happens because QCustomPlot has width or height zero.";
10711 
10712  emit afterReplot();
10713  mReplotting = false;
10714 }
10715 
10724 void QCustomPlot::rescaleAxes(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
10725 {
10726  QList<QCPAxis*> allAxes;
10727  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
10728  allAxes << rect->axes();
10729 
10730  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
10731  axis->rescale(onlyVisiblePlottables);
10732 }
10733 
10771 bool QCustomPlot::savePdf(const QString &fileName, bool noCosmeticPen, int width, int height, const QString &pdfCreator, const QString &pdfTitle)
10772 {
10773  bool success = false;
10774 #ifdef QT_NO_PRINTER
10775  Q_UNUSED(fileName)
10776  Q_UNUSED(noCosmeticPen)
10777  Q_UNUSED(width)
10778  Q_UNUSED(height)
10779  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Qt was built without printer support (QT_NO_PRINTER). PDF not created.";
10780 #else
10781  int newWidth, newHeight;
10782  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
10783  {
10784  newWidth = this->width();
10785  newHeight = this->height();
10786  } else
10787  {
10788  newWidth = width;
10789  newHeight = height;
10790  }
10791 
10792  QPrinter printer(QPrinter::ScreenResolution);
10793  printer.setOutputFileName(fileName);
10794  printer.setOutputFormat(QPrinter::PdfFormat);
10795  printer.setColorMode(QPrinter::Color);
10796  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_Creator, pdfCreator);
10797  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_DocumentName, pdfTitle);
10798  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
10799  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
10800 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 3, 0)
10801  printer.setFullPage(true);
10802  printer.setPaperSize(viewport().size(), QPrinter::DevicePixel);
10803 #else
10804  QPageLayout pageLayout;
10805  pageLayout.setMode(QPageLayout::FullPageMode);
10806  pageLayout.setOrientation(QPageLayout::Portrait);
10807  pageLayout.setMargins(QMarginsF(0, 0, 0, 0));
10808  pageLayout.setPageSize(QPageSize(viewport().size(), QPageSize::Point, QString(), QPageSize::ExactMatch));
10809  printer.setPageLayout(pageLayout);
10810 #endif
10811  QCPPainter printpainter;
10812  if (printpainter.begin(&printer))
10813  {
10814  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmVectorized);
10815  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
10816  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic, noCosmeticPen);
10817  printpainter.setWindow(mViewport);
10818  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush &&
10819  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::white &&
10820  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::transparent &&
10821  mBackgroundBrush.color().alpha() > 0) // draw pdf background color if not white/transparent
10822  printpainter.fillRect(viewport(), mBackgroundBrush);
10823  draw(&printpainter);
10824  printpainter.end();
10825  success = true;
10826  }
10827  setViewport(oldViewport);
10828 #endif // QT_NO_PRINTER
10829  return success;
10830 }
10831 
10869 bool QCustomPlot::savePng(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality)
10870 {
10871  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "PNG", quality);
10872 }
10873 
10908 bool QCustomPlot::saveJpg(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality)
10909 {
10910  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "JPG", quality);
10911 }
10912 
10944 bool QCustomPlot::saveBmp(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale)
10945 {
10946  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "BMP");
10947 }
10948 
10957 QSize QCustomPlot::minimumSizeHint() const
10958 {
10959  return mPlotLayout->minimumSizeHint();
10960 }
10961 
10967 QSize QCustomPlot::sizeHint() const
10968 {
10969  return mPlotLayout->minimumSizeHint();
10970 }
10971 
10977 void QCustomPlot::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event)
10978 {
10979  Q_UNUSED(event);
10980  QPainter painter(this);
10981  painter.drawPixmap(0, 0, mPaintBuffer);
10982 }
10983 
10990 void QCustomPlot::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
10991 {
10992  // resize and repaint the buffer:
10993  mPaintBuffer = QPixmap(event->size());
10994  setViewport(rect());
10995  replot(rpQueued); // queued update is important here, to prevent painting issues in some contexts
10996 }
10997 
11007 void QCustomPlot::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
11008 {
11009  emit mouseDoubleClick(event);
11010 
11011  QVariant details;
11012  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), false, &details);
11013 
11014  // emit specialized object double click signals:
11015  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(clickedLayerable))
11016  emit plottableDoubleClick(ap, event);
11017  else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(clickedLayerable))
11018  emit axisDoubleClick(ax, details.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
11019  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(clickedLayerable))
11020  emit itemDoubleClick(ai, event);
11021  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(clickedLayerable))
11022  emit legendDoubleClick(lg, 0, event);
11023  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(clickedLayerable))
11024  emit legendDoubleClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
11025  else if (QCPPlotTitle *pt = qobject_cast<QCPPlotTitle*>(clickedLayerable))
11026  emit titleDoubleClick(event, pt);
11027 
11028  // call double click event of affected layout element:
11029  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = layoutElementAt(event->pos()))
11030  el->mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
11031 
11032  // call release event of affected layout element (as in mouseReleaseEvent, since the mouseDoubleClick replaces the second release event in double click case):
11033  if (mMouseEventElement)
11034  {
11035  mMouseEventElement->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
11036  mMouseEventElement = 0;
11037  }
11038 
11039  //QWidget::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event); don't call base class implementation because it would just cause a mousePress/ReleaseEvent, which we don't want.
11040 }
11041 
11049 void QCustomPlot::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
11050 {
11051  emit mousePress(event);
11052  mMousePressPos = event->pos(); // need this to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a click (no position change between press and release)
11053 
11054  // call event of affected layout element:
11055  mMouseEventElement = layoutElementAt(event->pos());
11056  if (mMouseEventElement)
11057  mMouseEventElement->mousePressEvent(event);
11058 
11059  QWidget::mousePressEvent(event);
11060 }
11061 
11071 void QCustomPlot::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
11072 {
11073  emit mouseMove(event);
11074 
11075  // call event of affected layout element:
11076  if (mMouseEventElement)
11077  mMouseEventElement->mouseMoveEvent(event);
11078 
11079  QWidget::mouseMoveEvent(event);
11080 }
11081 
11096 void QCustomPlot::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
11097 {
11098  emit mouseRelease(event);
11099  bool doReplot = false;
11100 
11101  if ((mMousePressPos-event->pos()).manhattanLength() < 5) // determine whether it was a click operation
11102  {
11103  if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
11104  {
11105  // handle selection mechanism:
11106  QVariant details;
11107  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), true, &details);
11108  bool selectionStateChanged = false;
11109  bool additive = mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iMultiSelect) && event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
11110  // deselect all other layerables if not additive selection:
11111  if (!additive)
11112  {
11113  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
11114  {
11115  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
11116  {
11117  if (layerable != clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(layerable->selectionCategory()))
11118  {
11119  bool selChanged = false;
11120  layerable->deselectEvent(&selChanged);
11121  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
11122  }
11123  }
11124  }
11125  }
11126  if (clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(clickedLayerable->selectionCategory()))
11127  {
11128  // a layerable was actually clicked, call its selectEvent:
11129  bool selChanged = false;
11130  clickedLayerable->selectEvent(event, additive, details, &selChanged);
11131  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
11132  }
11133  doReplot = true;
11134  if (selectionStateChanged)
11135  emit selectionChangedByUser();
11136  }
11137 
11138  // emit specialized object click signals:
11139  QVariant details;
11140  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), false, &details); // for these signals, selectability is ignored, that's why we call this again with onlySelectable set to false
11141  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(clickedLayerable))
11142  emit plottableClick(ap, event);
11143  else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(clickedLayerable))
11144  emit axisClick(ax, details.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
11145  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(clickedLayerable))
11146  emit itemClick(ai, event);
11147  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(clickedLayerable))
11148  emit legendClick(lg, 0, event);
11149  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(clickedLayerable))
11150  emit legendClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
11151  else if (QCPPlotTitle *pt = qobject_cast<QCPPlotTitle*>(clickedLayerable))
11152  emit titleClick(event, pt);
11153  }
11154 
11155  // call event of affected layout element:
11156  if (mMouseEventElement)
11157  {
11158  mMouseEventElement->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
11159  mMouseEventElement = 0;
11160  }
11161 
11162  if (doReplot || noAntialiasingOnDrag())
11163  replot();
11164 
11165  QWidget::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
11166 }
11167 
11174 void QCustomPlot::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
11175 {
11176  emit mouseWheel(event);
11177 
11178  // call event of affected layout element:
11179  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = layoutElementAt(event->pos()))
11180  el->wheelEvent(event);
11181 
11182  QWidget::wheelEvent(event);
11183 }
11184 
11192 void QCustomPlot::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
11193 {
11194  // run through layout phases:
11195  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upPreparation);
11196  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upMargins);
11197  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upLayout);
11198 
11199  // draw viewport background pixmap:
11200  drawBackground(painter);
11201 
11202  // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...):
11203  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
11204  {
11205  foreach (QCPLayerable *child, layer->children())
11206  {
11207  if (child->realVisibility())
11208  {
11209  painter->save();
11210  painter->setClipRect(child->clipRect().translated(0, -1));
11211  child->applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
11212  child->draw(painter);
11213  painter->restore();
11214  }
11215  }
11216  }
11217 
11218  /* Debug code to draw all layout element rects
11219  foreach (QCPLayoutElement* el, findChildren<QCPLayoutElement*>())
11220  {
11221  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
11222  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(0, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
11223  painter->drawRect(el->rect());
11224  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(255, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
11225  painter->drawRect(el->outerRect());
11226  }
11227  */
11228 }
11229 
11247 void QCustomPlot::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
11248 {
11249  // Note: background color is handled in individual replot/save functions
11250 
11251  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
11252  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
11253  {
11254  if (mBackgroundScaled)
11255  {
11256  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
11257  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
11258  scaledSize.scale(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
11259  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
11260  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
11261  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
11262  } else
11263  {
11264  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()));
11265  }
11266  }
11267 }
11268 
11269 
11275 void QCustomPlot::axisRemoved(QCPAxis *axis)
11276 {
11277  if (xAxis == axis)
11278  xAxis = 0;
11279  if (xAxis2 == axis)
11280  xAxis2 = 0;
11281  if (yAxis == axis)
11282  yAxis = 0;
11283  if (yAxis2 == axis)
11284  yAxis2 = 0;
11285 
11286  // Note: No need to take care of range drag axes and range zoom axes, because they are stored in smart pointers
11287 }
11288 
11294 void QCustomPlot::legendRemoved(QCPLegend *legend)
11295 {
11296  if (this->legend == legend)
11297  this->legend = 0;
11298 }
11299 
11306 void QCustomPlot::updateLayerIndices() const
11307 {
11308  for (int i=0; i<mLayers.size(); ++i)
11309  mLayers.at(i)->mIndex = i;
11310 }
11311 
11324 QCPLayerable *QCustomPlot::layerableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *selectionDetails) const
11325 {
11326  for (int layerIndex=mLayers.size()-1; layerIndex>=0; --layerIndex)
11327  {
11328  const QList<QCPLayerable*> layerables = mLayers.at(layerIndex)->children();
11329  double minimumDistance = selectionTolerance()*1.1;
11330  QCPLayerable *minimumDistanceLayerable = 0;
11331  for (int i=layerables.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
11332  {
11333  if (!layerables.at(i)->realVisibility())
11334  continue;
11335  QVariant details;
11336  double dist = layerables.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable, &details);
11337  if (dist >= 0 && dist < minimumDistance)
11338  {
11339  minimumDistance = dist;
11340  minimumDistanceLayerable = layerables.at(i);
11341  if (selectionDetails) *selectionDetails = details;
11342  }
11343  }
11344  if (minimumDistance < selectionTolerance())
11345  return minimumDistanceLayerable;
11346  }
11347  return 0;
11348 }
11349 
11361 bool QCustomPlot::saveRastered(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, const char *format, int quality)
11362 {
11363  QPixmap buffer = toPixmap(width, height, scale);
11364  if (!buffer.isNull())
11365  return buffer.save(fileName, format, quality);
11366  else
11367  return false;
11368 }
11369 
11378 QPixmap QCustomPlot::toPixmap(int width, int height, double scale)
11379 {
11380  // this method is somewhat similar to toPainter. Change something here, and a change in toPainter might be necessary, too.
11381  int newWidth, newHeight;
11382  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
11383  {
11384  newWidth = this->width();
11385  newHeight = this->height();
11386  } else
11387  {
11388  newWidth = width;
11389  newHeight = height;
11390  }
11391  int scaledWidth = qRound(scale*newWidth);
11392  int scaledHeight = qRound(scale*newHeight);
11393 
11394  QPixmap result(scaledWidth, scaledHeight);
11395  result.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern ? mBackgroundBrush.color() : Qt::transparent); // if using non-solid pattern, make transparent now and draw brush pattern later
11396  QCPPainter painter;
11397  painter.begin(&result);
11398  if (painter.isActive())
11399  {
11400  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
11401  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
11402  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
11403  if (!qFuzzyCompare(scale, 1.0))
11404  {
11405  if (scale > 1.0) // for scale < 1 we always want cosmetic pens where possible, because else lines might disappear for very small scales
11406  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic);
11407  painter.scale(scale, scale);
11408  }
11409  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern && mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
11410  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
11411  draw(&painter);
11412  setViewport(oldViewport);
11413  painter.end();
11414  } else // might happen if pixmap has width or height zero
11415  {
11416  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on pixmap";
11417  return QPixmap();
11418  }
11419  return result;
11420 }
11421 
11434 void QCustomPlot::toPainter(QCPPainter *painter, int width, int height)
11435 {
11436  // this method is somewhat similar to toPixmap. Change something here, and a change in toPixmap might be necessary, too.
11437  int newWidth, newHeight;
11438  if (width == 0 || height == 0)
11439  {
11440  newWidth = this->width();
11441  newHeight = this->height();
11442  } else
11443  {
11444  newWidth = width;
11445  newHeight = height;
11446  }
11447 
11448  if (painter->isActive())
11449  {
11450  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
11451  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
11452  painter->setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
11453  // warning: the following is different in toPixmap, because a solid background color is applied there via QPixmap::fill
11454  // here, we need to do this via QPainter::fillRect.
11455  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
11456  painter->fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
11457  draw(painter);
11458  setViewport(oldViewport);
11459  } else
11460  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed painter is not active";
11461 }
11462 
11463 
11467 
11500 QCPColorGradient::QCPColorGradient(GradientPreset preset) :
11501  mLevelCount(350),
11502  mColorInterpolation(ciRGB),
11503  mPeriodic(false),
11504  mColorBufferInvalidated(true)
11505 {
11506  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0), mLevelCount);
11507  loadPreset(preset);
11508 }
11509 
11510 /* undocumented operator */
11511 bool QCPColorGradient::operator==(const QCPColorGradient &other) const
11512 {
11513  return ((other.mLevelCount == this->mLevelCount) &&
11514  (other.mColorInterpolation == this->mColorInterpolation) &&
11515  (other.mPeriodic == this->mPeriodic) &&
11516  (other.mColorStops == this->mColorStops));
11517 }
11518 
11525 void QCPColorGradient::setLevelCount(int n)
11526 {
11527  if (n < 2)
11528  {
11529  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "n must be greater or equal 2 but was" << n;
11530  n = 2;
11531  }
11532  if (n != mLevelCount)
11533  {
11534  mLevelCount = n;
11535  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11536  }
11537 }
11538 
11549 void QCPColorGradient::setColorStops(const QMap<double, QColor> &colorStops)
11550 {
11551  mColorStops = colorStops;
11552  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11553 }
11554 
11561 void QCPColorGradient::setColorStopAt(double position, const QColor &color)
11562 {
11563  mColorStops.insert(position, color);
11564  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11565 }
11566 
11574 void QCPColorGradient::setColorInterpolation(QCPColorGradient::ColorInterpolation interpolation)
11575 {
11576  if (interpolation != mColorInterpolation)
11577  {
11578  mColorInterpolation = interpolation;
11579  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11580  }
11581 }
11582 
11598 void QCPColorGradient::setPeriodic(bool enabled)
11599 {
11600  mPeriodic = enabled;
11601 }
11602 
11615 void QCPColorGradient::colorize(const double *data, const QCPRange &range, QRgb *scanLine, int n, int dataIndexFactor, bool logarithmic)
11616 {
11617  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::color()
11618  if (!data)
11619  {
11620  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as data";
11621  return;
11622  }
11623  if (!scanLine)
11624  {
11625  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as scanLine";
11626  return;
11627  }
11628  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
11629  updateColorBuffer();
11630 
11631  if (!logarithmic)
11632  {
11633  const double posToIndexFactor = mLevelCount/range.size();
11634  if (mPeriodic)
11635  {
11636  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11637  {
11638  int index = (int)((data[dataIndexFactor*i]-range.lower)*posToIndexFactor) % mLevelCount;
11639  if (index < 0)
11640  index += mLevelCount;
11641  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11642  }
11643  } else
11644  {
11645  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11646  {
11647  int index = (data[dataIndexFactor*i]-range.lower)*posToIndexFactor;
11648  if (index < 0)
11649  index = 0;
11650  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
11651  index = mLevelCount-1;
11652  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11653  }
11654  }
11655  } else // logarithmic == true
11656  {
11657  if (mPeriodic)
11658  {
11659  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11660  {
11661  int index = (int)(qLn(data[dataIndexFactor*i]/range.lower)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower)*mLevelCount) % mLevelCount;
11662  if (index < 0)
11663  index += mLevelCount;
11664  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11665  }
11666  } else
11667  {
11668  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
11669  {
11670  int index = qLn(data[dataIndexFactor*i]/range.lower)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower)*mLevelCount;
11671  if (index < 0)
11672  index = 0;
11673  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
11674  index = mLevelCount-1;
11675  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
11676  }
11677  }
11678  }
11679 }
11680 
11690 QRgb QCPColorGradient::color(double position, const QCPRange &range, bool logarithmic)
11691 {
11692  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::colorize()
11693  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
11694  updateColorBuffer();
11695  int index = 0;
11696  if (!logarithmic)
11697  index = (position-range.lower)*mLevelCount/range.size();
11698  else
11699  index = qLn(position/range.lower)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower)*mLevelCount;
11700  if (mPeriodic)
11701  {
11702  index = index % mLevelCount;
11703  if (index < 0)
11704  index += mLevelCount;
11705  } else
11706  {
11707  if (index < 0)
11708  index = 0;
11709  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
11710  index = mLevelCount-1;
11711  }
11712  return mColorBuffer.at(index);
11713 }
11714 
11722 void QCPColorGradient::loadPreset(GradientPreset preset)
11723 {
11724  clearColorStops();
11725  switch (preset)
11726  {
11727  case gpGrayscale:
11728  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11729  setColorStopAt(0, Qt::black);
11730  setColorStopAt(1, Qt::white);
11731  break;
11732  case gpHot:
11733  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11734  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 0));
11735  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(180, 10, 0));
11736  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(245, 50, 0));
11737  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 150, 10));
11738  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(255, 255, 50));
11739  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
11740  break;
11741  case gpCold:
11742  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11743  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
11744  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(0, 10, 180));
11745  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(0, 50, 245));
11746  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(10, 150, 255));
11747  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(50, 255, 255));
11748  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
11749  break;
11750  case gpNight:
11751  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11752  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(10, 20, 30));
11753  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(250, 255, 250));
11754  break;
11755  case gpCandy:
11756  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11757  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11758  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 250, 250));
11759  break;
11760  case gpGeography:
11761  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11762  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(70, 170, 210));
11763  setColorStopAt(0.20, QColor(90, 160, 180));
11764  setColorStopAt(0.25, QColor(45, 130, 175));
11765  setColorStopAt(0.30, QColor(100, 140, 125));
11766  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(100, 140, 100));
11767  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(130, 145, 120));
11768  setColorStopAt(0.7, QColor(140, 130, 120));
11769  setColorStopAt(0.9, QColor(180, 190, 190));
11770  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(210, 210, 230));
11771  break;
11772  case gpIon:
11773  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11774  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 10, 10));
11775  setColorStopAt(0.45, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11776  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(0, 255, 255));
11777  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(0, 255, 0));
11778  break;
11779  case gpThermal:
11780  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11781  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
11782  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(20, 0, 120));
11783  setColorStopAt(0.33, QColor(200, 30, 140));
11784  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 100, 0));
11785  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 255, 40));
11786  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
11787  break;
11788  case gpPolar:
11789  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11790  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 255, 255));
11791  setColorStopAt(0.18, QColor(10, 70, 255));
11792  setColorStopAt(0.28, QColor(10, 10, 190));
11793  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(0, 0, 0));
11794  setColorStopAt(0.72, QColor(190, 10, 10));
11795  setColorStopAt(0.82, QColor(255, 70, 10));
11796  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 50));
11797  break;
11798  case gpSpectrum:
11799  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11800  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 50));
11801  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11802  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
11803  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 255, 0));
11804  setColorStopAt(0.75, QColor(255, 30, 0));
11805  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(50, 0, 0));
11806  break;
11807  case gpJet:
11808  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
11809  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 100));
11810  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 50, 255));
11811  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
11812  setColorStopAt(0.65, QColor(255, 255, 0));
11813  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 30, 0));
11814  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(100, 0, 0));
11815  break;
11816  case gpHues:
11817  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
11818  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(255, 0, 0));
11819  setColorStopAt(1.0/3.0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
11820  setColorStopAt(2.0/3.0, QColor(0, 255, 0));
11821  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 0, 0));
11822  break;
11823  }
11824 }
11825 
11831 void QCPColorGradient::clearColorStops()
11832 {
11833  mColorStops.clear();
11834  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
11835 }
11836 
11843 QCPColorGradient QCPColorGradient::inverted() const
11844 {
11845  QCPColorGradient result(*this);
11846  result.clearColorStops();
11847  for (QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it=mColorStops.constBegin(); it!=mColorStops.constEnd(); ++it)
11848  result.setColorStopAt(1.0-it.key(), it.value());
11849  return result;
11850 }
11851 
11857 void QCPColorGradient::updateColorBuffer()
11858 {
11859  if (mColorBuffer.size() != mLevelCount)
11860  mColorBuffer.resize(mLevelCount);
11861  if (mColorStops.size() > 1)
11862  {
11863  double indexToPosFactor = 1.0/(double)(mLevelCount-1);
11864  for (int i=0; i<mLevelCount; ++i)
11865  {
11866  double position = i*indexToPosFactor;
11867  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it = mColorStops.lowerBound(position);
11868  if (it == mColorStops.constEnd()) // position is on or after last stop, use color of last stop
11869  {
11870  mColorBuffer[i] = (it-1).value().rgb();
11871  } else if (it == mColorStops.constBegin()) // position is on or before first stop, use color of first stop
11872  {
11873  mColorBuffer[i] = it.value().rgb();
11874  } else // position is in between stops (or on an intermediate stop), interpolate color
11875  {
11876  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator high = it;
11877  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator low = it-1;
11878  double t = (position-low.key())/(high.key()-low.key()); // interpolation factor 0..1
11879  switch (mColorInterpolation)
11880  {
11881  case ciRGB:
11882  {
11883  mColorBuffer[i] = qRgb((1-t)*low.value().red() + t*high.value().red(),
11884  (1-t)*low.value().green() + t*high.value().green(),
11885  (1-t)*low.value().blue() + t*high.value().blue());
11886  break;
11887  }
11888  case ciHSV:
11889  {
11890  QColor lowHsv = low.value().toHsv();
11891  QColor highHsv = high.value().toHsv();
11892  double hue = 0;
11893  double hueDiff = highHsv.hueF()-lowHsv.hueF();
11894  if (hueDiff > 0.5)
11895  hue = lowHsv.hueF() - t*(1.0-hueDiff);
11896  else if (hueDiff < -0.5)
11897  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*(1.0+hueDiff);
11898  else
11899  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*hueDiff;
11900  if (hue < 0) hue += 1.0;
11901  else if (hue >= 1.0) hue -= 1.0;
11902  mColorBuffer[i] = QColor::fromHsvF(hue, (1-t)*lowHsv.saturationF() + t*highHsv.saturationF(), (1-t)*lowHsv.valueF() + t*highHsv.valueF()).rgb();
11903  break;
11904  }
11905  }
11906  }
11907  }
11908  } else if (mColorStops.size() == 1)
11909  {
11910  mColorBuffer.fill(mColorStops.constBegin().value().rgb());
11911  } else // mColorStops is empty, fill color buffer with black
11912  {
11913  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0));
11914  }
11915  mColorBufferInvalidated = false;
11916 }
11917 
11918 
11922 
11960 /* start documentation of inline functions */
11961 
12042 /* end documentation of inline functions */
12043 
12048 QCPAxisRect::QCPAxisRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, bool setupDefaultAxes) :
12049  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
12050  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
12051  mBackgroundScaled(true),
12052  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
12053  mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
12054  mRangeDrag(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
12055  mRangeZoom(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
12056  mRangeZoomFactorHorz(0.85),
12057  mRangeZoomFactorVert(0.85),
12058  mDragging(false)
12059 {
12060  mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
12061  mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
12062  mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
12063 
12064  setMinimumSize(50, 50);
12065  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(15, 15, 15, 15));
12066  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atLeft, QList<QCPAxis*>());
12067  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atRight, QList<QCPAxis*>());
12068  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atTop, QList<QCPAxis*>());
12069  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atBottom, QList<QCPAxis*>());
12070 
12071  if (setupDefaultAxes)
12072  {
12073  QCPAxis *xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
12074  QCPAxis *yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
12075  QCPAxis *xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
12076  QCPAxis *yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
12077  setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
12078  setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
12079  xAxis2->setVisible(false);
12080  yAxis2->setVisible(false);
12081  xAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
12082  yAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
12083  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12084  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12085  xAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
12086  yAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
12087  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12088  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12089  }
12090 }
12091 
12092 QCPAxisRect::~QCPAxisRect()
12093 {
12094 // delete mInsetLayout;
12095 // mInsetLayout = 0;
12096 
12097 // QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = axes();
12098 // for (int i=0; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
12099 // removeAxis(axesList.at(i));
12100 }
12101 
12107 int QCPAxisRect::axisCount(QCPAxis::AxisType type) const
12108 {
12109  return mAxes.value(type).size();
12110 }
12111 
12117 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::axis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, int index) const
12118 {
12119  QList<QCPAxis*> ax(mAxes.value(type));
12120  if (index >= 0 && index < ax.size())
12121  {
12122  return ax.at(index);
12123  } else
12124  {
12125  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
12126  return 0;
12127  }
12128 }
12129 
12138 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) const
12139 {
12140  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
12141  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
12142  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atLeft);
12143  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
12144  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atRight);
12145  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
12146  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atTop);
12147  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
12148  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atBottom);
12149  return result;
12150 }
12151 
12156 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes() const
12157 {
12158  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
12159  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
12160  while (it.hasNext())
12161  {
12162  it.next();
12163  result << it.value();
12164  }
12165  return result;
12166 }
12167 
12177 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::addAxis(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
12178 {
12179  QCPAxis *newAxis = new QCPAxis(this, type);
12180  if (mAxes[type].size() > 0) // multiple axes on one side, add half-bar axis ending to additional axes with offset
12181  {
12182  bool invert = (type == QCPAxis::atRight) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom);
12183  newAxis->setLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, !invert));
12184  newAxis->setUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, invert));
12185  }
12186  mAxes[type].append(newAxis);
12187  return newAxis;
12188 }
12189 
12198 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::addAxes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types)
12199 {
12200  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
12201  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
12202  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
12203  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
12204  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
12205  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
12206  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
12207  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
12208  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
12209  return result;
12210 }
12211 
12219 bool QCPAxisRect::removeAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
12220 {
12221  // don't access axis->axisType() to provide safety when axis is an invalid pointer, rather go through all axis containers:
12222  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
12223  while (it.hasNext())
12224  {
12225  it.next();
12226  if (it.value().contains(axis))
12227  {
12228  mAxes[it.key()].removeOne(axis);
12229  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(parentPlot())) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the axis rect is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
12230  parentPlot()->axisRemoved(axis);
12231  delete axis;
12232  return true;
12233  }
12234  }
12235  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis isn't in axis rect:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(axis);
12236  return false;
12237 }
12238 
12265 void QCPAxisRect::setupFullAxesBox(bool connectRanges)
12266 {
12267  QCPAxis *xAxis, *yAxis, *xAxis2, *yAxis2;
12268  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) == 0)
12269  xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
12270  else
12271  xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
12272 
12273  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) == 0)
12274  yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
12275  else
12276  yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
12277 
12278  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) == 0)
12279  xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
12280  else
12281  xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
12282 
12283  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) == 0)
12284  yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
12285  else
12286  yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
12287 
12288  xAxis->setVisible(true);
12289  yAxis->setVisible(true);
12290  xAxis2->setVisible(true);
12291  yAxis2->setVisible(true);
12292  xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
12293  yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
12294 
12295  xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
12296  xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
12297  xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
12298  xAxis2->setScaleLogBase(xAxis->scaleLogBase());
12299  xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
12300  xAxis2->setAutoTickCount(xAxis->autoTickCount());
12301  xAxis2->setSubTickCount(xAxis->subTickCount());
12302  xAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(xAxis->autoSubTicks());
12303  xAxis2->setTickStep(xAxis->tickStep());
12304  xAxis2->setAutoTickStep(xAxis->autoTickStep());
12305  xAxis2->setNumberFormat(xAxis->numberFormat());
12306  xAxis2->setNumberPrecision(xAxis->numberPrecision());
12307  xAxis2->setTickLabelType(xAxis->tickLabelType());
12308  xAxis2->setDateTimeFormat(xAxis->dateTimeFormat());
12309  xAxis2->setDateTimeSpec(xAxis->dateTimeSpec());
12310 
12311  yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
12312  yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
12313  yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
12314  yAxis2->setScaleLogBase(yAxis->scaleLogBase());
12315  yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
12316  yAxis2->setAutoTickCount(yAxis->autoTickCount());
12317  yAxis2->setSubTickCount(yAxis->subTickCount());
12318  yAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(yAxis->autoSubTicks());
12319  yAxis2->setTickStep(yAxis->tickStep());
12320  yAxis2->setAutoTickStep(yAxis->autoTickStep());
12321  yAxis2->setNumberFormat(yAxis->numberFormat());
12322  yAxis2->setNumberPrecision(yAxis->numberPrecision());
12323  yAxis2->setTickLabelType(yAxis->tickLabelType());
12324  yAxis2->setDateTimeFormat(yAxis->dateTimeFormat());
12325  yAxis2->setDateTimeSpec(yAxis->dateTimeSpec());
12326 
12327  if (connectRanges)
12328  {
12329  connect(xAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), xAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
12330  connect(yAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), yAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
12331  }
12332 }
12333 
12342 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxisRect::plottables() const
12343 {
12344  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::plottables() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
12345  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
12346  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
12347  {
12348  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
12349  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
12350  }
12351  return result;
12352 }
12353 
12362 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxisRect::graphs() const
12363 {
12364  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::graphs() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
12365  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
12366  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
12367  {
12368  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
12369  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
12370  }
12371  return result;
12372 }
12373 
12384 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxisRect::items() const
12385 {
12386  // Note: don't just append all QCPAxis::items() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
12387  // and miss those items that have this axis rect as clipAxisRect.
12388  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
12389  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
12390  {
12391  if (mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->clipAxisRect() == this)
12392  {
12393  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
12394  continue;
12395  }
12396  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
12397  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++posId)
12398  {
12399  if (positions.at(posId)->axisRect() == this ||
12400  positions.at(posId)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
12401  positions.at(posId)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
12402  {
12403  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
12404  break;
12405  }
12406  }
12407  }
12408  return result;
12409 }
12410 
12419 void QCPAxisRect::update(UpdatePhase phase)
12420 {
12421  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
12422 
12423  switch (phase)
12424  {
12425  case upPreparation:
12426  {
12427  QList<QCPAxis*> allAxes = axes();
12428  for (int i=0; i<allAxes.size(); ++i)
12429  allAxes.at(i)->setupTickVectors();
12430  break;
12431  }
12432  case upLayout:
12433  {
12434  mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
12435  break;
12436  }
12437  default: break;
12438  }
12439 
12440  // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because QCPAxisRect doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
12441  mInsetLayout->update(phase);
12442 }
12443 
12444 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12445 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPAxisRect::elements(bool recursive) const
12446 {
12447  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
12448  if (mInsetLayout)
12449  {
12450  result << mInsetLayout;
12451  if (recursive)
12452  result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
12453  }
12454  return result;
12455 }
12456 
12457 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12458 void QCPAxisRect::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
12459 {
12460  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
12461 }
12462 
12463 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12464 void QCPAxisRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
12465 {
12466  drawBackground(painter);
12467 }
12468 
12484 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
12485 {
12486  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
12487  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
12488 }

12506 }

12518  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();

12520  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
12521 }

12544 {
12545  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
12546 }

12553 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
12554 {
12555  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeDragHorzAxis.data() : mRangeDragVertAxis.data());
12556 }
12557

12564 {
12565  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data() : mRangeZoomVertAxis.data());
12566 }

12575  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
12576 }

12597 }

12617 }

12625 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)

12628  mRangeDragVertAxis = vertical;
12629 }

12642 }

12654 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double horizontalFactor, double verticalFactor)
12655 {
12656  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = horizontalFactor;
12657  mRangeZoomFactorVert = verticalFactor;
12658 }
12659

12665 {
12666  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
12667  mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
12668 }
12669 
12688 void QCPAxisRect::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
12689 {
12690  // draw background fill:
12691  if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
12692  painter->fillRect(mRect, mBackgroundBrush);
12693 
12694  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
12695  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
12696  {
12697  if (mBackgroundScaled)
12698  {
12699  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
12700  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
12701  scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
12702  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
12703  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
12704  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
12705  } else
12706  {
12707  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
12708  }
12709  }
12710 }
12711 
12722 void QCPAxisRect::updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
12723 {
12724  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(type);
12725  if (axesList.isEmpty())
12726  return;
12727 
12728  bool isFirstVisible = !axesList.first()->visible(); // if the first axis is visible, the second axis (which is where the loop starts) isn't the first visible axis, so initialize with false
12729  for (int i=1; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
12730  {
12731  int offset = axesList.at(i-1)->offset() + axesList.at(i-1)->calculateMargin();
12732  if (axesList.at(i)->visible()) // only add inner tick length to offset if this axis is visible and it's not the first visible one (might happen if true first axis is invisible)
12733  {
12734  if (!isFirstVisible)
12735  offset += axesList.at(i)->tickLengthIn();
12736  isFirstVisible = false;
12737  }
12738  axesList.at(i)->setOffset(offset);
12739  }
12740 }
12741 
12742 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12743 int QCPAxisRect::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
12744 {
12745  if (!mAutoMargins.testFlag(side))
12746  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Called with side that isn't specified as auto margin";
12747 
12748  updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
12749 
12750  // note: only need to look at the last (outer most) axis to determine the total margin, due to updateAxisOffset call
12751  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
12752  if (axesList.size() > 0)
12753  return axesList.last()->offset() + axesList.last()->calculateMargin();
12754  else
12755  return 0;
12756 }
12757 
12769 void QCPAxisRect::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
12770 {
12771  mDragStart = event->pos(); // need this even when not LeftButton is pressed, to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a full click (no position change between press and release)
12772  if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
12773  {
12774  mDragging = true;
12775  // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
12776  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
12777  {
12778  mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
12779  mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
12780  }
12781  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
12782  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
12783  {
12784  if (mRangeDragHorzAxis)
12785  mDragStartHorzRange = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data()->range();
12786  if (mRangeDragVertAxis)
12787  mDragStartVertRange = mRangeDragVertAxis.data()->range();
12788  }
12789  }
12790 }
12791 
12799 void QCPAxisRect::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
12800 {
12801  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
12802  if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
12803  {
12804  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
12805  {
12806  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragHorzAxis = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data())
12807  {
12808  if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
12809  {
12810  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) - rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
12811  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower+diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper+diff);
12812  } else if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
12813  {
12814  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) / rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
12815  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower*diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper*diff);
12816  }
12817  }
12818  }
12819  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
12820  {
12821  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragVertAxis = mRangeDragVertAxis.data())
12822  {
12823  if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
12824  {
12825  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) - rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
12826  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower+diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper+diff);
12827  } else if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
12828  {
12829  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) / rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
12830  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower*diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper*diff);
12831  }
12832  }
12833  }
12834  if (mRangeDrag != 0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
12835  {
12836  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
12837  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
12838  mParentPlot->replot();
12839  }
12840  }
12841 }
12842 
12843 /* inherits documentation from base class */
12844 void QCPAxisRect::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
12845 {
12846  Q_UNUSED(event)
12847  mDragging = false;
12848  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
12849  {
12850  mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
12851  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
12852  }
12853 }
12854 
12869 void QCPAxisRect::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
12870 {
12871  // Mouse range zooming interaction:
12872  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
12873  {
12874  if (mRangeZoom != 0)
12875  {
12876  double factor;
12877  double wheelSteps = event->delta()/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
12878  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
12879  {
12880  factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
12881  if (mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data())
12882  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x()));
12883  }
12884  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
12885  {
12886  factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
12887  if (mRangeZoomVertAxis.data())
12888  mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y()));
12889  }
12890  mParentPlot->replot();
12891  }
12892  }
12893 }
12894 
12895 
12899 
12924 /* start of documentation of signals */
12925 
12932 /* end of documentation of signals */
12933 
12938 QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent) :
12939  QCPLayoutElement(parent->parentPlot()),
12940  mParentLegend(parent),
12941  mFont(parent->font()),
12942  mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
12943  mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
12944  mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()),
12945  mSelectable(true),
12946  mSelected(false)
12947 {
12948  setLayer("legend");
12949  setMargins(QMargins(8, 2, 8, 2));
12950 }
12951 
12957 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setFont(const QFont &font)
12958 {
12959  mFont = font;
12960 }
12961

12968 {
12969  mTextColor = color;
12970 }
12971

12979 {
12980  mSelectedFont = font;
12981 }

12990 {
12991  mSelectedTextColor = color;
12992 }
12993 
12999 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
13000 {
13001  if (mSelectable != selectable)
13002  {
13003  mSelectable = selectable;
13004  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
13005  }
13006 }
13007 
13016 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelected(bool selected)
13017 {
13018  if (mSelected != selected)
13019  {
13020  mSelected = selected;
13021  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
13022  }
13023 }
13024 
13025 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13026 double QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13027 {
13028  Q_UNUSED(details)
13029  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
13030  if (onlySelectable && (!mSelectable || !mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)))
13031  return -1;
13032 
13033  if (mRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
13034  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13035  else
13036  return -1;
13037 }
13038 
13039 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13040 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13041 {
13042  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegendItems);
13043 }
13044 
13045 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13046 QRect QCPAbstractLegendItem::clipRect() const
13047 {
13048  return mOuterRect;
13049 }
13050 
13051 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13052 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13053 {
13054  Q_UNUSED(event)
13055  Q_UNUSED(details)
13056  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
13057  {
13058  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13059  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
13060  if (selectionStateChanged)
13061  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13062  }
13063 }
13064 
13065 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13066 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13067 {
13068  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
13069  {
13070  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13071  setSelected(false);
13072  if (selectionStateChanged)
13073  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13074  }
13075 }
13076 
13080 
13114 QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) :
13115  QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent),
13116  mPlottable(plottable)
13117 {
13118 }
13119 
13125 QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
13126 {
13127  return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
13128 }
13129 
13135 QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const
13136 {
13137  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
13138 }
13139 
13145 QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const
13146 {
13147  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
13148 }
13149 
13156 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13157 {
13158  if (!mPlottable) return;
13159  painter->setFont(getFont());
13160  painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
13161  QSizeF iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
13162  QRectF textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
13163  QRectF iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
13164  int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than icon, center text vertically in icon height, else align tops
13165  painter->drawText(mRect.x()+iconSize.width()+mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(), mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
13166  // draw icon:
13167  painter->save();
13168  painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
13169  mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
13170  painter->restore();
13171  // draw icon border:
13172  if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
13173  {
13174  painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
13175  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
13176  painter->drawRect(iconRect);
13177  }
13178 }
13179 
13185 QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::minimumSizeHint() const
13186 {
13187  if (!mPlottable) return QSize();
13188  QSize result(0, 0);
13189  QRect textRect;
13190  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
13191  QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
13192  textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
13193  result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width() + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right());
13194  result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()) + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom());
13195  return result;
13196 }
13197 
13198 
13202 
13227 /* start of documentation of signals */
13228 
13236 /* end of documentation of signals */
13237 
13244 QCPLegend::QCPLegend()
13245 {
13246  setRowSpacing(0);
13247  setColumnSpacing(10);
13248  setMargins(QMargins(2, 3, 2, 2));
13249  setAntialiased(false);
13250  setIconSize(32, 18);
13251 
13252  setIconTextPadding(7);
13253 
13254  setSelectableParts(spLegendBox | spItems);
13255  setSelectedParts(spNone);
13256 
13257  setBorderPen(QPen(Qt::black));
13258  setSelectedBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
13259  setIconBorderPen(Qt::NoPen);
13260  setSelectedIconBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
13261  setBrush(Qt::white);
13262  setSelectedBrush(Qt::white);
13263  setTextColor(Qt::black);
13264  setSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue);
13265 }
13266 
13267 QCPLegend::~QCPLegend()
13268 {
13269  clearItems();
13270  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(mParentPlot)) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the legend is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
13271  mParentPlot->legendRemoved(this);
13272 }
13273 
13274 /* no doc for getter, see setSelectedParts */
13275 QCPLegend::SelectableParts QCPLegend::selectedParts() const
13276 {
13277  // check whether any legend elements selected, if yes, add spItems to return value
13278  bool hasSelectedItems = false;
13279  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13280  {
13281  if (item(i) && item(i)->selected())
13282  {
13283  hasSelectedItems = true;
13284  break;
13285  }
13286  }
13287  if (hasSelectedItems)
13288  return mSelectedParts | spItems;
13289  else
13290  return mSelectedParts & ~spItems;
13291 }
13292 
13296 void QCPLegend::setBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13297 {
13298  mBorderPen = pen;
13299 }
13300 
13304 void QCPLegend::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
13305 {
13306  mBrush = brush;
13307 }
13308 
13318 void QCPLegend::setFont(const QFont &font)
13319 {
13320  mFont = font;
13321  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13322  {
13323  if (item(i))
13324  item(i)->setFont(mFont);
13325  }
13326 }
13327 
13337 void QCPLegend::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
13338 {
13339  mTextColor = color;
13340  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13341  {
13342  if (item(i))
13343  item(i)->setTextColor(color);
13344  }
13345 }
