13384 
13395 void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
13396 {
13397  if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
13398  {
13399  mSelectableParts = selectable;
13400  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
13401  }
13402 }
13403 
13425 void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
13426 {
13427  SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
13428  mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item selection changed
13429 
13430  if (mSelectedParts != newSelected)
13431  {
13432  if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
13433  {
13434  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be unset with this function";
13435  newSelected &= ~spItems;
13436  }
13437  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && !newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
13438  {
13439  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13440  {
13441  if (item(i))
13442  item(i)->setSelected(false);
13443  }
13444  }
13445  mSelectedParts = newSelected;
13446  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
13447  }
13448 }
13449 
13456 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13457 {
13458  mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
13459 }
13460 
13466 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13467 {
13468  mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
13469 }
13470 
13477 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
13478 {
13479  mSelectedBrush = brush;
13480 }
13481 
13489 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
13490 {
13491  mSelectedFont = font;
13492  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13493  {
13494  if (item(i))
13495  item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
13496  }
13497 }
13498 
13506 void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
13507 {
13508  mSelectedTextColor = color;
13509  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13510  {
13511  if (item(i))
13512  item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
13513  }
13514 }
13515 
13521 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const
13522 {
13523  return qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(elementAt(index));
13524 }
13525 
13532 QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
13533 {
13534  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13535  {
13536  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(item(i)))
13537  {
13538  if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
13539  return pli;
13540  }
13541  }
13542  return 0;
13543 }
13544 
13549 int QCPLegend::itemCount() const
13550 {
13551  return elementCount();
13552 }
13553 
13557 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
13558 {
13559  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13560  {
13561  if (item == this->item(i))
13562  return true;
13563  }
13564  return false;
13565 }
13566 
13573 bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
13574 {
13575  return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
13576 }
13577 
13585 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
13586 {
13587  if (!hasItem(item))
13588  {
13589  return addElement(rowCount(), 0, item);
13590  } else
13591  return false;
13592 }
13593 
13601 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
13602 {
13603  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index))
13604  {
13605  bool success = remove(ali);
13606  simplify();
13607  return success;
13608  } else
13609  return false;
13610 }
13611 
13620 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
13621 {
13622  bool success = remove(item);
13623  simplify();
13624  return success;
13625 }
13626 
13630 void QCPLegend::clearItems()
13631 {
13632  for (int i=itemCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
13633  removeItem(i);
13634 }
13635 
13642 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
13643 {
13644  QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
13645  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13646  {
13647  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i))
13648  {
13649  if (ali->selected())
13650  result.append(ali);
13651  }
13652  }
13653  return result;
13654 }
13655 
13669 void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13670 {
13671  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
13672 }
13673 
13679 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
13680 {
13681  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
13682 }
13683 
13689 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
13690 {
13691  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
13692 }
13693 
13699 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13700 {
13701  // draw background rect:
13702  painter->setBrush(getBrush());
13703  painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
13704  painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
13705 }
13706 
13707 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13708 double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13709 {
13710  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
13711  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13712  return -1;
13713 
13714  if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
13715  {
13716  if (details) details->setValue(spLegendBox);
13717  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13718  }
13719  return -1;
13720 }
13721 
13722 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13723 void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13724 {
13725  Q_UNUSED(event)
13726  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
13727  if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox && mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13728  {
13729  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
13730  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^spLegendBox : mSelectedParts|spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in !additive case, because they will be deselected by QCustomPlot (they're normal QCPLayerables with own deselectEvent)
13731  if (selectionStateChanged)
13732  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
13733  }
13734 }
13735 
13736 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13737 void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13738 {
13739  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
13740  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13741  {
13742  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
13743  setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
13744  if (selectionStateChanged)
13745  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
13746  }
13747 }
13748 
13749 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13750 QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const
13751 {
13752  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
13753 }
13754 
13755 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13756 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const
13757 {
13758  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
13759 }
13760 
13761 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13762 void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
13763 {
13764  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
13765 }
13766 
13767 
13771 
13790 /* start documentation of signals */
13791 
13800 /* end documentation of signals */
13801 
13807 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
13808  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13809  mFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
13810  mTextColor(Qt::black),
13811  mSelectedFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
13812  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
13813  mSelectable(false),
13814  mSelected(false)
13815 {
13816  if (parentPlot)
13817  {
13818  setLayer(parentPlot->currentLayer());
13819  mFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold);
13820  mSelectedFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold);
13821  }
13822  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
13823 }
13824 
13829 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text) :
13830  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13831  mText(text),
13832  mFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
13833  mTextColor(Qt::black),
13834  mSelectedFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
13835  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
13836  mSelectable(false),
13837  mSelected(false)
13838 {
13839  setLayer("axes");
13840  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
13841 }
13842 
13848 void QCPPlotTitle::setText(const QString &text)
13849 {
13850  mText = text;
13851 }

13858 void QCPPlotTitle::setFont(const QFont &font)
13859 {
13860  mFont = font;
13861 }

13868 void QCPPlotTitle::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
13869 {
13870  mTextColor = color;
13871 }
13872 
13878 void QCPPlotTitle::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
13879 {
13880  mSelectedFont = font;
13881 }
13882 
13888 void QCPPlotTitle::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
13889 {
13890  mSelectedTextColor = color;
13891 }
13892 
13899 void QCPPlotTitle::setSelectable(bool selectable)
13900 {
13901  if (mSelectable != selectable)
13902  {
13903  mSelectable = selectable;
13904  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
13905  }
13906 }
13907 
13915 void QCPPlotTitle::setSelected(bool selected)
13916 {
13917  if (mSelected != selected)
13918  {
13919  mSelected = selected;
13920  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
13921  }
13922 }
13923 
13924 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13925 void QCPPlotTitle::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13926 {
13927  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeNone);
13928 }
13929 
13930 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13931 void QCPPlotTitle::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13932 {
13933  painter->setFont(mainFont());
13934  painter->setPen(QPen(mainTextColor()));
13935  painter->drawText(mRect, Qt::AlignCenter, mText, &mTextBoundingRect);
13936 }
13937 
13938 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13939 QSize QCPPlotTitle::minimumSizeHint() const
13940 {
13941  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
13942  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
13943  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
13944  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
13945  return result;
13946 }
13947 
13948 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13949 QSize QCPPlotTitle::maximumSizeHint() const
13950 {
13951  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
13952  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
13953  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
13954  result.setWidth(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
13955  return result;
13956 }
13957 
13958 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13959 void QCPPlotTitle::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13960 {
13961  Q_UNUSED(event)
13962  Q_UNUSED(details)
13963  if (mSelectable)
13964  {
13965  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13966  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
13967  if (selectionStateChanged)
13968  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13969  }
13970 }
13971 
13972 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13973 void QCPPlotTitle::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13974 {
13975  if (mSelectable)
13976  {
13977  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13978  setSelected(false);
13979  if (selectionStateChanged)
13980  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13981  }
13982 }
13983 
13984 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13985 double QCPPlotTitle::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13986 {
13987  Q_UNUSED(details)
13988  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
13989  return -1;
13990 
13991  if (mTextBoundingRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
13992  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13993  else
13994  return -1;
13995 }
13996 
14002 QFont QCPPlotTitle::mainFont() const
14003 {
14004  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
14005 }
14006 
14012 QColor QCPPlotTitle::mainTextColor() const
14013 {
14014  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
14015 }
14016

14071 /* start documentation of inline functions */
14072 
14086 /* end documentation of signals */
14087 /* start documentation of signals */
14088 
14110 /* end documentation of signals */
14111 
14115 QCPColorScale::QCPColorScale(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
14116  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
14117  mType(QCPAxis::atTop), // set to atTop such that setType(QCPAxis::atRight) below doesn't skip work because it thinks it's already atRight
14118  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
14119  mBarWidth(20),
14120  mAxisRect(new QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(this))
14121 {
14122  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 6, 0, 6)); // for default right color scale types, keep some room at bottom and top (important if no margin group is used)
14123  setType(QCPAxis::atRight);
14124  setDataRange(QCPRange(0, 6));
14125 }
14126 
14127 QCPColorScale::~QCPColorScale()
14128 {
14129  delete mAxisRect;
14130 }
14131 
14132 /* undocumented getter */
14133 QString QCPColorScale::label() const
14134 {
14135  if (!mColorAxis)
14136  {
14137  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
14138  return QString();
14139  }
14140 
14141  return mColorAxis.data()->label();
14142 }
14143 
14144 /* undocumented getter */
14145 bool QCPColorScale::rangeDrag() const
14146 {
14147  if (!mAxisRect)
14148  {
14149  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14150  return false;
14151  }
14152 
14153  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeDrag().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
14154  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
14155  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
14156 }
14157 
14158 /* undocumented getter */
14159 bool QCPColorScale::rangeZoom() const
14160 {
14161  if (!mAxisRect)
14162  {
14163  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14164  return false;
14165  }
14166 
14167  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoom().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
14168  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
14169  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
14170 }
14171 
14179 void QCPColorScale::setType(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
14180 {
14181  if (!mAxisRect)
14182  {
14183  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14184  return;
14185  }
14186  if (mType != type)
14187  {
14188  mType = type;
14189  QCPRange rangeIon(0, 6);
14190  double logBaseIon = 10;
14191  QString labelIon;
14192  // revert some settings on old axis:
14193  if (mColorAxis)
14194  {
14195  rangeIon = mColorAxis.data()->range();
14196  labelIon = mColorAxis.data()->label();
14197  logBaseIon = mColorAxis.data()->scaleLogBase();
14198  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel("");
14199  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
14200  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14201  }
14202  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType atype, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop)
14203  {
14204  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTicks(atype == mType);
14205  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTickLabels(atype== mType);
14206  }
14207  // set new mColorAxis pointer:
14208  mColorAxis = mAxisRect.data()->axis(mType);
14209  // transfer settings to new axis:
14210  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(rangeIon); // transfer range of old axis to new one (necessary if axis changes from vertical to horizontal or vice versa)
14211  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(labelIon);
14212  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleLogBase(logBaseIon); // scaleType is synchronized among axes in realtime via signals (connected in QCPColorScale ctor), so we only need to take care of log base here
14213  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
14214  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14215  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Horizontal ? mColorAxis.data() : 0,
14216  QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Vertical ? mColorAxis.data() : 0);
14217  }
14218 }
14219 
14229 void QCPColorScale::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
14230 {
14231  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
14232  {
14233  mDataRange = dataRange;
14234  if (mColorAxis)
14235  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(mDataRange);
14236  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
14237  }
14238 }
14239 
14250 void QCPColorScale::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
14251 {
14252  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
14253  {
14254  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
14255  if (mColorAxis)
14256  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleType(mDataScaleType);
14257  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
14258  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
14259  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
14260  }
14261 }
14262 
14270 void QCPColorScale::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient)
14271 {
14272  if (mGradient != gradient)
14273  {
14274  mGradient = gradient;
14275  if (mAxisRect)
14276  mAxisRect.data()->mGradientImageInvalidated = true;
14277  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
14278  }
14279 }
14280 
14285 void QCPColorScale::setLabel(const QString &str)
14286 {
14287  if (!mColorAxis)
14288  {
14289  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
14290  return;
14291  }
14292 
14293  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(str);
14294 }

14300 void QCPColorScale::setBarWidth(int width)
14301 {
14302  mBarWidth = width;
14303 }
14304 
14311 void QCPColorScale::setRangeDrag(bool enabled)
14312 {
14313  if (!mAxisRect)
14314  {
14315  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14316  return;
14317  }
14318 
14319  if (enabled)
14320  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
14321  else
14322  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(0);
14323 }
14324 
14331 void QCPColorScale::setRangeZoom(bool enabled)
14332 {
14333  if (!mAxisRect)
14334  {
14335  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14336  return;
14337  }
14338 
14339  if (enabled)
14340  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
14341  else
14342  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(0);
14343 }
14344 
14348 QList<QCPColorMap*> QCPColorScale::colorMaps() const
14349 {
14350  QList<QCPColorMap*> result;
14351  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->plottableCount(); ++i)
14352  {
14353  if (QCPColorMap *cm = qobject_cast<QCPColorMap*>(mParentPlot->plottable(i)))
14354  if (cm->colorScale() == this)
14355  result.append(cm);
14356  }
14357  return result;
14358 }
14359 
14366 void QCPColorScale::rescaleDataRange(bool onlyVisibleMaps)
14367 {
14368  QList<QCPColorMap*> maps = colorMaps();
14369  QCPRange newRange;
14370  bool haveRange = false;
14371  int sign = 0; // TODO: should change this to QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain later (currently is protected, maybe move to QCP namespace)
14372  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
14373  sign = (mDataRange.upper < 0 ? -1 : 1);
14374  for (int i=0; i<maps.size(); ++i)
14375  {
14376  if (!maps.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisibleMaps)
14377  continue;
14378  QCPRange mapRange;
14379  if (maps.at(i)->colorScale() == this)
14380  {
14381  bool currentFoundRange = true;
14382  mapRange = maps.at(i)->data()->dataBounds();
14383  if (sign == 1)
14384  {
14385  if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper > 0)
14386  mapRange.lower = mapRange.upper*1e-3;
14387  else if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper <= 0)
14388  currentFoundRange = false;
14389  } else if (sign == -1)
14390  {
14391  if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower < 0)
14392  mapRange.upper = mapRange.lower*1e-3;
14393  else if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower >= 0)
14394  currentFoundRange = false;
14395  }
14396  if (currentFoundRange)
14397  {
14398  if (!haveRange)
14399  newRange = mapRange;
14400  else
14401  newRange.expand(mapRange);
14402  haveRange = true;
14403  }
14404  }
14405  }
14406  if (haveRange)
14407  {
14408  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this dimension), shift current range to at least center the data
14409  {
14410  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
14411  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
14412  {
14413  newRange.lower = center-mDataRange.size()/2.0;
14414  newRange.upper = center+mDataRange.size()/2.0;
14415  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
14416  {
14417  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
14418  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
14419  }
14420  }
14421  setDataRange(newRange);
14422  }
14423 }
14424 
14425 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14426 void QCPColorScale::update(UpdatePhase phase)
14427 {
14428  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
14429  if (!mAxisRect)
14430  {
14431  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14432  return;
14433  }
14434 
14435  mAxisRect.data()->update(phase);
14436 
14437  switch (phase)
14438  {
14439  case upMargins:
14440  {
14441  if (mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
14442  {
14443  setMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom()+margins().top()+margins().bottom());
14444  setMinimumSize(0, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom()+margins().top()+margins().bottom());
14445  } else
14446  {
14447  setMaximumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right()+margins().left()+margins().right(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
14448  setMinimumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right()+margins().left()+margins().right(), 0);
14449  }
14450  break;
14451  }
14452  case upLayout:
14453  {
14454  mAxisRect.data()->setOuterRect(rect());
14455  break;
14456  }
14457  default: break;
14458  }
14459 }
14460 
14461 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14462 void QCPColorScale::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
14463 {
14464  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
14465 }
14466

14468 void QCPColorScale::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
14469 {
14470  if (!mAxisRect)
14471  {
14472  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14473  return;
14474  }
14475  mAxisRect.data()->mousePressEvent(event);
14476 }
14477

14481  if (!mAxisRect)
14482  {
14483  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14484  return;
14485  }
14486  mAxisRect.data()->mouseMoveEvent(event);
14487 }
14488

14492  if (!mAxisRect)
14493  {
14494  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14495  return;
14496  }
14497  mAxisRect.data()->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
14498 }

14500 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14501 void QCPColorScale::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
14502 {
14503  if (!mAxisRect)
14504  {
14505  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14506  return;
14507  }
14508  mAxisRect.data()->wheelEvent(event);
14509 }
14510 
14514 
14529 QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(QCPColorScale *parentColorScale) :
14530  QCPAxisRect(parentColorScale->parentPlot(), true),
14531  mParentColorScale(parentColorScale),
14532  mGradientImageInvalidated(true)
14533 {
14534  setParentLayerable(parentColorScale);
14535  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 0, 0, 0));
14536  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14537  {
14538  axis(type)->setVisible(true);
14539  axis(type)->grid()->setVisible(false);
14540  axis(type)->setPadding(0);
14541  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
14542  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
14543  }
14544 
14545  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14546  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14547  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14548  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14549  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14550  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14551  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14552  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14553 
14554  // make layer transfers of color scale transfer to axis rect and axes
14555  // the axes must be set after axis rect, such that they appear above color gradient drawn by axis rect:
14556  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), this, SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
14557  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14558  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), axis(type), SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
14559 }
14560 
14565 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
14566 {
14567  if (mGradientImageInvalidated)
14568  updateGradientImage();
14569 
14570  bool mirrorHorz = false;
14571  bool mirrorVert = false;
14572  if (mParentColorScale->mColorAxis)
14573  {
14574  mirrorHorz = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atTop);
14575  mirrorVert = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atLeft || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atRight);
14576  }
14577 
14578  painter->drawImage(rect(), mGradientImage.mirrored(mirrorHorz, mirrorVert));
14579  QCPAxisRect::draw(painter);
14580 }
14581 
14587 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::updateGradientImage()
14588 {
14589  if (rect().isEmpty())
14590  return;
14591 
14592  int n = mParentColorScale->mGradient.levelCount();
14593  int w, h;
14594  QVector<double> data(n);
14595  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14596  data[i] = i;
14597  if (mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
14598  {
14599  w = n;
14600  h = rect().height();
14601  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
14602  QVector<QRgb*> pixels;
14603  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
14604  pixels.append(reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y)));
14605  mParentColorScale->mGradient.colorize(data.constData(), QCPRange(0, n-1), pixels.first(), n);
14606  for (int y=1; y<h; ++y)
14607  memcpy(pixels.at(y), pixels.first(), n*sizeof(QRgb));
14608  } else
14609  {
14610  w = rect().width();
14611  h = n;
14612  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
14613  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
14614  {
14615  QRgb *pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y));
14616  const QRgb lineColor = mParentColorScale->mGradient.color(data[h-1-y], QCPRange(0, n-1));
14617  for (int x=0; x<w; ++x)
14618  pixels[x] = lineColor;
14619  }
14620  }
14621  mGradientImageInvalidated = false;
14622 }
14623 
14629 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectedParts)
14630 {
14631  // axis bases of four axes shall always (de-)selected synchronously:
14632  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14633  {
14634  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
14635  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
14636  continue;
14637 
14638  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14639  {
14640  if (selectedParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14641  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
14642  else
14643  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
14644  }
14645  }
14646 }
14647 
14653 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectableParts)
14654 {
14655  // synchronize axis base selectability:
14656  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14657  {
14658  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
14659  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
14660  continue;
14661 
14662  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14663  {
14664  if (selectableParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14665  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
14666  else
14667  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
14668  }
14669  }
14670 }
14671 
14672 
14676 
14696 QCPData::QCPData() :
14697  key(0),
14698  value(0),
14699  keyErrorPlus(0),
14700  keyErrorMinus(0),
14701  valueErrorPlus(0),
14702  valueErrorMinus(0)
14703 {
14704 }
14705 
14709 QCPData::QCPData(double key, double value) :
14710  key(key),
14711  value(value),
14712  keyErrorPlus(0),
14713  keyErrorMinus(0),
14714  valueErrorPlus(0),
14715  valueErrorMinus(0)
14716 {
14717 }
14718 
14719 
14723 
14758 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
14759 
14767 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
14768 
14780 QCPGraph::QCPGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
14781  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis)
14782 {
14783  mData = new QCPDataMap;
14784 
14785  setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 0));
14786  setErrorPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14787  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14788  setSelectedPen(QPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5));
14789  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14790 
14791  setLineStyle(lsLine);
14792  setErrorType(etNone);
14793  setErrorBarSize(6);
14794  setErrorBarSkipSymbol(true);
14795  setChannelFillGraph(0);
14796  setAdaptiveSampling(true);
14797 }
14798 
14799 QCPGraph::~QCPGraph()
14800 {
14801  delete mData;
14802 }
14803 
14814 void QCPGraph::setData(QCPDataMap *data, bool copy)
14815 {
14816  if (copy)
14817  {
14818  *mData = *data;
14819  } else
14820  {
14821  delete mData;
14822  mData = data;
14823  }
14824 }
14825 
14832 void QCPGraph::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
14833 {
14834  mData->clear();
14835  int n = key.size();
14836  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14837  QCPData newData;
14838  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14839  {
14840  newData.key = key[i];
14841  newData.value = value[i];
14842  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
14843  }
14844 }
14845 
14855 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &valueError)
14856 {
14857  mData->clear();
14858  int n = key.size();
14859  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14860  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
14861  QCPData newData;
14862  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14863  {
14864  newData.key = key[i];
14865  newData.value = value[i];
14866  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
14867  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
14868  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14869  }
14870 }
14871 
14881 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus)
14882 {
14883  mData->clear();
14884  int n = key.size();
14885  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14886  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
14887  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
14888  QCPData newData;
14889  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14890  {
14891  newData.key = key[i];
14892  newData.value = value[i];
14893  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
14894  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
14895  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14896  }
14897 }
14898 
14908 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyError)
14909 {
14910  mData->clear();
14911  int n = key.size();
14912  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14913  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
14914  QCPData newData;
14915  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14916  {
14917  newData.key = key[i];
14918  newData.value = value[i];
14919  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
14920  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
14921  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14922  }
14923 }
14924 
14934 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus)
14935 {
14936  mData->clear();
14937  int n = key.size();
14938  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14939  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
14940  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
14941  QCPData newData;
14942  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14943  {
14944  newData.key = key[i];
14945  newData.value = value[i];
14946  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
14947  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
14948  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14949  }
14950 }
14951 
14961 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyError, const QVector<double> &valueError)
14962 {
14963  mData->clear();
14964  int n = key.size();
14965  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14966  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
14967  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
14968  QCPData newData;
14969  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14970  {
14971  newData.key = key[i];
14972  newData.value = value[i];
14973  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
14974  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
14975  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
14976  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
14977  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14978  }
14979 }
14980 
14990 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus)
14991 {
14992  mData->clear();
14993  int n = key.size();
14994  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14995  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
14996  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
14997  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
14998  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
14999  QCPData newData;
15000  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
15001  {
15002  newData.key = key[i];
15003  newData.value = value[i];
15004  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
15005  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
15006  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
15007  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
15008  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
15009  }
15010 }

15080 
15090 void QCPGraph::setChannelFillGraph(QCPGraph *targetGraph)
15091 {
15092  // prevent setting channel target to this graph itself:
15093  if (targetGraph == this)
15094  {
15095  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph is this graph itself";
15096  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
15097  return;
15098  }
15099  // prevent setting channel target to a graph not in the plot:
15100  if (targetGraph && targetGraph->mParentPlot != mParentPlot)
15101  {
15102  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph not in same plot";
15103  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
15104  return;
15105  }
15106 
15107  mChannelFillGraph = targetGraph;
15108 }
15109 
15141 void QCPGraph::setAdaptiveSampling(bool enabled)
15142 {
15143  mAdaptiveSampling = enabled;
15144 }
15145 
15154 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPDataMap &dataMap)
15155 {
15156  mData->unite(dataMap);
15157 }
15158 
15167 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPData &data)
15168 {
15169  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
15170 }
15171 
15180 void QCPGraph::addData(double key, double value)
15181 {
15182  QCPData newData;
15183  newData.key = key;
15184  newData.value = value;
15185  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
15186 }
15187 
15196 void QCPGraph::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values)
15197 {
15198  int n = qMin(keys.size(), values.size());
15199  QCPData newData;
15200  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
15201  {
15202  newData.key = keys[i];
15203  newData.value = values[i];
15204  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
15205  }
15206 }
15207 
15212 void QCPGraph::removeDataBefore(double key)
15213 {
15214  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
15215  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
15216  it = mData->erase(it);
15217 }
15218 
15223 void QCPGraph::removeDataAfter(double key)
15224 {
15225  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
15226  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
15227  while (it != mData->end())
15228  it = mData->erase(it);
15229 }
15230 
15238 void QCPGraph::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey)
15239 {
15240  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty()) return;
15241  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
15242  QCPDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
15243  while (it != itEnd)
15244  it = mData->erase(it);
15245 }
15246 
15255 void QCPGraph::removeData(double key)
15256 {
15257  mData->remove(key);
15258 }
15259 
15264 void QCPGraph::clearData()
15265 {
15266  mData->clear();
15267 }
15268 
15269 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15270 double QCPGraph::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15271 {
15272  Q_UNUSED(details)
15273  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectable) || mData->isEmpty())
15274  return -1;
15275  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
15276 
15277  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
15278  return pointDistance(pos);
15279  else
15280  return -1;
15281 }
15282 
15290 void QCPGraph::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15291 {
15292  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
15293  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
15294 }
15295 
15303 void QCPGraph::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15304 {
15305  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis with the only change
15306  // that getKeyRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
15307  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
15308 
15309  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15310  if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
15311 
15312  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
15313  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15314  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
15315 
15316  bool foundRange;
15317  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
15318 
15319  if (foundRange)
15320  {
15321  if (onlyEnlarge)
15322  {
15323  if (keyAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
15324  newRange.lower = keyAxis->range().lower;
15325  if (keyAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
15326  newRange.upper = keyAxis->range().upper;
15327  }
15328  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
15329  }
15330 }
15331 
15339 void QCPGraph::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15340 {
15341  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis with the only change
15342  // is that getValueRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
15343  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
15344 
15345  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15346  if (!valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis"; return; }
15347 
15348  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
15349  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15350  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
15351 
15352  bool foundRange;
15353  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
15354 
15355  if (foundRange)
15356  {
15357  if (onlyEnlarge)
15358  {
15359  if (valueAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
15360  newRange.lower = valueAxis->range().lower;
15361  if (valueAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
15362  newRange.upper = valueAxis->range().upper;
15363  }
15364  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
15365  }
15366 }
15367 
15368 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15369 void QCPGraph::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15370 {
15371  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15372  if (mKeyAxis.data()->range().size() <= 0 || mData->isEmpty()) return;
15373  if (mLineStyle == lsNone && mScatterStyle.isNone()) return;
15374 
15375  // allocate line and (if necessary) point vectors:
15376  QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
15377  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData = 0;
15378  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
15379  scatterData = new QVector<QCPData>;
15380 
15381  // fill vectors with data appropriate to plot style:
15382  getPlotData(lineData, scatterData);
15383 
15384  // check data validity if flag set:
15385 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
15386  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it;
15387  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
15388  {
15389  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().key, it.value().value) ||
15390  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().keyErrorPlus, it.value().keyErrorMinus) ||
15391  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().valueErrorPlus, it.value().valueErrorPlus))
15392  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it.key() << "invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
15393  }
15394 #endif
15395 
15396  // draw fill of graph:
15397  drawFill(painter, lineData);
15398 
15399  // draw line:
15400  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse)
15401  drawImpulsePlot(painter, lineData);
15402  else if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
15403  drawLinePlot(painter, lineData); // also step plots can be drawn as a line plot
15404 
15405  // draw scatters:
15406  if (scatterData)
15407  drawScatterPlot(painter, scatterData);
15408 
15409  // free allocated line and point vectors:
15410  delete lineData;
15411  if (scatterData)
15412  delete scatterData;
15413 }
15414 
15415 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15416 void QCPGraph::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
15417 {
15418  // draw fill:
15419  if (mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
15420  {
15421  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
15422  painter->fillRect(QRectF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.width(), rect.height()/3.0), mBrush);
15423  }
15424  // draw line vertically centered:
15425  if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
15426  {
15427  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15428  painter->setPen(mPen);
15429  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.right()+5, rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0)); // +5 on x2 else last segment is missing from dashed/dotted pens
15430  }
15431  // draw scatter symbol:
15432  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
15433  {
15434  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
15435  // scale scatter pixmap if it's too large to fit in legend icon rect:
15436  if (mScatterStyle.shape() == QCPScatterStyle::ssPixmap && (mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().width() > rect.width() || mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().height() > rect.height()))
15437  {
15438  QCPScatterStyle scaledStyle(mScatterStyle);
15439  scaledStyle.setPixmap(scaledStyle.pixmap().scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation));
15440  scaledStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15441  scaledStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
15442  } else
15443  {
15444  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15445  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
15446  }
15447  }
15448 }
15449 
15468 void QCPGraph::getPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *lineData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15469 {
15470  switch(mLineStyle)
15471  {
15472  case lsNone: getScatterPlotData(scatterData); break;
15473  case lsLine: getLinePlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15474  case lsStepLeft: getStepLeftPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15475  case lsStepRight: getStepRightPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15476  case lsStepCenter: getStepCenterPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15477  case lsImpulse: getImpulsePlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15478  }
15479 }
15480 
15492 void QCPGraph::getScatterPlotData(QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15493 {
15494  getPreparedData(0, scatterData);
15495 }
15496 
15508 void QCPGraph::getLinePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15509 {
15510  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15511  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15512  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15513  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData"; return; }
15514 
15515  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15516  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15517  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15518  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size());
15519 
15520  // transform lineData points to pixels:
15521  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15522  {
15523  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15524  {
15525  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15526  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
15527  }
15528  } else // key axis is horizontal
15529  {
15530  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15531  {
15532  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
15533  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15534  }
15535  }
15536 }
15537 
15549 void QCPGraph::getStepLeftPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15550 {
15551  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15552  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15553  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15554  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15555 
15556  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15557  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15558  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15559  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15560 
15561  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15562  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15563  {
15564  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15565  double key;
15566  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15567  {
15568  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15569  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastValue);
15570  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15571  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15572  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(lastValue);
15573  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(key);
15574  }
15575  } else // key axis is horizontal
15576  {
15577  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15578  double key;
15579  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15580  {
15581  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15582  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15583  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastValue);
15584  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15585  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(key);
15586  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(lastValue);
15587  }
15588  }
15589 }
15590 
15602 void QCPGraph::getStepRightPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15603 {
15604  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15605  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15606  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15607  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15608 
15609  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15610  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15611  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15612  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15613 
15614  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15615  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15616  {
15617  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15618  double value;
15619  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15620  {
15621  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15622  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(value);
15623  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastKey);
15624  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15625  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(value);
15626  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(lastKey);
15627  }
15628  } else // key axis is horizontal
15629  {
15630  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15631  double value;
15632  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15633  {
15634  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15635  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastKey);
15636  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(value);
15637  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15638  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(lastKey);
15639  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(value);
15640  }
15641  }
15642 }
15643 
15655 void QCPGraph::getStepCenterPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15656 {
15657  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15658  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15659  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15660  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15661 
15662  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15663  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15664  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15665  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15666  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15667  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15668  {
15669  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15670  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15671  double key;
15672  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastValue);
15673  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastKey);
15674  for (int i=1; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15675  {
15676  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key)+lastKey)*0.5;
15677  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setX(lastValue);
15678  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setY(key);
15679  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15680  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15681  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastValue);
15682  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15683  }
15684  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setX(lastValue);
15685  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setY(lastKey);
15686  } else // key axis is horizontal
15687  {
15688  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15689  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15690  double key;
15691  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastKey);
15692  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastValue);
15693  for (int i=1; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15694  {
15695  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key)+lastKey)*0.5;
15696  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setX(key);
15697  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setY(lastValue);
15698  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15699  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15700  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15701  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastValue);
15702  }
15703  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setX(lastKey);
15704  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setY(lastValue);
15705  }
15706 
15707 }
15708 
15720 void QCPGraph::getImpulsePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15721 {
15722  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15723  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15724  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15725  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData"; return; }
15726 
15727  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15728  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15729  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2); // no need to reserve 2 extra points because impulse plot has no fill
15730 
15731  // transform lineData points to pixels:
15732  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15733  {
15734  double zeroPointX = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
15735  double key;
15736  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15737  {
15738  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15739  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(zeroPointX);
15740  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15741  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15742  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(key);
15743  }
15744  } else // key axis is horizontal
15745  {
15746  double zeroPointY = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
15747  double key;
15748  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15749  {
15750  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15751  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15752  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(zeroPointY);
15753  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(key);
15754  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15755  }
15756  }
15757 }
15758 
15772 void QCPGraph::drawFill(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15773 {
15774  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse) return; // fill doesn't make sense for impulse plot
15775  if (mainBrush().style() == Qt::NoBrush || mainBrush().color().alpha() == 0) return;
15776 
15777  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
15778  if (!mChannelFillGraph)
15779  {
15780  // draw base fill under graph, fill goes all the way to the zero-value-line:
15781  addFillBasePoints(lineData);
15782  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15783  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15784  painter->drawPolygon(QPolygonF(*lineData));
15785  removeFillBasePoints(lineData);
15786  } else
15787  {
15788  // draw channel fill between this graph and mChannelFillGraph:
15789  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15790  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15791  painter->drawPolygon(getChannelFillPolygon(lineData));
15792  }
15793 }
15794 
15804 void QCPGraph::drawScatterPlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15805 {
15806  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15807  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15808  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15809 
15810  // draw error bars:
15811  if (mErrorType != etNone)
15812  {
15813  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
15814  painter->setPen(mErrorPen);
15815  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15816  {
15817  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15818  drawError(painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), scatterData->at(i));
15819  } else
15820  {
15821  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15822  drawError(painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), scatterData->at(i));
15823  }
15824  }
15825 
15826  // draw scatter point symbols:
15827  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
15828  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15829  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15830  {
15831  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15832  if (!qIsNaN(scatterData->at(i).value))
15833  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key));
15834  } else
15835  {
15836  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15837  if (!qIsNaN(scatterData->at(i).value))
15838  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value));
15839  }
15840 }
15841 
15851 void QCPGraph::drawLinePlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15852 {
15853  // draw line of graph:
15854  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
15855  {
15856  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15857  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15858  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15859 
15860  /* Draws polyline in batches, currently not used:
15861  int p = 0;
15862  while (p < lineData->size())
15863  {
15864  int batch = qMin(25, lineData->size()-p);
15865  if (p != 0)
15866  {
15867  ++batch;
15868  --p; // to draw the connection lines between two batches
15869  }
15870  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+p, batch);
15871  p += batch;
15872  }
15873  */
15874 
15875  // if drawing solid line and not in PDF, use much faster line drawing instead of polyline:
15876  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phFastPolylines) &&
15877  painter->pen().style() == Qt::SolidLine &&
15878  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized)&&
15879  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching))
15880  {
15881  int i = 1;
15882  int lineDataSize = lineData->size();
15883  while (i < lineDataSize)
15884  {
15885  if (!qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).y()) && !qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).x())) // NaNs create a gap in the line
15886  painter->drawLine(lineData->at(i-1), lineData->at(i));
15887  else
15888  ++i;
15889  ++i;
15890  }
15891  } else
15892  {
15893  int segmentStart = 0;
15894  int i = 0;
15895  int lineDataSize = lineData->size();
15896  while (i < lineDataSize)
15897  {
15898  if (qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).y()) || qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).x())) // NaNs create a gap in the line
15899  {
15900  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+segmentStart, i-segmentStart); // i, because we don't want to include the current NaN point
15901  segmentStart = i+1;
15902  }
15903  ++i;
15904  }
15905  // draw last segment:
15906  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+segmentStart, lineDataSize-segmentStart); // lineDataSize, because we do want to include the last point
15907  }
15908  }
15909 }
15910 
15918 void QCPGraph::drawImpulsePlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15919 {
15920  // draw impulses:
15921  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
15922  {
15923  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15924  QPen pen = mainPen();
15925  pen.setCapStyle(Qt::FlatCap); // so impulse line doesn't reach beyond zero-line
15926  painter->setPen(pen);
15927  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15928  painter->drawLines(*lineData);
15929  }
15930 }
15931 
15944 void QCPGraph::getPreparedData(QVector<QCPData> *lineData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15945 {
15946  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15947  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15948  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15949  // get visible data range:
15950  QCPDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after the upper point
15951  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
15952  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
15953  return;
15954 
15955  // count points in visible range, taking into account that we only need to count to the limit maxCount if using adaptive sampling:
15956  int maxCount = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
15957  if (mAdaptiveSampling)
15958  {
15959  int keyPixelSpan = qAbs(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())-keyAxis->coordToPixel(upper.key()));
15960  maxCount = 2*keyPixelSpan+2;
15961  }
15962  int dataCount = countDataInBounds(lower, upper, maxCount);
15963 
15964  if (mAdaptiveSampling && dataCount >= maxCount) // use adaptive sampling only if there are at least two points per pixel on average
15965  {
15966  if (lineData)
15967  {
15968  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15969  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
15970  double minValue = it.value().value;
15971  double maxValue = it.value().value;
15972  QCPDataMap::const_iterator currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
15973  int reversedFactor = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? -1 : 1; // is used to calculate keyEpsilon pixel into the correct direction
15974  int reversedRound = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? 1 : 0; // is used to switch between floor (normal) and ceil (reversed) rounding of currentIntervalStartKey
15975  double currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())+reversedRound));
15976  double lastIntervalEndKey = currentIntervalStartKey;
15977  double keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor)); // interval of one pixel on screen when mapped to plot key coordinates
15978  bool keyEpsilonVariable = keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic; // indicates whether keyEpsilon needs to be updated after every interval (for log axes)
15979  int intervalDataCount = 1;
15980  ++it; // advance iterator to second data point because adaptive sampling works in 1 point retrospect
15981  while (it != upperEnd)
15982  {
15983  if (it.key() < currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon) // data point is still within same pixel, so skip it and expand value span of this cluster if necessary
15984  {
15985  if (it.value().value < minValue)
15986  minValue = it.value().value;
15987  else if (it.value().value > maxValue)
15988  maxValue = it.value().value;
15989  ++intervalDataCount;
15990  } else // new pixel interval started
15991  {
15992  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them to a cluster
15993  {
15994  if (lastIntervalEndKey < currentIntervalStartKey-keyEpsilon) // last point is further away, so first point of this cluster must be at a real data point
15995  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.2, currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15996  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.25, minValue));
15997  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.75, maxValue));
15998  if (it.key() > currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*2) // new pixel started further away from previous cluster, so make sure the last point of the cluster is at a real data point
15999  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.8, (it-1).value().value));
16000  } else
16001  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalFirstPoint.key(), currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
16002  lastIntervalEndKey = (it-1).value().key;
16003  minValue = it.value().value;
16004  maxValue = it.value().value;
16005  currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
16006  currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.key())+reversedRound));
16007  if (keyEpsilonVariable)
16008  keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor));
16009  intervalDataCount = 1;
16010  }
16011  ++it;
16012  }
16013  // handle last interval:
16014  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them to a cluster
16015  {
16016  if (lastIntervalEndKey < currentIntervalStartKey-keyEpsilon) // last point wasn't a cluster, so first point of this cluster must be at a real data point
16017  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.2, currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
16018  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.25, minValue));
16019  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.75, maxValue));
16020  } else
16021  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalFirstPoint.key(), currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
16022  }
16023 
16024  if (scatterData)
16025  {
16026  double valueMaxRange = valueAxis->range().upper;
16027  double valueMinRange = valueAxis->range().lower;
16028  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
16029  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
16030  double minValue = it.value().value;
16031  double maxValue = it.value().value;
16032  QCPDataMap::const_iterator minValueIt = it;
16033  QCPDataMap::const_iterator maxValueIt = it;
16034  QCPDataMap::const_iterator currentIntervalStart = it;
16035  int reversedFactor = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? -1 : 1; // is used to calculate keyEpsilon pixel into the correct direction
16036  int reversedRound = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? 1 : 0; // is used to switch between floor (normal) and ceil (reversed) rounding of currentIntervalStartKey
16037  double currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())+reversedRound));
16038  double keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor)); // interval of one pixel on screen when mapped to plot key coordinates
16039  bool keyEpsilonVariable = keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic; // indicates whether keyEpsilon needs to be updated after every interval (for log axes)
16040  int intervalDataCount = 1;
16041  ++it; // advance iterator to second data point because adaptive sampling works in 1 point retrospect
16042  while (it != upperEnd)
16043  {
16044  if (it.key() < currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon) // data point is still within same pixel, so skip it and expand value span of this pixel if necessary
16045  {
16046  if (it.value().value < minValue && it.value().value > valueMinRange && it.value().value < valueMaxRange)
16047  {
16048  minValue = it.value().value;
16049  minValueIt = it;
16050  } else if (it.value().value > maxValue && it.value().value > valueMinRange && it.value().value < valueMaxRange)
16051  {
16052  maxValue = it.value().value;
16053  maxValueIt = it;
16054  }
16055  ++intervalDataCount;
16056  } else // new pixel started
16057  {
16058  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them
16059  {
16060  // determine value pixel span and add as many points in interval to maintain certain vertical data density (this is specific to scatter plot):
16061  double valuePixelSpan = qAbs(valueAxis->coordToPixel(minValue)-valueAxis->coordToPixel(maxValue));
16062  int dataModulo = qMax(1, qRound(intervalDataCount/(valuePixelSpan/4.0))); // approximately every 4 value pixels one data point on average
16063  QCPDataMap::const_iterator intervalIt = currentIntervalStart;
16064  int c = 0;
16065  while (intervalIt != it)
16066  {
16067  if ((c % dataModulo == 0 || intervalIt == minValueIt || intervalIt == maxValueIt) && intervalIt.value().value > valueMinRange && intervalIt.value().value < valueMaxRange)
16068  scatterData->append(intervalIt.value());
16069  ++c;
16070  ++intervalIt;
16071  }
16072  } else if (currentIntervalStart.value().value > valueMinRange && currentIntervalStart.value().value < valueMaxRange)
16073  scatterData->append(currentIntervalStart.value());
16074  minValue = it.value().value;
16075  maxValue = it.value().value;
16076  currentIntervalStart = it;
16077  currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.key())+reversedRound));
16078  if (keyEpsilonVariable)
16079  keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor));
16080  intervalDataCount = 1;
16081  }
16082  ++it;
16083  }
16084  // handle last interval:
16085  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them
16086  {
16087  // determine value pixel span and add as many points in interval to maintain certain vertical data density (this is specific to scatter plot):
16088  double valuePixelSpan = qAbs(valueAxis->coordToPixel(minValue)-valueAxis->coordToPixel(maxValue));
16089  int dataModulo = qMax(1, qRound(intervalDataCount/(valuePixelSpan/4.0))); // approximately every 4 value pixels one data point on average
16090  QCPDataMap::const_iterator intervalIt = currentIntervalStart;
16091  int c = 0;
16092  while (intervalIt != it)
16093  {
16094  if ((c % dataModulo == 0 || intervalIt == minValueIt || intervalIt == maxValueIt) && intervalIt.value().value > valueMinRange && intervalIt.value().value < valueMaxRange)
16095  scatterData->append(intervalIt.value());
16096  ++c;
16097  ++intervalIt;
16098  }
16099  } else if (currentIntervalStart.value().value > valueMinRange && currentIntervalStart.value().value < valueMaxRange)
16100  scatterData->append(currentIntervalStart.value());
16101  }
16102  } else // don't use adaptive sampling algorithm, transfer points one-to-one from the map into the output parameters
16103  {
16104  QVector<QCPData> *dataVector = 0;
16105  if (lineData)
16106  dataVector = lineData;
16107  else if (scatterData)
16108  dataVector = scatterData;
16109  if (dataVector)
16110  {
16111  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
16112  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
16113  dataVector->reserve(dataCount+2); // +2 for possible fill end points
16114  while (it != upperEnd)
16115  {
16116  dataVector->append(it.value());
16117  ++it;
16118  }
16119  }
16120  if (lineData && scatterData)
16121  *scatterData = *dataVector;
16122  }
16123 }
16124 
16132 void QCPGraph::drawError(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const QCPData &data) const
16133 {
16134  if (qIsNaN(data.value))
16135  return;
16136  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16137  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16138  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
16139 
16140  double a, b; // positions of error bar bounds in pixels
16141  double barWidthHalf = mErrorBarSize*0.5;
16142  double skipSymbolMargin = mScatterStyle.size(); // pixels left blank per side, when mErrorBarSkipSymbol is true
16143 
16144  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16145  {
16146  // draw key error vertically and value error horizontally
16147  if (mErrorType == etKey || mErrorType == etBoth)
16148  {
16149  a = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key-data.keyErrorMinus);
16150  b = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key+data.keyErrorPlus);
16151  if (keyAxis->rangeReversed())
16152  qSwap(a,b);
16153  // draw spine:
16154  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
16155  {
16156  if (a-y > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
16157  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, y+skipSymbolMargin));
16158  if (y-b > skipSymbolMargin)
16159  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-skipSymbolMargin, x, b));
16160  } else
16161  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, b));
16162  // draw handles:
16163  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, a, x+barWidthHalf, a));
16164  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, b, x+barWidthHalf, b));
16165  }
16166  if (mErrorType == etValue || mErrorType == etBoth)
16167  {
16168  a = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value-data.valueErrorMinus);
16169  b = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value+data.valueErrorPlus);
16170  if (valueAxis->rangeReversed())
16171  qSwap(a,b);
16172  // draw spine:
16173  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
16174  {
16175  if (x-a > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
16176  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, x-skipSymbolMargin, y));
16177  if (b-x > skipSymbolMargin)
16178  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+skipSymbolMargin, y, b, y));
16179  } else
16180  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, b, y));
16181  // draw handles:
16182  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y-barWidthHalf, a, y+barWidthHalf));
16183  painter->drawLine(QLineF(b, y-barWidthHalf, b, y+barWidthHalf));
16184  }
16185  } else // mKeyAxis->orientation() is Qt::Horizontal
16186  {
16187  // draw value error vertically and key error horizontally
16188  if (mErrorType == etKey || mErrorType == etBoth)
16189  {
16190  a = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key-data.keyErrorMinus);
16191  b = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key+data.keyErrorPlus);
16192  if (keyAxis->rangeReversed())
16193  qSwap(a,b);
16194  // draw spine:
16195  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
16196  {
16197  if (x-a > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
16198  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, x-skipSymbolMargin, y));
16199  if (b-x > skipSymbolMargin)
16200  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+skipSymbolMargin, y, b, y));
16201  } else
16202  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, b, y));
16203  // draw handles:
16204  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y-barWidthHalf, a, y+barWidthHalf));
16205  painter->drawLine(QLineF(b, y-barWidthHalf, b, y+barWidthHalf));
16206  }
16207  if (mErrorType == etValue || mErrorType == etBoth)
16208  {
16209  a = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value-data.valueErrorMinus);
16210  b = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value+data.valueErrorPlus);
16211  if (valueAxis->rangeReversed())
16212  qSwap(a,b);
16213  // draw spine:
16214  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
16215  {
16216  if (a-y > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
16217  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, y+skipSymbolMargin));
16218  if (y-b > skipSymbolMargin)
16219  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-skipSymbolMargin, x, b));
16220  } else
16221  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, b));
16222  // draw handles:
16223  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, a, x+barWidthHalf, a));
16224  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, b, x+barWidthHalf, b));
16225  }
16226  }
16227 }
16228 
16243 void QCPGraph::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPDataMap::const_iterator &lower, QCPDataMap::const_iterator &upper) const
16244 {
16245  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
16246  if (mData->isEmpty())
16247  {
16248  lower = mData->constEnd();
16249  upper = mData->constEnd();
16250  return;
16251  }
16252 
16253  // get visible data range as QMap iterators
16254  QCPDataMap::const_iterator lbound = mData->lowerBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
16255  QCPDataMap::const_iterator ubound = mData->upperBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
16256  bool lowoutlier = lbound != mData->constBegin(); // indicates whether there exist points below axis range
16257  bool highoutlier = ubound != mData->constEnd(); // indicates whether there exist points above axis range
16258 
16259  lower = (lowoutlier ? lbound-1 : lbound); // data point range that will be actually drawn
16260  upper = (highoutlier ? ubound : ubound-1); // data point range that will be actually drawn
16261 }
16262 
16273 int QCPGraph::countDataInBounds(const QCPDataMap::const_iterator &lower, const QCPDataMap::const_iterator &upper, int maxCount) const
16274 {
16275  if (upper == mData->constEnd() && lower == mData->constEnd())
16276  return 0;
16277  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
16278  int count = 1;
16279  while (it != upper && count < maxCount)
16280  {
16281  ++it;
16282  ++count;
16283  }
16284  return count;
16285 }
16286 
16302 void QCPGraph::addFillBasePoints(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
16303 {
16304  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
16305 
16306  // append points that close the polygon fill at the key axis:
16307  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16308  {
16309  *lineData << upperFillBasePoint(lineData->last().y());
16310  *lineData << lowerFillBasePoint(lineData->first().y());
16311  } else
16312  {
16313  *lineData << upperFillBasePoint(lineData->last().x());
16314  *lineData << lowerFillBasePoint(lineData->first().x());
16315  }
16316 }
16317 
16324 void QCPGraph::removeFillBasePoints(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
16325 {
16326  lineData->remove(lineData->size()-2, 2);
16327 }
16328 
16343 QPointF QCPGraph::lowerFillBasePoint(double lowerKey) const
16344 {
16345  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16346  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16347  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
16348 
16349  QPointF point;
16350  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
16351  {
16352  if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atLeft)
16353  {
16354  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16355  point.setY(lowerKey);
16356  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atRight)
16357  {
16358  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16359  point.setY(lowerKey);
16360  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop)
16361  {
16362  point.setX(lowerKey);
16363  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16364  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16365  {
16366  point.setX(lowerKey);
16367  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16368  }
16369  } else // valueAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic
16370  {
16371  // In logarithmic scaling we can't just draw to value zero so we just fill all the way
16372  // to the axis which is in the direction towards zero
16373  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16374  {
16375  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16376  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16377  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->right());
16378  else
16379  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->left());
16380  point.setY(lowerKey);
16381  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop || keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16382  {
16383  point.setX(lowerKey);
16384  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16385  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16386  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->top());
16387  else
16388  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->bottom());
16389  }
16390  }
16391  return point;
16392 }
16393 
16408 QPointF QCPGraph::upperFillBasePoint(double upperKey) const
16409 {
16410  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16411  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16412  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
16413 
16414  QPointF point;
16415  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
16416  {
16417  if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atLeft)
16418  {
16419  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16420  point.setY(upperKey);
16421  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atRight)
16422  {
16423  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16424  point.setY(upperKey);
16425  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop)
16426  {
16427  point.setX(upperKey);
16428  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16429  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16430  {
16431  point.setX(upperKey);
16432  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16433  }
16434  } else // valueAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic
16435  {
16436  // In logarithmic scaling we can't just draw to value 0 so we just fill all the way
16437  // to the axis which is in the direction towards 0
16438  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16439  {
16440  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16441  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16442  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->right());
16443  else
16444  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->left());
16445  point.setY(upperKey);
16446  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop || keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16447  {
16448  point.setX(upperKey);
