19263 void QCPBars::connectBars(QCPBars *lower, QCPBars *upper)
19264 {
19265  if (!lower && !upper) return;
19266 
19267  if (!lower) // disconnect upper at bottom
19268  {
19269  // disconnect old bar below upper:
19270  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
19271  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove = 0;
19272  upper->mBarBelow = 0;
19273  } else if (!upper) // disconnect lower at top
19274  {
19275  // disconnect old bar above lower:
19276  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
19277  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow = 0;
19278  lower->mBarAbove = 0;
19279  } else // connect lower and upper
19280  {
19281  // disconnect old bar above lower:
19282  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
19283  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow = 0;
19284  // disconnect old bar below upper:
19285  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
19286  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove = 0;
19287  lower->mBarAbove = upper;
19288  upper->mBarBelow = lower;
19289  }
19290 }
19291 
19292 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19293 QCPRange QCPBars::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19294 {
19295  QCPRange range;
19296  bool haveLower = false;
19297  bool haveUpper = false;
19298 
19299  double current;
19300  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
19301  while (it != mData->constEnd())
19302  {
19303  current = it.value().key;
19304  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
19305  {
19306  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
19307  {
19308  range.lower = current;
19309  haveLower = true;
19310  }
19311  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
19312  {
19313  range.upper = current;
19314  haveUpper = true;
19315  }
19316  }
19317  ++it;
19318  }
19319  // determine exact range of bars by including bar width and barsgroup offset:
19320  if (haveLower && mKeyAxis)
19321  {
19322  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth, keyPixel;
19323  getPixelWidth(range.lower, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
19324  keyPixel = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(range.lower) + lowerPixelWidth;
19325  if (mBarsGroup)
19326  keyPixel += mBarsGroup->keyPixelOffset(this, range.lower);
19327  range.lower = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(keyPixel);
19328  }
19329  if (haveUpper && mKeyAxis)
19330  {
19331  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth, keyPixel;
19332  getPixelWidth(range.upper, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
19333  keyPixel = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(range.upper) + upperPixelWidth;
19334  if (mBarsGroup)
19335  keyPixel += mBarsGroup->keyPixelOffset(this, range.upper);
19336  range.upper = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(keyPixel);
19337  }
19338  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
19339  return range;
19340 }
19341 
19342 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19343 QCPRange QCPBars::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19344 {
19345  QCPRange range;
19346  range.lower = mBaseValue;
19347  range.upper = mBaseValue;
19348  bool haveLower = true; // set to true, because baseValue should always be visible in bar charts
19349  bool haveUpper = true; // set to true, because baseValue should always be visible in bar charts
19350  double current;
19351 
19352  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
19353  while (it != mData->constEnd())
19354  {
19355  current = it.value().value + getStackedBaseValue(it.value().key, it.value().value >= 0);
19356  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
19357  {
19358  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
19359  {
19360  range.lower = current;
19361  haveLower = true;
19362  }
19363  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
19364  {
19365  range.upper = current;
19366  haveUpper = true;
19367  }
19368  }
19369  ++it;
19370  }
19371 
19372  foundRange = true; // return true because bar charts always have the 0-line visible
19373  return range;
19374 }
19375 
19376 
19380 
19443 QCPStatisticalBox::QCPStatisticalBox(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
19444  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
19445  mKey(0),
19446  mMinimum(0),
19447  mLowerQuartile(0),
19448  mMedian(0),
19449  mUpperQuartile(0),
19450  mMaximum(0)
19451 {
19452  setOutlierStyle(QCPScatterStyle(QCPScatterStyle::ssCircle, Qt::blue, 6));
19453  setWhiskerWidth(0.2);
19454  setWidth(0.5);
19455 
19456  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19457  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2.5));
19458  setMedianPen(QPen(Qt::black, 3, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::FlatCap));
19459  setWhiskerPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::DashLine, Qt::FlatCap));
19460  setWhiskerBarPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19461  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
19462  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
19463 }

19620 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19621 void QCPStatisticalBox::clearData()
19622 {
19623  setOutliers(QVector<double>());
19624  setKey(0);
19625  setMinimum(0);
19626  setLowerQuartile(0);
19627  setMedian(0);
19628  setUpperQuartile(0);
19629  setMaximum(0);
19630 }
19631 
19632 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19633 double QCPStatisticalBox::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19634 {
19635  Q_UNUSED(details)
19636  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19637  return -1;
19638  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
19639 
19640  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
19641  {
19642  double posKey, posValue;
19643  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
19644  // quartile box:
19645  QCPRange keyRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19646  QCPRange valueRange(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile);
19647  if (keyRange.contains(posKey) && valueRange.contains(posValue))
19648  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
19649 
19650  // min/max whiskers:
19651  if (QCPRange(mMinimum, mMaximum).contains(posValue))
19652  return qAbs(mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey)-mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(posKey));
19653  }
19654  return -1;
19655 }
19656 
19657 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19658 void QCPStatisticalBox::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19659 {
19660  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
19661 
19662  // check data validity if flag set:
19663 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
19664  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mKey, mMedian) ||
19665  QCP::isInvalidData(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile) ||
19666  QCP::isInvalidData(mMinimum, mMaximum))
19667  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << mKey << "of drawn range has invalid data." << "Plottable name:" << name();
19668  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
19669  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mOutliers.at(i)))
19670  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point outlier at" << mKey << "of drawn range invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
19671 #endif
19672 
19673  QRectF quartileBox;
19674  drawQuartileBox(painter, &quartileBox);
19675 
19676  painter->save();
19677  painter->setClipRect(quartileBox, Qt::IntersectClip);
19678  drawMedian(painter);
19679  painter->restore();
19680 
19681  drawWhiskers(painter);
19682  drawOutliers(painter);
19683 }
19684 
19685 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19686 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
19687 {
19688  // draw filled rect:
19689  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19690  painter->setPen(mPen);
19691  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
19692  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width()*0.67, rect.height()*0.67);
19693  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
19694  painter->drawRect(r);
19695 }
19696 
19703 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawQuartileBox(QCPPainter *painter, QRectF *quartileBox) const
19704 {
19705  QRectF box;
19706  box.setTopLeft(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mUpperQuartile));
19707  box.setBottomRight(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mLowerQuartile));
19708  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19709  painter->setPen(mainPen());
19710  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
19711  painter->drawRect(box);
19712  if (quartileBox)
19713  *quartileBox = box;
19714 }
19715 
19720 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawMedian(QCPPainter *painter) const
19721 {
19722  QLineF medianLine;
19723  medianLine.setP1(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
19724  medianLine.setP2(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
19725  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19726  painter->setPen(mMedianPen);
19727  painter->drawLine(medianLine);
19728 }
19729 
19734 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawWhiskers(QCPPainter *painter) const
19735 {
19736  QLineF backboneMin, backboneMax, barMin, barMax;
19737  backboneMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mUpperQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMaximum));
19738  backboneMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mLowerQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMinimum));
19739  barMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum));
19740  barMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum));
19741  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
19742  painter->setPen(mWhiskerPen);
19743  painter->drawLine(backboneMin);
19744  painter->drawLine(backboneMax);
19745  painter->setPen(mWhiskerBarPen);
19746  painter->drawLine(barMin);
19747  painter->drawLine(barMax);
19748 }
19749 
19754 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawOutliers(QCPPainter *painter) const
19755 {
19756  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
19757  mOutlierStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
19758  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
19759  mOutlierStyle.drawShape(painter, coordsToPixels(mKey, mOutliers.at(i)));
19760 }
19761 
19762 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19763 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19764 {
19765  foundRange = true;
19766  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth)
19767  {
19768  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19769  } else if (inSignDomain == sdNegative)
19770  {
19771  if (mKey+mWidth*0.5 < 0)
19772  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19773  else if (mKey < 0)
19774  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey);
19775  else
19776  {
19777  foundRange = false;
19778  return QCPRange();
19779  }
19780  } else if (inSignDomain == sdPositive)
19781  {
19782  if (mKey-mWidth*0.5 > 0)
19783  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19784  else if (mKey > 0)
19785  return QCPRange(mKey, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19786  else
19787  {
19788  foundRange = false;
19789  return QCPRange();
19790  }
19791  }
19792  foundRange = false;
19793  return QCPRange();
19794 }
19795 
19796 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19797 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19798 {
19799  QVector<double> values; // values that must be considered (i.e. all outliers and the five box-parameters)
19800  values.reserve(mOutliers.size() + 5);
19801  values << mMaximum << mUpperQuartile << mMedian << mLowerQuartile << mMinimum;
19802  values << mOutliers;
19803  // go through values and find the ones in legal range:
19804  bool haveUpper = false;
19805  bool haveLower = false;
19806  double upper = 0;
19807  double lower = 0;
19808  for (int i=0; i<values.size(); ++i)
19809  {
19810  if ((inSignDomain == sdNegative && values.at(i) < 0) ||
19811  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && values.at(i) > 0) ||
19812  (inSignDomain == sdBoth))
19813  {
19814  if (values.at(i) > upper || !haveUpper)
19815  {
19816  upper = values.at(i);
19817  haveUpper = true;
19818  }
19819  if (values.at(i) < lower || !haveLower)
19820  {
19821  lower = values.at(i);
19822  haveLower = true;
19823  }
19824  }
19825  }
19826  // return the bounds if we found some sensible values:
19827  if (haveLower && haveUpper)
19828  {
19829  foundRange = true;
19830  return QCPRange(lower, upper);
19831  } else // might happen if all values are in other sign domain
19832  {
19833  foundRange = false;
19834  return QCPRange();
19835  }
19836 }
19837 
19838 
19842 
19871 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
19872 
19879 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
19880 
19888 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(int keySize, int valueSize, const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange) :
19889  mKeySize(0),
19890  mValueSize(0),
19891  mKeyRange(keyRange),
19892  mValueRange(valueRange),
19893  mIsEmpty(true),
19894  mData(0),
19895  mDataModified(true)
19896 {
19897  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
19898  fill(0);
19899 }
19900 
19901 QCPColorMapData::~QCPColorMapData()
19902 {
19903  if (mData)
19904  delete[] mData;
19905 }
19906 
19910 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(const QCPColorMapData &other) :
19911  mKeySize(0),
19912  mValueSize(0),
19913  mIsEmpty(true),
19914  mData(0),
19915  mDataModified(true)
19916 {
19917  *this = other;
19918 }
19919 
19923 QCPColorMapData &QCPColorMapData::operator=(const QCPColorMapData &other)
19924 {
19925  if (&other != this)
19926  {
19927  const int keySize = other.keySize();
19928  const int valueSize = other.valueSize();
19929  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
19930  setRange(other.keyRange(), other.valueRange());
19931  if (!mIsEmpty)
19932  memcpy(mData, other.mData, sizeof(mData[0])*keySize*valueSize);
19933  mDataBounds = other.mDataBounds;
19934  mDataModified = true;
19935  }
19936  return *this;
19937 }
19938 
19939 /* undocumented getter */
19940 double QCPColorMapData::data(double key, double value)
19941 {
19942  int keyCell = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
19943  int valueCell = (1.0-(value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower))*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
19944  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
19945  return mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell];
19946  else
19947  return 0;
19948 }
19949 
19950 /* undocumented getter */
19951 double QCPColorMapData::cell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex)
19952 {
19953  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
19954  return mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex];
19955  else
19956  return 0;
19957 }
19958 
19971 void QCPColorMapData::setSize(int keySize, int valueSize)
19972 {
19973  if (keySize != mKeySize || valueSize != mValueSize)
19974  {
19975  mKeySize = keySize;
19976  mValueSize = valueSize;
19977  if (mData)
19978  delete[] mData;
19979  mIsEmpty = mKeySize == 0 || mValueSize == 0;
19980  if (!mIsEmpty)
19981  {
19982 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
19983  try { // 2D arrays get memory intensive fast. So if the allocation fails, at least output debug message
19984 #endif
19985  mData = new double[mKeySize*mValueSize];
19986 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
19987  } catch (...) { mData = 0; }
19988 #endif
19989  if (mData)
19990  fill(0);
19991  else
19992  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "out of memory for data dimensions "<< mKeySize << "*" << mValueSize;
19993  } else
19994  mData = 0;
19995  mDataModified = true;
19996  }
19997 }
19998 
20009 void QCPColorMapData::setKeySize(int keySize)
20010 {
20011  setSize(keySize, mValueSize);
20012 }
20013 
20024 void QCPColorMapData::setValueSize(int valueSize)
20025 {
20026  setSize(mKeySize, valueSize);
20027 }
20028 
20039 void QCPColorMapData::setRange(const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange)
20040 {
20041  setKeyRange(keyRange);
20042  setValueRange(valueRange);
20043 }
20044 
20055 void QCPColorMapData::setKeyRange(const QCPRange &keyRange)
20056 {
20057  mKeyRange = keyRange;
20058 }
20059 
20070 void QCPColorMapData::setValueRange(const QCPRange &valueRange)
20071 {
20072  mValueRange = valueRange;
20073 }
20074 
20081 void QCPColorMapData::setData(double key, double value, double z)
20082 {
20083  int keyCell = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
20084  int valueCell = (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
20085  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
20086  {
20087  mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell] = z;
20088  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
20089  mDataBounds.lower = z;
20090  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
20091  mDataBounds.upper = z;
20092  mDataModified = true;
20093  }
20094 }
20095 
20107 void QCPColorMapData::setCell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double z)
20108 {
20109  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
20110  {
20111  mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex] = z;
20112  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
20113  mDataBounds.lower = z;
20114  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
20115  mDataBounds.upper = z;
20116  mDataModified = true;
20117  }
20118 }
20119 
20133 void QCPColorMapData::recalculateDataBounds()
20134 {
20135  if (mKeySize > 0 && mValueSize > 0)
20136  {
20137  double minHeight = mData[0];
20138  double maxHeight = mData[0];
20139  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
20140  for (int i=0; i<dataCount; ++i)
20141  {
20142  if (mData[i] > maxHeight)
20143  maxHeight = mData[i];
20144  if (mData[i] < minHeight)
20145  minHeight = mData[i];
20146  }
20147  mDataBounds.lower = minHeight;
20148  mDataBounds.upper = maxHeight;
20149  }
20150 }
20151 
20157 void QCPColorMapData::clear()
20158 {
20159  setSize(0, 0);
20160 }
20161 
20165 void QCPColorMapData::fill(double z)
20166 {
20167  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
20168  for (int i=0; i<dataCount; ++i)
20169  mData[i] = z;
20170  mDataBounds = QCPRange(z, z);
20171 }
20172 
20185 void QCPColorMapData::coordToCell(double key, double value, int *keyIndex, int *valueIndex) const
20186 {
20187  if (keyIndex)
20188  *keyIndex = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
20189  if (valueIndex)
20190  *valueIndex = (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
20191 }
20192 
20203 void QCPColorMapData::cellToCoord(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double *key, double *value) const
20204 {
20205  if (key)
20206  *key = keyIndex/(double)(mKeySize-1)*(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)+mKeyRange.lower;
20207  if (value)
20208  *value = valueIndex/(double)(mValueSize-1)*(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)+mValueRange.lower;
20209 }
20210 
20211 
20215 
20288 /* start documentation of inline functions */
20289 
20298 /* end documentation of inline functions */
20299 
20300 /* start documentation of signals */
20301 
20323 /* end documentation of signals */
20324 
20331 QCPColorMap::QCPColorMap(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
20332  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
20333  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
20334  mMapData(new QCPColorMapData(10, 10, QCPRange(0, 5), QCPRange(0, 5))),
20335  mInterpolate(true),
20336  mTightBoundary(false),
20337  mMapImageInvalidated(true)
20338 {
20339 }
20340 
20341 QCPColorMap::~QCPColorMap()
20342 {
20343  delete mMapData;
20344 }
20345 
20353 void QCPColorMap::setData(QCPColorMapData *data, bool copy)
20354 {
20355  if (copy)
20356  {
20357  *mMapData = *data;
20358  } else
20359  {
20360  delete mMapData;
20361  mMapData = data;
20362  }
20363  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20364 }
20365 
20374 void QCPColorMap::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
20375 {
20376  if (!QCPRange::validRange(dataRange)) return;
20377  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
20378  {
20379  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
20380  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
20381  else
20382  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
20383  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20384  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
20385  }
20386 }
20387 
20393 void QCPColorMap::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
20394 {
20395  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
20396  {
20397  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
20398  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20399  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
20400  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
20401  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
20402  }
20403 }
20404 
20416 void QCPColorMap::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient)
20417 {
20418  if (mGradient != gradient)
20419  {
20420  mGradient = gradient;
20421  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20422  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
20423  }
20424 }
20425 
20432 void QCPColorMap::setInterpolate(bool enabled)
20433 {
20434  mInterpolate = enabled;
20435 }
20436 
20448 void QCPColorMap::setTightBoundary(bool enabled)
20449 {
20450  mTightBoundary = enabled;
20451 }
20452 
20467 void QCPColorMap::setColorScale(QCPColorScale *colorScale)
20468 {
20469  if (mColorScale) // unconnect signals from old color scale
20470  {
20471  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20472  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20473  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20474  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20475  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20476  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20477  }
20478  mColorScale = colorScale;
20479  if (mColorScale) // connect signals to new color scale
20480  {
20481  setGradient(mColorScale.data()->gradient());
20482  setDataRange(mColorScale.data()->dataRange());
20483  setDataScaleType(mColorScale.data()->dataScaleType());
20484  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20485  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20486  connect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20487  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20488  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20489  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20490  }
20491 }
20492 
20513 void QCPColorMap::rescaleDataRange(bool recalculateDataBounds)
20514 {
20515  if (recalculateDataBounds)
20516  mMapData->recalculateDataBounds();
20517  setDataRange(mMapData->dataBounds());
20518 }
20519 
20534 void QCPColorMap::updateLegendIcon(Qt::TransformationMode transformMode, const QSize &thumbSize)
20535 {
20536  if (mMapImage.isNull() && !data()->isEmpty())
20537  updateMapImage(); // try to update map image if it's null (happens if no draw has happened yet)
20538 
20539  if (!mMapImage.isNull()) // might still be null, e.g. if data is empty, so check here again
20540  {
20541  bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
20542  bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
20543  mLegendIcon = QPixmap::fromImage(mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY)).scaled(thumbSize, Qt::KeepAspectRatio, transformMode);
20544  }
20545 }
20546 
20551 void QCPColorMap::clearData()
20552 {
20553  mMapData->clear();
20554 }
20555 
20556 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20557 double QCPColorMap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
20558 {
20559  Q_UNUSED(details)
20560  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20561  return -1;
20562  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
20563 
20564  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
20565  {
20566  double posKey, posValue;
20567  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
20568  if (mMapData->keyRange().contains(posKey) && mMapData->valueRange().contains(posValue))
20569  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
20570  }
20571  return -1;
20572 }
20573 
20583 void QCPColorMap::updateMapImage()
20584 {
20585  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
20586  if (!keyAxis) return;
20587 
20588  // resize mMapImage to correct dimensions, according to key/value axes orientation:
20589  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal && (mMapImage.size().width() != mMapData->keySize() || mMapImage.size().height() != mMapData->valueSize()))
20590  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(mMapData->keySize(), mMapData->valueSize()), QImage::Format_RGB32);
20591  else if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical && (mMapImage.size().width() != mMapData->valueSize() || mMapImage.size().height() != mMapData->keySize()))
20592  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(mMapData->valueSize(), mMapData->keySize()), QImage::Format_RGB32);
20593 
20594  const int keySize = mMapData->keySize();
20595  const int valueSize = mMapData->valueSize();
20596  const double *rawData = mMapData->mData;
20597 
20598  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
20599  {
20600  const int lineCount = valueSize;
20601  const int rowCount = keySize;
20602  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
20603  {
20604  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mMapImage.scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
20605  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line*rowCount, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, 1, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
20606  }
20607  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
20608  {
20609  const int lineCount = keySize;
20610  const int rowCount = valueSize;
20611  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
20612  {
20613  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mMapImage.scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
20614  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, lineCount, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
20615  }
20616  }
20617 
20618  mMapData->mDataModified = false;
20619  mMapImageInvalidated = false;
20620 }
20621 
20622 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20623 void QCPColorMap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
20624 {
20625  if (mMapData->isEmpty()) return;
20626  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) return;
20627  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
20628 
20629  if (mMapData->mDataModified || mMapImageInvalidated)
20630  updateMapImage();
20631 
20632  double halfSampleKey = 0;
20633  double halfSampleValue = 0;
20634  if (mMapData->keySize() > 1)
20635  halfSampleKey = 0.5*mMapData->keyRange().size()/(double)(mMapData->keySize()-1);
20636  if (mMapData->valueSize() > 1)
20637  halfSampleValue = 0.5*mMapData->valueRange().size()/(double)(mMapData->valueSize()-1);
20638  QRectF imageRect(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower-halfSampleKey, mMapData->valueRange().lower-halfSampleValue),
20639  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper+halfSampleKey, mMapData->valueRange().upper+halfSampleValue));
20640  imageRect = imageRect.normalized();
20641  bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
20642  bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
20643  bool smoothBackup = painter->renderHints().testFlag(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
20644  painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, mInterpolate);
20645  QRegion clipBackup;
20646  if (mTightBoundary)
20647  {
20648  clipBackup = painter->clipRegion();
20649  painter->setClipRect(QRectF(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower, mMapData->valueRange().lower),
20650  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper, mMapData->valueRange().upper)).normalized(), Qt::IntersectClip);
20651  }
20652  painter->drawImage(imageRect, mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY));
20653  if (mTightBoundary)
20654  painter->setClipRegion(clipBackup);
20655  painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, smoothBackup);
20656 }
20657 
20658 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20659 void QCPColorMap::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
20660 {
20661  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
20662  // draw map thumbnail:
20663  if (!mLegendIcon.isNull())
20664  {
20665  QPixmap scaledIcon = mLegendIcon.scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
20666  QRectF iconRect = QRectF(0, 0, scaledIcon.width(), scaledIcon.height());
20667  iconRect.moveCenter(rect.center());
20668  painter->drawPixmap(iconRect.topLeft(), scaledIcon);
20669  }
20670  /*
20671  // draw frame:
20672  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20673  painter->setPen(Qt::black);
20674  painter->drawRect(rect.adjusted(1, 1, 0, 0));
20675  */
20676 }
20677 
20678 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20679 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
20680 {
20681  foundRange = true;
20682  QCPRange result = mMapData->keyRange();
20683  result.normalize();
20684  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive)
20685  {
20686  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
20687  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
20688  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
20689  foundRange = false;
20690  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative)
20691  {
20692  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
20693  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
20694  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
20695  foundRange = false;
20696  }
20697  return result;
20698 }
20699 
20700 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20701 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
20702 {
20703  foundRange = true;
20704  QCPRange result = mMapData->valueRange();
20705  result.normalize();
20706  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive)
20707  {
20708  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
20709  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
20710  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
20711  foundRange = false;
20712  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative)
20713  {
20714  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
20715  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
20716  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
20717  foundRange = false;
20718  }
20719  return result;
20720 }
20721

20749  low(0),
20750  close(0)
20751 {
20752 }

20758  key(key),
20759  open(open),
20760  high(high),
20761  low(low),
20762  close(close)
20763 {
20764 }

20823 QCPFinancial::QCPFinancial(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
20824  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
20825  mData(0),
20826  mChartStyle(csOhlc),
20827  mWidth(0.5),
20828  mTwoColored(false),
20829  mBrushPositive(QBrush(QColor(210, 210, 255))),
20830  mBrushNegative(QBrush(QColor(255, 210, 210))),
20831  mPenPositive(QPen(QColor(10, 40, 180))),
20832  mPenNegative(QPen(QColor(180, 40, 10)))
20833 {
20834  mData = new QCPFinancialDataMap;
20835 
20836  setSelectedPen(QPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5));
20837  setSelectedBrush(QBrush(QColor(80, 80, 255)));
20838 }

20841 {
20842  delete mData;
20843 }
20844 
20857 void QCPFinancial::setData(QCPFinancialDataMap *data, bool copy)
20858 {
20859  if (copy)
20860  {
20861  *mData = *data;
20862  } else
20863  {
20864  delete mData;
20865  mData = data;
20866  }
20867 }
20868 
20876 void QCPFinancial::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &open, const QVector<double> &high, const QVector<double> &low, const QVector<double> &close)
20877 {
20878  mData->clear();
20879  int n = key.size();
20880  n = qMin(n, open.size());
20881  n = qMin(n, high.size());
20882  n = qMin(n, low.size());
20883  n = qMin(n, close.size());
20884  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
20885  {
20886  mData->insertMulti(key[i], QCPFinancialData(key[i], open[i], high[i], low[i], close[i]));
20887  }
20888 }
20889 
20893 void QCPFinancial::setChartStyle(QCPFinancial::ChartStyle style)
20894 {
20895  mChartStyle = style;
20896 }
20897 
20903 void QCPFinancial::setWidth(double width)
20904 {
20905  mWidth = width;
20906 }
20907 
20917 void QCPFinancial::setTwoColored(bool twoColored)
20918 {
20919  mTwoColored = twoColored;
20920 }
20921 
20931 void QCPFinancial::setBrushPositive(const QBrush &brush)
20932 {
20933  mBrushPositive = brush;
20934 }
20935 
20945 void QCPFinancial::setBrushNegative(const QBrush &brush)
20946 {
20947  mBrushNegative = brush;
20948 }

20986 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QCPFinancialDataMap &dataMap)
20987 {
20988  mData->unite(dataMap);
20989 }

21000 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QCPFinancialData &data)
21001 {
21002  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
21003 }
21004 
21015 void QCPFinancial::addData(double key, double open, double high, double low, double close)
21016 {
21017  mData->insertMulti(key, QCPFinancialData(key, open, high, low, close));
21018 }
21019 
21029 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &open, const QVector<double> &high, const QVector<double> &low, const QVector<double> &close)
21030 {
21031  int n = key.size();
21032  n = qMin(n, open.size());
21033  n = qMin(n, high.size());
21034  n = qMin(n, low.size());
21035  n = qMin(n, close.size());
21036  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
21037  {
21038  mData->insertMulti(key[i], QCPFinancialData(key[i], open[i], high[i], low[i], close[i]));
21039  }
21040 }
21041 
21047 void QCPFinancial::removeDataBefore(double key)
21048 {
21049  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
21050  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
21051  it = mData->erase(it);
21052 }
21053 
21059 void QCPFinancial::removeDataAfter(double key)
21060 {
21061  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
21062  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
21063  while (it != mData->end())
21064  it = mData->erase(it);
21065 }
21066 
21074 void QCPFinancial::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey)
21075 {
21076  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty()) return;
21077  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
21078  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
21079  while (it != itEnd)
21080  it = mData->erase(it);
21081 }
21082 
21091 void QCPFinancial::removeData(double key)
21092 {
21093  mData->remove(key);
21094 }
21095 
21101 void QCPFinancial::clearData()
21102 {
21103  mData->clear();
21104 }
21105 
21106 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21107 double QCPFinancial::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
21108 {
21109  Q_UNUSED(details)
21110  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21111  return -1;
21112  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
21113 
21114  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
21115  {
21116  // get visible data range:
21117  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after the upper point
21118  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
21119  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
21120  return -1;
21121  // perform select test according to configured style:
21122  switch (mChartStyle)
21123  {
21124  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
21125  return ohlcSelectTest(pos, lower, upper+1); break;
21126  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
21127  return candlestickSelectTest(pos, lower, upper+1); break;
21128  }
21129  }
21130  return -1;
21131 }
21132 
21146 QCPFinancialDataMap QCPFinancial::timeSeriesToOhlc(const QVector<double> &time, const QVector<double> &value, double timeBinSize, double timeBinOffset)
21147 {
21148  QCPFinancialDataMap map;
21149  int count = qMin(time.size(), value.size());
21150  if (count == 0)
21151  return QCPFinancialDataMap();
21152 
21153  QCPFinancialData currentBinData(0, value.first(), value.first(), value.first(), value.first());
21154  int currentBinIndex = qFloor((time.first()-timeBinOffset)/timeBinSize+0.5);
21155  for (int i=0; i<count; ++i)
21156  {
21157  int index = qFloor((time.at(i)-timeBinOffset)/timeBinSize+0.5);
21158  if (currentBinIndex == index) // data point still in current bin, extend high/low:
21159  {
21160  if (value.at(i) < currentBinData.low) currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
21161  if (value.at(i) > currentBinData.high) currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
21162  if (i == count-1) // last data point is in current bin, finalize bin:
21163  {
21164  currentBinData.close = value.at(i);
21165  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset+(index)*timeBinSize;
21166  map.insert(currentBinData.key, currentBinData);
21167  }
21168  } else // data point not anymore in current bin, set close of old and open of new bin, and add old to map:
21169  {
21170  // finalize current bin:
21171  currentBinData.close = value.at(i-1);
21172  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset+(index-1)*timeBinSize;
21173  map.insert(currentBinData.key, currentBinData);
21174  // start next bin:
21175  currentBinIndex = index;
21176  currentBinData.open = value.at(i);
21177  currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
21178  currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
21179  }
21180  }
21181 
21182  return map;
21183 }
21184 
21185 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21186 void QCPFinancial::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21187 {
21188  // get visible data range:
21189  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after the upper point
21190  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
21191  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
21192  return;
21193 
21194  // draw visible data range according to configured style:
21195  switch (mChartStyle)
21196  {
21197  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
21198  drawOhlcPlot(painter, lower, upper+1); break;
21199  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
21200  drawCandlestickPlot(painter, lower, upper+1); break;
21201  }
21202 }
21203 
21204 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21205 void QCPFinancial::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
21206 {
21207  painter->setAntialiasing(false); // legend icon especially of csCandlestick looks better without antialiasing
21208  if (mChartStyle == csOhlc)
21209  {
21210  if (mTwoColored)
21211  {
21212  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
21213  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
21214  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
21215  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
21216  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21217  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21218  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21219  // draw bottom right hald icon with negative color:
21220  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
21221  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
21222  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
21223  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21224  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21225  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21226  } else
21227  {
21228  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
21229  painter->setPen(mPen);
21230  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21231  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21232  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21233  }
21234  } else if (mChartStyle == csCandlestick)
21235  {
21236  if (mTwoColored)
21237  {
21238  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
21239  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
21240  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
21241  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
21242  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21243  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21244  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21245  // draw bottom right hald icon with negative color:
21246  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
21247  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
21248  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
21249  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21250  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21251  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21252  } else
21253  {
21254  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
21255  painter->setPen(mPen);
21256  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21257  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21258  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21259  }
21260  }
21261 }
21262 
21263 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21264 QCPRange QCPFinancial::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
21265 {
21266  QCPRange range;
21267  bool haveLower = false;
21268  bool haveUpper = false;
21269 
21270  double current;
21271  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
21272  while (it != mData->constEnd())
21273  {
21274  current = it.value().key;
21275  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
21276  {
21277  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
21278  {
21279  range.lower = current;
21280  haveLower = true;
21281  }
21282  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
21283  {
21284  range.upper = current;
21285  haveUpper = true;
21286  }
21287  }
21288  ++it;
21289  }
21290  // determine exact range by including width of bars/flags:
21291  if (haveLower && mKeyAxis)
21292  range.lower = range.lower-mWidth*0.5;
21293  if (haveUpper && mKeyAxis)
21294  range.upper = range.upper+mWidth*0.5;
21295  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
21296  return range;
21297 }
21298 
21299 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21300 QCPRange QCPFinancial::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
21301 {
21302  QCPRange range;
21303  bool haveLower = false;
21304  bool haveUpper = false;
21305 
21306  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
21307  while (it != mData->constEnd())
21308  {
21309  // high:
21310  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && it.value().high < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && it.value().high > 0))
21311  {
21312  if (it.value().high < range.lower || !haveLower)
21313  {
21314  range.lower = it.value().high;
21315  haveLower = true;
21316  }
21317  if (it.value().high > range.upper || !haveUpper)
21318  {
21319  range.upper = it.value().high;
21320  haveUpper = true;
21321  }
21322  }
21323  // low:
21324  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && it.value().low < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && it.value().low > 0))
21325  {
21326  if (it.value().low < range.lower || !haveLower)
21327  {
21328  range.lower = it.value().low;
21329  haveLower = true;
21330  }
21331  if (it.value().low > range.upper || !haveUpper)
21332  {
21333  range.upper = it.value().low;
21334  haveUpper = true;
21335  }
21336  }
21337  ++it;
21338  }
21339 
21340  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
21341  return range;
21342 }
21343 
21350 void QCPFinancial::drawOhlcPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end)
21351 {
21352  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21353  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21354  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
21355 
21356  QPen linePen;
21357 
21358  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21359  {
21360  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21361  {
21362  if (mSelected)
21363  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21364  else if (mTwoColored)
21365  linePen = it.value().close >= it.value().open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative;
21366  else
21367  linePen = mPen;
21368  painter->setPen(linePen);
21369  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21370  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21371  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21372  // draw backbone:
21373  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)));
21374  // draw open:
21375  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5); // sign of this makes sure open/close are on correct sides
21376  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel-keyWidthPixels, openPixel), QPointF(keyPixel, openPixel));
21377  // draw close:
21378  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, closePixel), QPointF(keyPixel+keyWidthPixels, closePixel));
21379  }
21380  } else
21381  {
21382  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21383  {
21384  if (mSelected)
21385  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21386  else if (mTwoColored)
21387  linePen = it.value().close >= it.value().open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative;
21388  else
21389  linePen = mPen;
21390  painter->setPen(linePen);
21391  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21392  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21393  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21394  // draw backbone:
21395  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel));
21396  // draw open:
21397  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5); // sign of this makes sure open/close are on correct sides
21398  painter->drawLine(QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel-keyWidthPixels), QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel));
21399  // draw close:
21400  painter->drawLine(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel), QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel+keyWidthPixels));
21401  }
21402  }
21403 }
21404 
21411 void QCPFinancial::drawCandlestickPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end)
21412 {
21413  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21414  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21415  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
21416 
21417  QPen linePen;
21418  QBrush boxBrush;
21419 
21420  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21421  {
21422  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21423  {
21424  if (mSelected)
21425  {
21426  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21427  boxBrush = mSelectedBrush;
21428  } else if (mTwoColored)
21429  {
21430  if (it.value().close >= it.value().open)
21431  {
21432  linePen = mPenPositive;
21433  boxBrush = mBrushPositive;
21434  } else
21435  {
21436  linePen = mPenNegative;
21437  boxBrush = mBrushNegative;
21438  }
21439  } else
21440  {
21441  linePen = mPen;
21442  boxBrush = mBrush;
21443  }
21444  painter->setPen(linePen);
21445  painter->setBrush(boxBrush);
21446  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21447  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21448  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21449  // draw high:
21450  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close))));
21451  // draw low:
21452  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close))));
21453  // draw open-close box:
21454  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5);
21455  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(keyPixel-keyWidthPixels, closePixel), QPointF(keyPixel+keyWidthPixels, openPixel)));
21456  }
21457  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
21458  {
21459  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21460  {
21461  if (mSelected)
21462  {
21463  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21464  boxBrush = mSelectedBrush;
21465  } else if (mTwoColored)
21466  {
21467  if (it.value().close >= it.value().open)
21468  {
21469  linePen = mPenPositive;
21470  boxBrush = mBrushPositive;
21471  } else
21472  {
21473  linePen = mPenNegative;
21474  boxBrush = mBrushNegative;
21475  }
21476  } else
21477  {
21478  linePen = mPen;
21479  boxBrush = mBrush;
21480  }
21481  painter->setPen(linePen);
21482  painter->setBrush(boxBrush);
21483  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21484  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21485  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21486  // draw high:
21487  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel));
21488  // draw low:
21489  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel));
21490  // draw open-close box:
21491  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5);
21492  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel-keyWidthPixels), QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel+keyWidthPixels)));
21493  }
21494  }
21495 }
21496 
21502 double QCPFinancial::ohlcSelectTest(const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) const
21503 {
21504  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21505  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21506  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
21507 
21508  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
21509  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it;
21510  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21511  {
21512  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21513  {
21514  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21515  // calculate distance to backbone:
21516  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)), pos);
21517  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21518  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21519  }
21520  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
21521  {
21522  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21523  {
21524  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21525  // calculate distance to backbone:
21526  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel), pos);
21527  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21528  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21529  }
21530  }
21531  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
21532 }
21533 
21540 double QCPFinancial::candlestickSelectTest(const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) const
21541 {
21542  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21543  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21544  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
21545 
21546  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
21547  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it;
21548  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21549  {
21550  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21551  {
21552  double currentDistSqr;
21553  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
21554  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5, it.value().key+mWidth*0.5);
21555  QCPRange boxValueRange(it.value().close, it.value().open);
21556  double posKey, posValue;
21557  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
21558  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) && boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
21559  {
21560  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 * mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
21561  } else
21562  {
21563  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
21564  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21565  double highLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close))), pos);
21566  double lowLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close))), pos);
21567  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
21568  }
21569  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21570  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21571  }
21572  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
21573  {
21574  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21575  {
21576  double currentDistSqr;
21577  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
21578  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5, it.value().key+mWidth*0.5);
21579  QCPRange boxValueRange(it.value().close, it.value().open);
21580  double posKey, posValue;
21581  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
21582  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) && boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
21583  {
21584  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 * mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
21585  } else
21586  {
21587  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
21588  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21589  double highLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel), pos);
21590  double lowLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel), pos);
21591  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
21592  }
21593  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21594  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21595  }
21596  }
21597  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
21598 }
21599 
21616 void QCPFinancial::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &lower, QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &upper) const
21617 {
21618  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
21619  if (mData->isEmpty())
21620  {
21621  lower = mData->constEnd();
21622  upper = mData->constEnd();
21623  return;
21624  }
21625 
21626  // get visible data range as QMap iterators
21627  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lbound = mData->lowerBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
21628  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator ubound = mData->upperBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
21629  bool lowoutlier = lbound != mData->constBegin(); // indicates whether there exist points below axis range
21630  bool highoutlier = ubound != mData->constEnd(); // indicates whether there exist points above axis range
21631 
21632  lower = (lowoutlier ? lbound-1 : lbound); // data point range that will be actually drawn
21633  upper = (highoutlier ? ubound : ubound-1); // data point range that will be actually drawn
21634 }
21635 
21636 
21640 
21654 QCPItemStraightLine::QCPItemStraightLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
21655  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
21656  point1(createPosition("point1")),
21657  point2(createPosition("point2"))
21658 {
21659  point1->setCoords(0, 0);
21660  point2->setCoords(1, 1);
21661 
21662  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21663  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
21664 }
21665 
21666 QCPItemStraightLine::~QCPItemStraightLine()
21667 {
21668 }
21669 
21675 void QCPItemStraightLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
21676 {
21677  mPen = pen;
21678 }
21679 
21685 void QCPItemStraightLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
21686 {
21687  mSelectedPen = pen;
21688 }
21689 
21690 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21691 double QCPItemStraightLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
21692 {
21693  Q_UNUSED(details)
21694  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21695  return -1;
21696 
21697  return distToStraightLine(QVector2D(point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(point2->pixelPoint()-point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(pos));
21698 }
21699 
21700 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21701 void QCPItemStraightLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21702 {
21703  QVector2D start(point1->pixelPoint());
21704  QVector2D end(point2->pixelPoint());
21705  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
21706  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
21707  QLineF line = getRectClippedStraightLine(start, end-start, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
21708  // paint visible segment, if existent:
21709  if (!line.isNull())
21710  {
21711  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21712  painter->drawLine(line);
21713  }
21714 }
21715 
21723 double QCPItemStraightLine::distToStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QVector2D &point) const
21724 {
21725  return qAbs((base.y()-point.y())*vec.x()-(base.x()-point.x())*vec.y())/vec.length();
21726 }
21727 
21735 QLineF QCPItemStraightLine::getRectClippedStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QRect &rect) const
21736 {
21737  double bx, by;
21738  double gamma;
21739  QLineF result;
21740  if (vec.x() == 0 && vec.y() == 0)
21741  return result;
21742  if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is vertical
21743  {
21744  // check top of rect:
21745  bx = rect.left();
21746  by = rect.top();
21747  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
21748  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21749  result.setLine(bx+gamma, rect.top(), bx+gamma, rect.bottom()); // no need to check bottom because we know line is vertical
21750  } else if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is horizontal
21751  {
21752  // check left of rect:
21753  bx = rect.left();
21754  by = rect.top();
21755  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
21756  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21757  result.setLine(rect.left(), by+gamma, rect.right(), by+gamma); // no need to check right because we know line is horizontal
21758  } else // line is skewed
21759  {
21760  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
21761  // check top of rect:
21762  bx = rect.left();
21763  by = rect.top();
21764  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
21765  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21766  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21767  // check bottom of rect:
21768  bx = rect.left();
21769  by = rect.bottom();
21770  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
21771  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21772  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21773  // check left of rect:
21774  bx = rect.left();
21775  by = rect.top();
21776  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
21777  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21778  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
21779  // check right of rect:
21780  bx = rect.right();
21781  by = rect.top();
21782  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
21783  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21784  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
21785 
21786  // evaluate points:
21787  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
21788  {
21789  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
21790  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
21791  {
21792  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
21793  double distSqrMax = 0;
21794  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
21795  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
21796  {
21797  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
21798  {
21799  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
21800  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
21801  {
21802  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
21803  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
21804  distSqrMax = distSqr;
21805  }
21806  }
21807  }
21808  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
21809  }
21810  }
21811  return result;
21812 }
21813 
21819 QPen QCPItemStraightLine::mainPen() const
21820 {
21821  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
21822 }
21823 
21824 
21828 
21844 QCPItemLine::QCPItemLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
21845  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
21846  start(createPosition("start")),
21847  end(createPosition("end"))
21848 {
21849  start->setCoords(0, 0);
21850  end->setCoords(1, 1);
21851 
21852  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21853  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
21854 }
21855 
21856 QCPItemLine::~QCPItemLine()
21857 {
21858 }
21859 
21865 void QCPItemLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
21866 {
21867  mPen = pen;
21868 }
21869 
21875 void QCPItemLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
21876 {
21877  mSelectedPen = pen;
21878 }
21879 
21888 void QCPItemLine::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
21889 {
21890  mHead = head;
21891 }
21892 
21901 void QCPItemLine::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
21902 {
21903  mTail = tail;
21904 }
21905 
21906 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21907 double QCPItemLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
21908 {
21909  Q_UNUSED(details)
21910  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21911  return -1;
21912 
21913  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine(start->pixelPoint(), end->pixelPoint(), pos));
21914 }
21915 
21916 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21917 void QCPItemLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21918 {
21919  QVector2D startVec(start->pixelPoint());
21920  QVector2D endVec(end->pixelPoint());
21921  if (startVec.toPoint() == endVec.toPoint())
21922  return;
21923  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
21924  double clipPad = qMax(mHead.boundingDistance(), mTail.boundingDistance());
21925  clipPad = qMax(clipPad, (double)mainPen().widthF());
21926  QLineF line = getRectClippedLine(startVec, endVec, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
21927  // paint visible segment, if existent:
21928  if (!line.isNull())
21929  {
21930  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21931  painter->drawLine(line);
21932  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
21933  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
21934  mTail.draw(painter, startVec, startVec-endVec);
21935  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
21936  mHead.draw(painter, endVec, endVec-startVec);
21937  }
21938 }
21939 
21947 QLineF QCPItemLine::getRectClippedLine(const QVector2D &start, const QVector2D &end, const QRect &rect) const
21948 {
21949  bool containsStart = rect.contains(start.x(), start.y());
21950  bool containsEnd = rect.contains(end.x(), end.y());
21951  if (containsStart && containsEnd)
21952  return QLineF(start.toPointF(), end.toPointF());
21953 
21954  QVector2D base = start;
21955  QVector2D vec = end-start;
21956  double bx, by;
21957  double gamma, mu;
21958  QLineF result;
21959  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
21960 
21961  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is not horizontal
21962  {
21963  // check top of rect:
21964  bx = rect.left();
21965  by = rect.top();
21966  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
21967  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
21968  {
21969  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
21970  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21971  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21972  }
21973  // check bottom of rect:
21974  bx = rect.left();
21975  by = rect.bottom();
21976  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
21977  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
21978  {
21979  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
21980  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21981  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21982  }
21983  }
21984  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is not vertical
21985  {
21986  // check left of rect:
21987  bx = rect.left();
21988  by = rect.top();
21989  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
21990  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
21991  {
21992  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
21993  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21994  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
21995  }
21996  // check right of rect:
21997  bx = rect.right();
21998  by = rect.top();
21999  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
22000  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
22001  {
22002  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
22003  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
22004  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
22005  }
22006  }
22007 
22008  if (containsStart)
22009  pointVectors.append(start);
22010  if (containsEnd)
22011  pointVectors.append(end);
22012 
22013  // evaluate points:
22014  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
22015  {
22016  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
22017  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
22018  {
22019  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
22020  double distSqrMax = 0;
22021  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
22022  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
22023  {
22024  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
22025  {
22026  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
22027  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
22028  {
22029  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
22030  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
22031  distSqrMax = distSqr;
22032  }
22033  }
22034  }
22035  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
22036  }
22037  return result;
22038 }
22039 
22045 QPen QCPItemLine::mainPen() const
22046 {
22047  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22048 }
22049 
22050 
22054 
22077 QCPItemCurve::QCPItemCurve(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22078  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22079  start(createPosition("start")),
22080  startDir(createPosition("startDir")),
22081  endDir(createPosition("endDir")),
22082  end(createPosition("end"))
22083 {
22084  start->setCoords(0, 0);
22085  startDir->setCoords(0.5, 0);
22086  endDir->setCoords(0, 0.5);
22087  end->setCoords(1, 1);
22088 
22089  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
22090  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
22091 }
22092 
22093 QCPItemCurve::~QCPItemCurve()
22094 {
22095 }
22096 
22102 void QCPItemCurve::setPen(const QPen &pen)
22103 {
22104  mPen = pen;
22105 }
22106 
22112 void QCPItemCurve::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
22113 {
22114  mSelectedPen = pen;
22115 }
22116 
22125 void QCPItemCurve::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
22126 {
22127  mHead = head;
22128 }
22129 
22138 void QCPItemCurve::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
22139 {
22140  mTail = tail;
22141 }
22142 
22143 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22144 double QCPItemCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22145 {
22146  Q_UNUSED(details)
22147  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22148  return -1;
22149 
22150  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
22151  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
22152  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
22153  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
22154 
22155  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
22156  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
22157 
22158  QPolygonF polygon = cubicPath.toSubpathPolygons().first();
22159  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
22160  for (int i=1; i<polygon.size(); ++i)
22161  {
22162  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(polygon.at(i-1), polygon.at(i), pos);
22163  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
22164  minDistSqr = distSqr;
22165  }
22166  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
22167 }
22168 
22169 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22170 void QCPItemCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22171 {
22172  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
22173  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
22174  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
22175  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
22176  if (QVector2D(endVec-startVec).length() > 1e10f) // too large curves cause crash
22177  return;
22178 
22179  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
22180  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
22181 
22182  // paint visible segment, if existent:
22183  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
22184  QRect cubicRect = cubicPath.controlPointRect().toRect();
22185  if (cubicRect.isEmpty()) // may happen when start and end exactly on same x or y position
22186  cubicRect.adjust(0, 0, 1, 1);
22187  if (clip.intersects(cubicRect))
22188  {
22189  painter->setPen(mainPen());
22190  painter->drawPath(cubicPath);
22191  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
22192  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
22193  mTail.draw(painter, QVector2D(startVec), M_PI-cubicPath.angleAtPercent(0)/180.0*M_PI);
22194  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
22195  mHead.draw(painter, QVector2D(endVec), -cubicPath.angleAtPercent(1)/180.0*M_PI);
22196  }
22197 }
22198 
22204 QPen QCPItemCurve::mainPen() const
22205 {
22206  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22207 }
22208 
22209 
22213 
22227 QCPItemRect::QCPItemRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22228  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22229  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
22230  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
22231  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
22232  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
22233  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
22234  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
22235  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
22236  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
22237 {
22238  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
22239  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
22240 
22241  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
22242  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
22243  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22244  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22245 }

22267 {
22268  mSelectedPen = pen;
22269 }

22278 {
22279  mBrush = brush;
22280 }

22289 {
22290  mSelectedBrush = brush;
22291 }
22292 
22293 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22294 double QCPItemRect::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22295 {
22296  Q_UNUSED(details)
22297  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22298  return -1;
22299 
22300  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint()).normalized();
22301  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
22302  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
22303 }
22304 
22305 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22306 void QCPItemRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22307 {
22308  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
22309  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
22310  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
22311  return;
22312  QRectF rect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
22313  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
22314  QRectF boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
22315  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect())) // only draw if bounding rect of rect item is visible in cliprect
22316  {
22317  painter->setPen(mainPen());
22318  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
22319  painter->drawRect(rect);
22320  }
22321 }
22322 
22323 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22324 QPointF QCPItemRect::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
22325 {
22326  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
22327  switch (anchorId)
22328  {
22329  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
22330  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
22331  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22332  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22333  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
22334  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
22335  }
22336 
22337  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
22338  return QPointF();
22339 }
22340 
22346 QPen QCPItemRect::mainPen() const
22347 {
22348  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22349 }
22350 
22356 QBrush QCPItemRect::mainBrush() const
22357 {
22358  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
22359 }
22360

22385 QCPItemText::QCPItemText(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22386  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22387  position(createPosition("position")),
22388  topLeft(createAnchor("topLeft", aiTopLeft)),
22389  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
22390  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
22391  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
22392  bottomRight(createAnchor("bottomRight", aiBottomRight)),
22393  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
22394  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
22395  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
22396 {
22397  position->setCoords(0, 0);
22398 
22399  setRotation(0);
22400  setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignTop|Qt::AlignHCenter);
22401  setPositionAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
22402  setText("text");
22403 
22404  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
22405  setSelectedPen(Qt::NoPen);
22406  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22407  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22408  setColor(Qt::black);
22409  setSelectedColor(Qt::blue);
22410 }
