22540 
22545 void QCPItemText::setPadding(const QMargins &padding)
22546 {
22547  mPadding = padding;
22548 }
22549 
22550 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22551 double QCPItemText::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22552 {
22553  Q_UNUSED(details)
22554  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22555  return -1;
22556 
22557  // The rect may be rotated, so we transform the actual clicked pos to the rotated
22558  // coordinate system, so we can use the normal rectSelectTest function for non-rotated rects:
22559  QPointF positionPixels(position->pixelPoint());
22560  QTransform inputTransform;
22561  inputTransform.translate(positionPixels.x(), positionPixels.y());
22562  inputTransform.rotate(-mRotation);
22563  inputTransform.translate(-positionPixels.x(), -positionPixels.y());
22564  QPointF rotatedPos = inputTransform.map(pos);
22565  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mFont);
22566  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22567  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
22568  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(positionPixels, textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment);
22569  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
22570 
22571  return rectSelectTest(textBoxRect, rotatedPos, true);
22572 }
22573 
22574 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22575 void QCPItemText::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22576 {
22577  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
22578  QTransform transform = painter->transform();
22579  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
22580  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
22581  transform.rotate(mRotation);
22582  painter->setFont(mainFont());
22583  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22584  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
22585  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
22586  textRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint()+QPoint(mPadding.left(), mPadding.top()));
22587  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
22588  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
22589  QRect boundingRect = textBoxRect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
22590  if (transform.mapRect(boundingRect).intersects(painter->transform().mapRect(clipRect())))
22591  {
22592  painter->setTransform(transform);
22593  if ((mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) ||
22594  (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0))
22595  {
22596  painter->setPen(mainPen());
22597  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
22598  painter->drawRect(textBoxRect);
22599  }
22600  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22601  painter->setPen(QPen(mainColor()));
22602  painter->drawText(textRect, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22603  }
22604 }
22605 
22606 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22607 QPointF QCPItemText::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
22608 {
22609  // get actual rect points (pretty much copied from draw function):
22610  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
22611  QTransform transform;
22612  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
22613  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
22614  transform.rotate(mRotation);
22615  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mainFont());
22616  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22617  QRectF textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
22618  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
22619  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
22620  QPolygonF rectPoly = transform.map(QPolygonF(textBoxRect));
22621 
22622  switch (anchorId)
22623  {
22624  case aiTopLeft: return rectPoly.at(0);
22625  case aiTop: return (rectPoly.at(0)+rectPoly.at(1))*0.5;
22626  case aiTopRight: return rectPoly.at(1);
22627  case aiRight: return (rectPoly.at(1)+rectPoly.at(2))*0.5;
22628  case aiBottomRight: return rectPoly.at(2);
22629  case aiBottom: return (rectPoly.at(2)+rectPoly.at(3))*0.5;
22630  case aiBottomLeft: return rectPoly.at(3);
22631  case aiLeft: return (rectPoly.at(3)+rectPoly.at(0))*0.5;
22632  }
22633 
22634  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
22635  return QPointF();
22636 }
22637 
22648 QPointF QCPItemText::getTextDrawPoint(const QPointF &pos, const QRectF &rect, Qt::Alignment positionAlignment) const
22649 {
22650  if (positionAlignment == 0 || positionAlignment == (Qt::AlignLeft|Qt::AlignTop))
22651  return pos;
22652 
22653  QPointF result = pos; // start at top left
22654  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignHCenter))
22655  result.rx() -= rect.width()/2.0;
22656  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
22657  result.rx() -= rect.width();
22658  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignVCenter))
22659  result.ry() -= rect.height()/2.0;
22660  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
22661  result.ry() -= rect.height();
22662  return result;
22663 }
22664 
22670 QFont QCPItemText::mainFont() const
22671 {
22672  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
22673 }
22674 
22680 QColor QCPItemText::mainColor() const
22681 {
22682  return mSelected ? mSelectedColor : mColor;
22683 }
22684 
22690 QPen QCPItemText::mainPen() const
22691 {
22692  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22693 }
22694 
22700 QBrush QCPItemText::mainBrush() const
22701 {
22702  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
22703 }
22704 
22705 
22709 
22723 QCPItemEllipse::QCPItemEllipse(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22724  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22725  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
22726  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
22727  topLeftRim(createAnchor("topLeftRim", aiTopLeftRim)),
22728  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
22729  topRightRim(createAnchor("topRightRim", aiTopRightRim)),
22730  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
22731  bottomRightRim(createAnchor("bottomRightRim", aiBottomRightRim)),
22732  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
22733  bottomLeftRim(createAnchor("bottomLeftRim", aiBottomLeftRim)),
22734  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft)),
22735  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
22736 {
22737  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
22738  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
22739 
22740  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
22741  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
22742  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22743  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22744 }
22745 
22746 QCPItemEllipse::~QCPItemEllipse()
22747 {
22748 }
22749 
22755 void QCPItemEllipse::setPen(const QPen &pen)
22756 {
22757  mPen = pen;
22758 }
22759 
22765 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
22766 {
22767  mSelectedPen = pen;
22768 }
22769 
22776 void QCPItemEllipse::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22777 {
22778  mBrush = brush;
22779 }
22780 
22787 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22788 {
22789  mSelectedBrush = brush;
22790 }
22791 
22792 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22793 double QCPItemEllipse::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22794 {
22795  Q_UNUSED(details)
22796  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22797  return -1;
22798 
22799  double result = -1;
22800  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
22801  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
22802  QPointF center((p1+p2)/2.0);
22803  double a = qAbs(p1.x()-p2.x())/2.0;
22804  double b = qAbs(p1.y()-p2.y())/2.0;
22805  double x = pos.x()-center.x();
22806  double y = pos.y()-center.y();
22807 
22808  // distance to border:
22809  double c = 1.0/qSqrt(x*x/(a*a)+y*y/(b*b));
22810  result = qAbs(c-1)*qSqrt(x*x+y*y);
22811  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
22812  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
22813  {
22814  if (x*x/(a*a) + y*y/(b*b) <= 1)
22815  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
22816  }
22817  return result;
22818 }
22819 
22820 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22821 void QCPItemEllipse::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22822 {
22823  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
22824  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
22825  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
22826  return;
22827  QRectF ellipseRect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
22828  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
22829  if (ellipseRect.intersects(clip)) // only draw if bounding rect of ellipse is visible in cliprect
22830  {
22831  painter->setPen(mainPen());
22832  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
22833 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
22834  try // drawEllipse sometimes throws exceptions if ellipse is too big
22835  {
22836 #endif
22837  painter->drawEllipse(ellipseRect);
22838 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
22839  } catch (...)
22840  {
22841  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item too large for memory, setting invisible";
22842  setVisible(false);
22843  }
22844 #endif
22845  }
22846 }
22847 
22848 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22849 QPointF QCPItemEllipse::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
22850 {
22851  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
22852  switch (anchorId)
22853  {
22854  case aiTopLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22855  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
22856  case aiTopRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22857  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22858  case aiBottomRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22859  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22860  case aiBottomLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22861  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
22862  case aiCenter: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22863  }
22864 
22865  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
22866  return QPointF();
22867 }
22868 
22874 QPen QCPItemEllipse::mainPen() const
22875 {
22876  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22877 }
22878 
22884 QBrush QCPItemEllipse::mainBrush() const
22885 {
22886  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
22887 }
22888 
22889 
22893 
22913 QCPItemPixmap::QCPItemPixmap(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22914  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22915  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
22916  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
22917  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
22918  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
22919  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
22920  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
22921  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
22922  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
22923 {
22924  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
22925  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
22926 
22927  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
22928  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue));
22929  setScaled(false, Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
22930 }
22931 
22932 QCPItemPixmap::~QCPItemPixmap()
22933 {
22934 }
22935 
22939 void QCPItemPixmap::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
22940 {
22941  mPixmap = pixmap;
22942  if (mPixmap.isNull())
22943  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "pixmap is null";
22944 }
22945 
22950 void QCPItemPixmap::setScaled(bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode aspectRatioMode)
22951 {
22952  mScaled = scaled;
22953  mAspectRatioMode = aspectRatioMode;
22954  updateScaledPixmap();
22955 }
22956 
22962 void QCPItemPixmap::setPen(const QPen &pen)
22963 {
22964  mPen = pen;
22965 }
22966 
22972 void QCPItemPixmap::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
22973 {
22974  mSelectedPen = pen;
22975 }
22976 
22977 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22978 double QCPItemPixmap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22979 {
22980  Q_UNUSED(details)
22981  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22982  return -1;
22983 
22984  return rectSelectTest(getFinalRect(), pos, true);
22985 }
22986 
22987 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22988 void QCPItemPixmap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22989 {
22990  bool flipHorz = false;
22991  bool flipVert = false;
22992  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
22993  double clipPad = mainPen().style() == Qt::NoPen ? 0 : mainPen().widthF();
22994  QRect boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
22995  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect()))
22996  {
22997  updateScaledPixmap(rect, flipHorz, flipVert);
22998  painter->drawPixmap(rect.topLeft(), mScaled ? mScaledPixmap : mPixmap);
22999  QPen pen = mainPen();
23000  if (pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)
23001  {
23002  painter->setPen(pen);
23003  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
23004  painter->drawRect(rect);
23005  }
23006  }
23007 }
23008 
23009 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23010 QPointF QCPItemPixmap::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
23011 {
23012  bool flipHorz;
23013  bool flipVert;
23014  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
23015  // we actually want denormal rects (negative width/height) here, so restore
23016  // the flipped state:
23017  if (flipHorz)
23018  rect.adjust(rect.width(), 0, -rect.width(), 0);
23019  if (flipVert)
23020  rect.adjust(0, rect.height(), 0, -rect.height());
23021 
23022  switch (anchorId)
23023  {
23024  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
23025  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
23026  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
23027  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
23028  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
23029  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;;
23030  }
23031 
23032  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
23033  return QPointF();
23034 }
23035 
23049 void QCPItemPixmap::updateScaledPixmap(QRect finalRect, bool flipHorz, bool flipVert)
23050 {
23051  if (mPixmap.isNull())
23052  return;
23053 
23054  if (mScaled)
23055  {
23056  if (finalRect.isNull())
23057  finalRect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
23058  if (finalRect.size() != mScaledPixmap.size())
23059  {
23060  mScaledPixmap = mPixmap.scaled(finalRect.size(), mAspectRatioMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
23061  if (flipHorz || flipVert)
23062  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap::fromImage(mScaledPixmap.toImage().mirrored(flipHorz, flipVert));
23063  }
23064  } else if (!mScaledPixmap.isNull())
23065  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap();
23066 }
23067 
23082 QRect QCPItemPixmap::getFinalRect(bool *flippedHorz, bool *flippedVert) const
23083 {
23084  QRect result;
23085  bool flipHorz = false;
23086  bool flipVert = false;
23087  QPoint p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint().toPoint();
23088  QPoint p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint().toPoint();
23089  if (p1 == p2)
23090  return QRect(p1, QSize(0, 0));
23091  if (mScaled)
23092  {
23093  QSize newSize = QSize(p2.x()-p1.x(), p2.y()-p1.y());
23094  QPoint topLeft = p1;
23095  if (newSize.width() < 0)
23096  {
23097  flipHorz = true;
23098  newSize.rwidth() *= -1;
23099  topLeft.setX(p2.x());
23100  }
23101  if (newSize.height() < 0)
23102  {
23103  flipVert = true;
23104  newSize.rheight() *= -1;
23105  topLeft.setY(p2.y());
23106  }
23107  QSize scaledSize = mPixmap.size();
23108  scaledSize.scale(newSize, mAspectRatioMode);
23109  result = QRect(topLeft, scaledSize);
23110  } else
23111  {
23112  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size());
23113  }
23114  if (flippedHorz)
23115  *flippedHorz = flipHorz;
23116  if (flippedVert)
23117  *flippedVert = flipVert;
23118  return result;
23119 }
23120 
23126 QPen QCPItemPixmap::mainPen() const
23127 {
23128  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
23129 }
23130 
23131 
23135 
23171 QCPItemTracer::QCPItemTracer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
23172  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
23173  position(createPosition("position")),
23174  mGraph(0)
23175 {
23176  position->setCoords(0, 0);
23177 
23178  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
23179  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
23180  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
23181  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
23182  setStyle(tsCrosshair);
23183  setSize(6);
23184  setInterpolating(false);
23185  setGraphKey(0);
23186 }
23187 
23188 QCPItemTracer::~QCPItemTracer()
23189 {
23190 }
23191 
23197 void QCPItemTracer::setPen(const QPen &pen)
23198 {
23199  mPen = pen;
23200 }
23201 
23207 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
23208 {
23209  mSelectedPen = pen;
23210 }
23211 
23217 void QCPItemTracer::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
23218 {
23219  mBrush = brush;
23220 }
23221 
23227 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
23228 {
23229  mSelectedBrush = brush;
23230 }
23231 
23236 void QCPItemTracer::setSize(double size)
23237 {
23238  mSize = size;
23239 }
23240 
23247 void QCPItemTracer::setStyle(QCPItemTracer::TracerStyle style)
23248 {
23249  mStyle = style;
23250 }
23251 
23262 void QCPItemTracer::setGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
23263 {
23264  if (graph)
23265  {
23266  if (graph->parentPlot() == mParentPlot)
23267  {
23268  position->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
23269  position->setAxes(graph->keyAxis(), graph->valueAxis());
23270  mGraph = graph;
23271  updatePosition();
23272  } else
23273  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph isn't in same QCustomPlot instance as this item";
23274  } else
23275  {
23276  mGraph = 0;
23277  }
23278 }
23279 
23289 void QCPItemTracer::setGraphKey(double key)
23290 {
23291  mGraphKey = key;
23292 }
23293 
23305 void QCPItemTracer::setInterpolating(bool enabled)
23306 {
23307  mInterpolating = enabled;
23308 }
23309 
23310 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23311 double QCPItemTracer::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
23312 {
23313  Q_UNUSED(details)
23314  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
23315  return -1;
23316 
23317  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
23318  double w = mSize/2.0;
23319  QRect clip = clipRect();
23320  switch (mStyle)
23321  {
23322  case tsNone: return -1;
23323  case tsPlus:
23324  {
23325  if (clipRect().intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23326  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0), pos),
23327  distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w), pos)));
23328  break;
23329  }
23330  case tsCrosshair:
23331  {
23332  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(QPointF(clip.left(), center.y()), QPointF(clip.right(), center.y()), pos),
23333  distSqrToLine(QPointF(center.x(), clip.top()), QPointF(center.x(), clip.bottom()), pos)));
23334  }
23335  case tsCircle:
23336  {
23337  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23338  {
23339  // distance to border:
23340  double centerDist = QVector2D(center-pos).length();
23341  double circleLine = w;
23342  double result = qAbs(centerDist-circleLine);
23343  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
23344  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
23345  {
23346  if (centerDist <= circleLine)
23347  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
23348  }
23349  return result;
23350  }
23351  break;
23352  }
23353  case tsSquare:
23354  {
23355  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23356  {
23357  QRectF rect = QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w));
23358  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
23359  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
23360  }
23361  break;
23362  }
23363  }
23364  return -1;
23365 }
23366 
23367 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23368 void QCPItemTracer::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
23369 {
23370  updatePosition();
23371  if (mStyle == tsNone)
23372  return;
23373 
23374  painter->setPen(mainPen());
23375  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
23376  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
23377  double w = mSize/2.0;
23378  QRect clip = clipRect();
23379  switch (mStyle)
23380  {
23381  case tsNone: return;
23382  case tsPlus:
23383  {
23384  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23385  {
23386  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0)));
23387  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w)));
23388  }
23389  break;
23390  }
23391  case tsCrosshair:
23392  {
23393  if (center.y() > clip.top() && center.y() < clip.bottom())
23394  painter->drawLine(QLineF(clip.left(), center.y(), clip.right(), center.y()));
23395  if (center.x() > clip.left() && center.x() < clip.right())
23396  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center.x(), clip.top(), center.x(), clip.bottom()));
23397  break;
23398  }
23399  case tsCircle:
23400  {
23401  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23402  painter->drawEllipse(center, w, w);
23403  break;
23404  }
23405  case tsSquare:
23406  {
23407  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23408  painter->drawRect(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)));
23409  break;
23410  }
23411  }
23412 }
23413 
23426 void QCPItemTracer::updatePosition()
23427 {
23428  if (mGraph)
23429  {
23430  if (mParentPlot->hasPlottable(mGraph))
23431  {
23432  if (mGraph->data()->size() > 1)
23433  {
23434  QCPDataMap::const_iterator first = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
23435  QCPDataMap::const_iterator last = mGraph->data()->constEnd()-1;
23436  if (mGraphKey < first.key())
23437  position->setCoords(first.key(), first.value().value);
23438  else if (mGraphKey > last.key())
23439  position->setCoords(last.key(), last.value().value);
23440  else
23441  {
23442  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->lowerBound(mGraphKey);
23443  if (it != first) // mGraphKey is somewhere between iterators
23444  {
23445  QCPDataMap::const_iterator prevIt = it-1;
23446  if (mInterpolating)
23447  {
23448  // interpolate between iterators around mGraphKey:
23449  double slope = 0;
23450  if (!qFuzzyCompare((double)it.key(), (double)prevIt.key()))
23451  slope = (it.value().value-prevIt.value().value)/(it.key()-prevIt.key());
23452  position->setCoords(mGraphKey, (mGraphKey-prevIt.key())*slope+prevIt.value().value);
23453  } else
23454  {
23455  // find iterator with key closest to mGraphKey:
23456  if (mGraphKey < (prevIt.key()+it.key())*0.5)
23457  it = prevIt;
23458  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
23459  }
23460  } else // mGraphKey is exactly on first iterator
23461  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
23462  }
23463  } else if (mGraph->data()->size() == 1)
23464  {
23465  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
23466  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
23467  } else
23468  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph has no data";
23469  } else
23470  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph not contained in QCustomPlot instance (anymore)";
23471  }
23472 }
23473 
23479 QPen QCPItemTracer::mainPen() const
23480 {
23481  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
23482 }
23483 
23489 QBrush QCPItemTracer::mainBrush() const
23490 {
23491  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
23492 }
23493 
23494 
23498 
23524 QCPItemBracket::QCPItemBracket(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
23525  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
23526  left(createPosition("left")),
23527  right(createPosition("right")),
23528  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
23529 {
23530  left->setCoords(0, 0);
23531  right->setCoords(1, 1);
23532 
23533  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
23534  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
23535  setLength(8);
23536  setStyle(bsCalligraphic);
23537 }
23538 
23539 QCPItemBracket::~QCPItemBracket()
23540 {
23541 }
23542 
23552 void QCPItemBracket::setPen(const QPen &pen)
23553 {
23554  mPen = pen;
23555 }
23556 
23562 void QCPItemBracket::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
23563 {
23564  mSelectedPen = pen;
23565 }
23566 
23575 void QCPItemBracket::setLength(double length)
23576 {
23577  mLength = length;
23578 }
23579 
23585 void QCPItemBracket::setStyle(QCPItemBracket::BracketStyle style)
23586 {
23587  mStyle = style;
23588 }
23589 
23590 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23591 double QCPItemBracket::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
23592 {
23593  Q_UNUSED(details)
23594  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
23595  return -1;
23596 
23597  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
23598  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
23599  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
23600  return -1;
23601 
23602  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
23603  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
23604  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
23605  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
23606 
23607  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), pos));
23608 }
23609 
23610 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23611 void QCPItemBracket::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
23612 {
23613  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
23614  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
23615  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
23616  return;
23617 
23618  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
23619  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
23620  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
23621  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
23622 
23623  QPolygon boundingPoly;
23624  boundingPoly << leftVec.toPoint() << rightVec.toPoint()
23625  << (rightVec-lengthVec).toPoint() << (leftVec-lengthVec).toPoint();
23626  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
23627  if (clip.intersects(boundingPoly.boundingRect()))
23628  {
23629  painter->setPen(mainPen());
23630  switch (mStyle)
23631  {
23632  case bsSquare:
23633  {
23634  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF());
23635  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23636  painter->drawLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23637  break;
23638  }
23639  case bsRound:
23640  {
23641  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
23642  QPainterPath path;
23643  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23644  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
23645  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23646  painter->drawPath(path);
23647  break;
23648  }
23649  case bsCurly:
23650  {
23651  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
23652  QPainterPath path;
23653  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23654  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4f*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
23655  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4f*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23656  painter->drawPath(path);
23657  break;
23658  }
23659  case bsCalligraphic:
23660  {
23661  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
23662  painter->setBrush(QBrush(mainPen().color()));
23663  QPainterPath path;
23664  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23665 
23666  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4f*widthVec+0.8f*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
23667  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4f*widthVec+0.8f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23668 
23669  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.5f).toPointF(), (centerVec-0.2f*widthVec+1.2f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+lengthVec*0.2f).toPointF());
23670  path.cubicTo((centerVec+0.2f*widthVec+1.2f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.5f).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23671 
23672  painter->drawPath(path);
23673  break;
23674  }
23675  }
23676  }
23677 }
23678 
23679 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23680 QPointF QCPItemBracket::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
23681 {
23682  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
23683  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
23684  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
23685  return leftVec.toPointF();
23686 
23687  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
23688  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
23689  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
23690  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
23691 
23692  switch (anchorId)
23693  {
23694  case aiCenter:
23695  return centerVec.toPointF();
23696  }
23697  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
23698  return QPointF();
23699 }
23700

23707 {
23708  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
23709 }
